V03vinv172u:3: kauṇḍinyo nandīpālaś ca modakā udakaṃ pibet /
V03vinv172u:5: karakaḥ kalabhuś caiva viśvabhug vanarathena ca /
V03vinv172u:7: yadā āyuṣmatā kauṇḍinyena sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam <
V03vinv172u:10: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:11: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā kauṇḍinyena karma kṛtam yena bhagavatā saṅghāṭīdhvajadhāriṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ?
V03vinv172u:13: kauṇḍinyena bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:14: kauṇḍinyenaiva karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati?
V03vinv172u:15: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
V03vinv172u:19: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
V03vinv172u:20: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv172u:21: sāmagrīm prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
V03vinv172u:24: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asminn eva bhadrake kalpe varṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi,
V03vinv172u:25: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv172u:26: *sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati karakacchedake parvate;
V03vinv172u:27: yāvad apareṇa samayena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya,
V03vinv172u:30: adrākśus te goṣṭhikās taṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtam,
V03vinv172u:35: sahadarśanāc ca prasādajātāḥ sañjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ:
V03vinv172u:37: teṣām evaṃ kṛtasaṅketānāṃ kecin mahāsamudram avatīrṇāh;
V03vinv172u:43: cchedakaṃ parvataṃ gatvā kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśe pravrajitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:45: yāvad apareṇa samayena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgniḥ ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtah;
V03vinv172u:51: pañca sahaśravaṇād eva karakacchedakāt parvatād avatīrya vārāṇasīṃ praviṣṭāḥ;
V03vinv172u:52: ṣaḍbhis tenaiva saṃvegena vīryam avalambya pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā;
V03vinv172u:53: pañca paścād avatīrya vārāṇasīṃ praveṣṭum (SBV II 3)
V03vinv172u:59: sa ca śākaṭikas tasya śakaṭasārthasyāgrato yāyī;
V03vinv172u:61: bhoḥ śākaṭika taveme balīvardā durbalāḥ; kim etān pratodayaṣṭyā bhūyobhūyas tāḍayasi?
V03vinv172u:64: mamāgrato gacchato na śakyam anena śakaṭasārthena sārdhaṃ gantum; yady ahaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nugacchāmi,
V03vinv172u:67: bhavantaḥ kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe parinirvṛte vayaṃ vilambitā ity anenāsmākam eṣā codanā kṛtā;
V03vinv172u:70: yady apy antarhito dharmaḥ kāśyapasya mahāmuneḥ /
V03vinv172u:72: parikṣayaṃ na yāsyanti yady apy asmākam āsrāvāḥ /
V03vinv172u:74: te vārāṇasīṃ praviśya piṇḍapātaṃ caritvā punar api karakacchedakaṃ parvataṃ gatvā dhyānādhyayanayogenāvasthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:78: ayam eva sa karakacchedakaḥ parvato yatra mayā kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ paryupāsitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:79: dṛṣṭaś ca tasya viṃśatibhikṣusaharāṇām ekaḥ [A_425b] sakalajambūdvīpe 'pi saṅghāṭīdhvajadhārīti;
V03vinv172u:81: yan mayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe yāvadāyur brahmacaryaṃ caritam;
V03vinv172u:83: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ,
V03vinv172u:84: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:85: tasyāhaṃ śāsane pravrajya tatprathamataḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryām;
V03vinv172u:86: māṃ ca bhagavān śākyamuniḥ saṅghāṭīdhvajadhāriṇām agraṃ nirdiśed iti.
V03vinv172u:88: yo 'sau tena kālena samayena bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya viṃśatibhikṣusaharāṇām (SBV II 4)
V03vinv172u:92: tatpraṇidhānvaśād etarhi bhagavatā saṅghāṭīdhvajadhāriṇām agratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:93: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
V03vinv172u:95: vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ; tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
V03vinv172u:96: ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ; ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:97: yadā bhagavatā āyuṣmataḥ kauṇḍinyasya ākāryākārya dharmo deśitaḥ, ājñātas te kauṇḍinya dharmaḥ?
V03vinv172u:98: ājñato bhagavan; ājñatas te kauṇḍinya dharmaḥ?
V03vinv172u:101: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātaḥ sarvasaṃśayachettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:102: kiṃ bhadanta ājñātakauṇḍinyena karma kṛtaṃ yenāsya bhagavatā ākāryākārya dharmo deśitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:104: ājñato bhagavan; ājñatas te kauṇḍinya dharmaḥ?
V03vinv172u:106: kauṇḍinyenaiva bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām.
V03vinv172u:110: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati,
V03vinv172u:111: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:112: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:113: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:114: aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā; dārako jātaḥ,
V03vinv172u:116: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
V03vinv172u:117: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti; amātyāḥ ūcuḥ:
V03vinv172u:118: deva ācaritaṃ madhyadeśe yo 'bhirūpo bhavati prāsādikaḥ sa sundara ity ucyate;
V03vinv172u:119: ayaṃ ca dārakaḥ abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ,
V03vinv172u:124: dvābhyām aṅgadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ [A_426a] maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām;
V03vinv172u:126: dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam.
V03vinv172u:127: bhūyo 'pi rājñaḥ krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:128: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:130: yasminn eva divase vārāṇasyāṃ paurajānapadānāṃ mahān kalir utpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:132: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti; antaḥpurajanaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:133: deva asya janmani vārāṇasyāṃ paurajānapadānāṃ mahān kalir abhūt;
V03vinv172u:134: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya kalibhūr iti nāmeti;
V03vinv172u:136: kāśisundaraḥ kumāraḥ paśyati pitaraṃ dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayantam;
V03vinv172u:138: aham api pitur atyayād rājā bhaviṣyāmi;
V03vinv172u:139: aham api dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyāmi;
V03vinv172u:140: yannv aham agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajeyam iti;
V03vinv172u:143: pravrajāmy agārād anagārikām iti; sa kathayati: putra yasyārthe yajñā ijyante,
V03vinv172u:146: tat tava karatalagataṃ rājyam; kasyārthe apāsya pravrajasīti; sa gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:147: varaṃ vane valkalacīravāsasā phalāśinā vyāḍamṛgaiḥ sahoṣitam /
V03vinv172u:148: na rājyahetor vadhabandhatāḍanaṃ budhena kartuṃ paralokabhīruṇā // iti;
V03vinv172u:150: yat khalu kumāra jānīyās tvam asmākam ekaputraḥ priyo manāpaḥ kṣānto 'pratikūlaḥ;
V03vinv172u:157: na pāsyāmīti; tatra kāśisundaraḥ kumāraḥ ekam api bhaktacchedam akārṣīd,
V03vinv172u:160: yāvad ṣaḍ bhaktacchedān akārṣīt; atha rāja brahmadattaḥ kāśisundaraṃ kumāram idam avocat: (SBV II 6)
V03vinv172u:161: yat khalu tāta kumāra jānīyā duścaraṃ brahmacaryam,
V03vinv172u:169: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣakebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:170: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣikābhyo ratikrīḍābhya āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:171: ehi tvaṃ tāta kumāra ihaiva sthito yauvarājyaṃ kāraya;
V03vinv172u:173: dānāni ca dehi puṇyāni ca kuru; evam ukta kāśisundaraḥ kumāras tūṣṇīm.
V03vinv172u:174: atha rājā brahmadattaḥ antaḥpuram amātyān paurohitāṃś codyojayati;
V03vinv172u:176: evaṃ devety antaḥpurāmātyapaurohitā yena kāśisundaraḥ kumāras tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:179: tvaṃ hi sukumāraḥ sukhaiṣī; na tvaṃ jñātā duḥkhasya; duścaraṃ brahmacaryam; duṣkaraṃ prāvivekyaṃ,
V03vinv172u:186: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣakebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:187: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣikābhyo ratikrīḍābhya āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:188: ehi tvaṃ tāta kumāra ihaiva sthito yauvarājyaṃ kāraya;
V03vinv172u:190: dānāni ca <dehi puṇyāni ca> kuru; evam ukta kāśisundaraḥ kumāras tūṣṇīm.
V03vinv172u:191: atha rājā brahmadattaḥ kāśisunadrasya kumārasya pāṃsukrīḍanakāmātyaputrān paurohitaputrān anyāṃś ca kumārāṇ udyojayati;
V03vinv172u:192: aṅga tāvad kumārakāḥ kāśisundaraṃ kumāram utthāpayata;
V03vinv172u:193: athāmātyaputrāḥ purohitaputrāḥ kumārāś ca rājño brahmadattasya pratiśrutya,
V03vinv172u:194: yena kāśisundaraḥ kumāras tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ; upasaṃkramya kāśisundaraṃ kumāraṃ idam avocan:
V03vinv172u:195: yat khalu somya kumāra jānīyās tvaṃ hi sukumāraḥ sukhaiṣī;
V03vinv172u:201: duḥkham ekākino 'raṇye vāsaḥ; yāvajjīvaṃ te vyāḍamṛgaiḥ (SBV II 7)
V03vinv172u:204: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣakebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:205: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣikābhyo ratikrīḍābhyaḥ āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
V03vinv172u:206: ehi tvaṃ somya kumāra ihaiva sthito yauvarājyaṃ kāraya;
V03vinv172u:213: athāmātyaputrāḥ purohitaputrāḥ ca yena rājā brahmadattas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:215: anujānīhi deva somyaṃ kāśisundaraṃ kumāram; kiṃ hi mṛtena kariṣyasi?
V03vinv172u:217: jīvantam enaṃ drakṣyasi; no ced abhiraṃsyase,
V03vinv172u:218: punar āvartikā hi ṛṣayo bhavanti; kānyā putrasya gatir,
V03vinv172u:220: rājā brahmadattaḥ kathayati: kumārakā yady evam,
V03vinv172u:222: athāmātyaputrāḥ purohitaputrāḥ kumārāś ca yena kāśisundaraḥ kumāras tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:227: atha kāśisundaraḥ kumāraḥ maṇḍānupūrvīṃ kṛtvā kāyasya sthāma ca balaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca sañjanya vārāṇasyāḥ ca niṣkramya ṛṣīṇāṃ madhye pravrajitaḥ; tenodyacchamānena,
V03vinv172u:231: tasyaitayā matryā vyāḍamṛgā apy āśramapade viśvāsam āpadyante;
V03vinv172u:234: yāvad apareṇa samayena [A_427a] rājā brahmadattaḥ kālagataḥ;
V03vinv172u:249: gatvā śāntavihārasamanveṣaṇayā itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramann anupūrveṇa pituḥ santakam udyānaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:250: tena tasmin paryaṭatā śāntaḥ pradeśo dṛṣṭaḥ; sa tatrāvasthitaḥ.
V03vinv172u:251_0: yāvad apareṇa samayena kalabhū rājā saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu
V03vinv172u:252: sa tatrodyāne sukham anubhūya khedam āpanno middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:253: puṣpaphalalolupo mātṛgrāmas tasminn udyāne itaś ca amutaś ca paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:254: yāvat paśyanti kṣāntivādinam ṛṣim ekānte śānteryāpathe niṣaṇṇam;
V03vinv172u:255: dṛṣṭvā ca punar gauravāpyāyitacittasantatyaḥ tasya ṛṣeḥ praṇāmaṃ kṛtvā parivāryāvasthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:256: kṣāntivādī ṛṣis tās striyo śāntatareṇeryāpathena dharmaṃ deśayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:257: yāvat kalabhū rājā nidrāklamaṃ prativinodya prabuddho na paśyaty antaḥpurajanam;
V03vinv172u:258: sa khaḍgam ādāya yuvatijanaṃ samanveṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:259: yāvat paśyati kṣāntivādinaṃ riṣiṃ parivārya avasthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:260: dṛṣṭvā ca punar īrṣyājanitakrodhaparyākulīkṛtātmabhāvaḥ tasya riṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:261: mātṛgrāmo rājñaḥ sakāśam avasthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā santrasto vidrutaḥ;
V03vinv172u:264: sa kathayati: kṣāntivādī; kalabhū rājā kathayati: mayi vikupite kṣāntivādinam ātmānaṃ pratijānīṣe?
V03vinv172u:265: idānīṃ kṣāntivādī vā bhavān na veti tena tasya hastau chinnau;
V03vinv172u:268: kṣāntivādī; tena tasya pādau chinnau; sa chidyamāneṣv aṅgapratyaṅgeṣu gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:269: yadi tilaśatam api kṛtvā kṣepsyase kāyam urvyām
V03vinv172u:271: yasya mama śubhā maitrī cetasi paribhāvitā sadā kṣāntim
V03vinv172u:272: tāṃ notsahe vihantuṃ sutam iva sutavatsalā jananī //
V03vinv172u:273: sa evaṃ gāthābhir gītena rujaṃ vinodya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:274: yathaiṣa rājā kleśābhiniviṣṭabuddhir mamākāryākārya aṅgapratyaṅgāni chinatti;
V03vinv172u:276: kuśalamūlena kleśagaṇam ātmīyam abhinirjitya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau abhisaṃbuddhaḥ syām;
V03vinv172u:277: tataḥ prajñāśastreṇasya ākāryākārya tatprathamataḥ kleśān pramlāyeyam iti.
V03vinv172u:278: atha yā devatā kṣāntivādiny abhiprasannā sā saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:279: anena kalirājena ayam ṛṣir adūṣy anapakārī karacaraṇaśūnyo vyavasthāpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:281: iti viditvā tīvreṇa [A_427b] paryavasthānena kṣāntivādinaḥ purastād gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:283: kṛtsnaṃ ca jīvalokam ājñāpaya nāśayiṣyāmi // iti;
V03vinv172u:285: karacaraṇanāśavikalaṃ kṛtaṃ mama śarīram ākulaṃ yena /
V03vinv172u:286: tasyāpi pāpam aṇv api necchāmi kutaḥ punar adūṣino jagataḥ //
V03vinv172u:287: tasyāpi yā devatā vārāṇasyām ītis tata itaḥ sṛṣṭā; mūṣikāḥ śalabhāḥ
V03vinv172u:288: śukāḥ prabalāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ; devo na varṣati; janakāyo mriyate; rājñā naimittikā āhūya pṛṣṭāḥ:
V03vinv172u:290: muṣikāḥ śalabhāḥ śukāḥ prabalāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ; janakāyaś ca mriyate iti; te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:292: yā devatā kṣāntivādino ṛṣer abhiprasannā sā kupitā;
V03vinv172u:293: tayā eṣā ītiḥ sṛṣṭā iti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:294: bhavantaḥ katham atra pratipattavyam iti; naimittikāḥ kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:296: balimālyopahāraṃ kṛtvā kṣamāpayitavyā sa ca ṛṣir iti;
V03vinv172u:304: tad yuṣmābhir ītivyupaśamārthaṃ śvo balimālyopahārasametair udyānaṃ gatvā tasyāḥ pūjā saṃvidhātavyā iti. (SBV II 10)
V03vinv172u:305: janakāyas tām eva rātriṃ balimālyopahāraṃ samudānīya tad udyānaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:307: tato janakāyena śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānāni datvā devatāsthāne ca mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā sā devatā kṣamitā;
V03vinv172u:308: tato rājā ṛṣeḥ kṣāntivādinaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā pādayor nipatya kṣamayitum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:309: kṣamasva me maharṣe yan mayā viṣayādhyavasitena krodhaparyākulīkṛtamatinā tavāparāddham iti;
V03vinv172u:311: kṣāntaṃ mahārāja; yathākathaṃ jñāyate? sa gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:312: gātreṣu vahasi śastraṃ maitrī me sarvasatveṣu /
V03vinv172u:313: yadi saṃśayo 'tra bhavatāṃ paśyata rudhiraṃ prasannaṃ me // iti;
V03vinv172u:315: pāpakarmakārī sa rājā prātihāryasandarśanenāpi na śraddhatte;
V03vinv172u:317: kṣamasva maharṣe; kṣāntaṃ mahārāja; yathākathaṃ jñāyate?
V03vinv172u:318: tato bodhisatvaḥ chinnāny aṅgapratyaṅgāni yathāsve sthāne sthāpayitvā satyopayācanayā gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:319: chidyamāneṣu gātreṣu tvayā rājan yathā na me /
V03vinv172u:320: āghāto 'sti susūkṣmo 'pi syān me kāyas tathā purā // iti;
V03vinv172u:321: tasya satyopayācanayā śarīraṃ yathāpuraṃ saṃvṛttam; tato rājā vismayotphullalocano gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:322: aho vratam idaṃ siddham aho dharmas svanuṣṭhitaḥ /
V03vinv172u:323: chidyamāneṣu gātreṣu yasya te nāsti vikriyā //
V03vinv172u:324: rājā kalabhūḥ sāntaḥpurāmātyapauranajānapadaḥ tasya ṛṣeḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ.
V03vinv172u:328: yo 'sau kalibhū rājā eṣa evāsau kauṇḍinyabhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:329: yan mayā tasyāntike maitracittam utpādya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam,
V03vinv172u:330: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenāsya ākāryākārya kleśān chedayeyam iti; (SBV II 11)
V03vinv172u:331: tatpraṇidhānavaśād etarhi tathāgatena asya ākāryākārya dharmo deśitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:333: pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:334: yadā bhagavatā aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi dharmarasena saṃgṛhya satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:335: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi dharmarasena saṃgṛhya satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:336: na bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'py adhvani mayaitāni aśītir vaṇiksahasrāṇi āmiṣeṇa saṃgṛhya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni; tac chrūyatām.
V03vinv172u:338: The story of the two merchants
V03vinv172u:339: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dvau sārthavāhau abhūvatāṃ viśvabhuk suyātraś ca;
V03vinv172u:343: tenaikākinā vīryam āsthāya anācāryeṇānupādhyāyakena saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān saṃmukhīkṛtya pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣākṛtā;
V03vinv172u:344: tasya te sārthikā sārthavāham apaśyantaḥ itaś cāmutaḥ ca samanveṣitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:345: yadā sarvathā nārāgayantas tadānīṃ viśvabhujaḥ sārthavāho 'navalokya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:351: tato viśvabhuk sārthavāha aśītyā vaṇiksahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ suyātraṃ sārthavāhaṃ samanveṣitum ārabdhaḥ udyānāvasathatapovaneṣu;
V03vinv172u:353: kasmāt tvaṃ sārtham apahāya pravrajita iti;
V03vinv172u:354: kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā na vācikī;
V03vinv172u:356: tena tāny aśītir vaṇiksahasrāṇi āmiṣopasaṃhāropasaṃhṛtāny uktāni:
V03vinv172u:357: asmai kārān kuruta; asmai kārāḥ kṛtā niyataṃ phaladāyakā bhavanti; taiḥ tasminn anekāḥ kārāḥ kṛtāḥ.
V03vinv172u:358: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo' sāv viśvabhuk sārthavāha aham eva (SBV II 12)
V03vinv172u:360: yāni vaṇiksahasrāṇy etāny eva tāny aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi;
V03vinv172u:361: tadāpy etāni mayāmiṣeṇopasaṃhṛtya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:362: etarhy apy etāni mayā saddharmarasenopasaṃhṛtya satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:363: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:364: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāḥ,
V03vinv172u:365: tadā bhikṣavaḥ [A_429b] saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:366: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya saddharmarasena saṃtarpitā iti;
V03vinv172u:369_0: āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:369_1: sarvajñena sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād
V03vinv172u:370_0: yat tu mayāpi atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:370_1: sārthavāhabhūtena paṃcakaiḥ kāntāramārge kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptāḥ salilaṃ vinā
V03vinv172u:370_2: prāṇair viyujyamānā devatāyācanaṃ kṛtvā māhendrā salilavarṣeṇa saṃtarpitāḥ; tac chrūyatām.
V03vinv172u:372: The story of the thirsty caravan
V03vinv172u:373: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ viśvabhuṅ nāma sārthavāhaḥ paṃcavaṇikśataiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvyavaharann alpasalilakāntāramārgaṃ pratipannaḥ anupūrveṇa vindhyāṭavīṃ saṃprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:376: paṃca tu vaṇijaḥ salilam alabhamānā atyarthaṃ kāhalībhūtāḥ;
V03vinv172u:377: viśvabhuk sārthavāhas tān tathāvidhān dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyād ākaṃpitahṛdayo ūrdhvamukho devatāyācanaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:378: śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ śivavaruṇakuberavāsavādyā devā yena satyena satyavacanena mama sarveṣu samapravṛttā dayā anena satyena satyavacanena māhendro devo varṣatu;
V03vinv172u:380: śakrasya devendrasyādhastāj jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:383: tena tathāvidhaṃ māhendraṃ varṣam utsṛṣṭaṃ enāsau vaṇiksārthaḥ saṃtarpitaḥ kāntāramārgaṃ samatikrāntaḥ. (SBV II 13)
V03vinv172u:385: yo 'sau viśvabhuk sārthavāhaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:386: ye te paṃca vaṇijaḥ salilavirahād atyarthaṃ kāhalībhūtā eta eva te paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ;
V03vinv172u:387: tadāpy ete mayā salilena saṃtarpya kāntāramārgād uttāritāḥ;
V03vinv172u:388: etarhy api mayā ete saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāritāḥ.
V03vinv172u:389: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ,
V03vinv172u:390: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:391: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ;
V03vinv172u:394_0: āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:394_1: sarvajñena sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād
V03vinv172u:395_0: yat tu mayāpi atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:395_1: sārthavāhabhūtena ete svajīvitaparityāgena mahāsamudrād uttārya ratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ; tac chrūyatām.
V03vinv172u:397: The story of the merchant Dhanaratha
V03vinv172u:402: te tasya sārthavāhasya anyonyakathālāpasaumukhyā anyonyakṛtapraṇayā saṃvṛttāḥ;
V03vinv172u:403: yāvad anupūrveṇa samudratīram anuprāptaiḥ pratyekaṃ vahanāni sajjīkṛtāni;
V03vinv172u:405: sārthavāha vayaṃ tvayā vinā dhṛtiṃ na labhāmahe; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:406: yady evam ihaivābhiruhataḥ vahanāni mucyantām iti; te tatrābhirūḍhāḥ,
V03vinv172u:408: bhavanto mā bibhīta; yadā vahanaṃ vināśam upaiti tadā mama kaṇṭhe lageta,
V03vinv172u:409: ahaṃ vo uttārayiṣyāmi iti; kuśalā bhavanti (SBV II 14)
V03vinv172u:421: yo 'sau dhanaratho nāma sārthavāha aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:422: ye te paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ tadāpy ete mayā mahāsamudrād uttārya ratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ;
V03vinv172u:423: etarhy apy mayā saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ.
V03vinv172u:426: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:427: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā ājñātakauṇḍinyena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena chatrīkṛtya parṣadaṃ niṣīdati?
V03vinv172u:429: kauṇḍinyena bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām.
V03vinv172u:431: The story of Saṃdhāna, the householder
V03vinv172u:433: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ saṃdhano nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasaty āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv172u:434: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:439: tad yeṣāṃ yuṣmākaṃ dvādaśavarṣikam annapānam asti tair madviṣaye vastavyam;
V03vinv172u:443: bhoḥ puruṣa asti koṣṭhāgāre dvādaśavārṣikam annapānam iti; sa kathayati: ārya (SBV II 15)
V03vinv172u:448: mahad durbhikṣaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ kṛcchraḥ kāntāraḥ durlabhaḥ piṇḍako yācanakena;
V03vinv172u:449: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakā prāntāśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;
V03vinv172u:450: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nātidūre anyatamasminn āśramapade paṃca pratyekabuddhaśatāni prativasanti;
V03vinv172u:451: yadā durbhikṣakālamṛtyubhayabhīto janakāyaḥ samantād vidrutaḥ tadā teṣāṃ piṇḍakā samucchinnāḥ;
V03vinv172u:452: te sarva eva saṃbhūya saṃdhanasya gṛhapates sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ kathayanti: gṛhapate,
V03vinv172u:453: asmākaṃ paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānām piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kuruṣva iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:454: koṣṭhāgārkaṃ tāvad avalokayāmi iti; sa koṣṭhāgārikam āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:455: asti bhoḥ puruṣa asmākaṃ koṣṭhāgāre annapānam yad asmākaṃ syād eṣāṃ ca paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānāṃ dvādaśavarṣāṇi iti;
V03vinv172u:457: saṃdhānena gṛhapatinā paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānāṃ piṇḍaka upanibaddha iti;
V03vinv172u:458: śrutvā aparāṇi paṃca pratyekabuddhaśatāni saṃdhānasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāni;
V03vinv172u:460: gṛhapate asmākaṃ paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānāṃ piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kuruṣva iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:461: āryakā dattam eva yuṣmākaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ prārthayata iti;
V03vinv172u:462: te kathayanti gṛhapate anye te vayam anye iti;
V03vinv172u:464: yady evaṃ koṣṭhāgārikaṃ tāvad avalokayāmi iti; sa koṣṭhāgārikaṃ puruṣam āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:465: bhoḥ puruṣa asti asmākaṃ koṣṭhāgāre annapānaṃ yad asmākaṃ syād asya ca pravrajitasahasrasya dvādaśavarṣāṇi iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:466: bhaviṣyati iti; tena te pratyekabuddhā uktā:
V03vinv172u:467: āryakā tiṣṭhata; ko yuṣmākaṃ bhaktakāla iti; te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:469: tataḥ saṃdhānena gṛhapatinā dānaśālā māpitā dānādhisthāyikaḥ puruṣaḥ sthāpitaḥ kālārocakaś ca;
V03vinv172u:471: tasya pratyekabuddhasahasrasya yaḥ saṃghasthaviraḥ so 'tīva prāsādikaḥ chatrākāraśirās tāṃ parṣadaṃ chatrīkṛtyāvatiṣṭhate;
V03vinv172u:472: saṃdhānasya gṛhapater duhitā tasya saṃghasthavirasya (SBV II 16)
V03vinv172u:474: yāvad apareṇa samayena bhaktakāle devo varṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:475: tataḥ tayā dārikayā saṃghasthavirasya mūrdhni chatraṃ dhāritam;
V03vinv172u:476: bhuktasya ca pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam:
V03vinv172u:477: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syāṃ yādṛśo 'yam āryaḥ yathā cāyaṃ chatrīkṛtya parṣadi niṣaṇṇaḥ evam aham api chatrīkṛtya parṣadaṃ niṣīdeyam iti.
V03vinv172u:479: yāsau saṃdhānasdya gṛhapater duhitā eṣa evāsau [A_431a] kauṇḍinyo bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:480: yad anena kumārikābhūtena pratyekabuddhasaṃghasthavirasya chatraṃ vidhārya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syāṃ chatrīkṛtya ca parṣadaṃ niṣīdeyam iti,
V03vinv172u:481: tad etarhi sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ chatrīkṛtya ca parṣadam avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:482: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:483: yadā bhagavatā ājñātakauṇḍinyam āgamya aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāni tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:484: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmantam ājñātakauṇḍinyam āgamya aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāni; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:485_0: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena
V03vinv172u:485_2: sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena ājñātakauṇḍinyam āgamya aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi
V03vinv172u:486_0: yat tu mayātīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
V03vinv172u:486_1: vinipatitaśarīreṇa tiryagyonāv upapannena aśitikīṭasahasrāṇi kauṇḍinyaṃ kīṭikībhūtam
V03vinv172u:492: aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvo mahāsamudre kacchapeṣūpapannas teṣām adhipatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:493: yāvat paṃcavaṇikśatāni mahāsamudrayānapātraṃ pratipadya mahāsamudram (SBV II 17)
V03vinv172u:496: yāvad vahanaṃ makareṇa matsyajātenānayena vyasanam āpāditam;
V03vinv172u:500: alaṃ bhavatāṃ viṣādena mama pṛṣṭham abhiruheta ahaṃ vas tārayiṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:504: sa śrāntakāyaḥ teṣu saṃkīrṇeṣu grīvām abhiprasārya suptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:506: tasmād ekā kīṭikā paribhramantī gandhaṃ ghrātvā tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntā;
V03vinv172u:507: tatas taṃ mahatpramāṇākāravikāraṃ dṛṣṭvā tvaritagatipracārikī kīṭikānagaram abhigatā;
V03vinv172u:508: svasvasaṃjñayā kīṭikāḥ prabodhya aśītiḥ kīṭikāsahasrāṇy ādāya kacchapasakāśaṃ gatā;
V03vinv172u:509: tataḥ taṃ suotaṃ mṛtam iva niśceṣṭaprāṇaṃ bhakṣayitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:510: yadāsya sthūlaṃ māṃsaṃ bhakṣayanti śramanaparikhinno gāḍhamiddhāvaṣṭabdho na cetayate;
V03vinv172u:511: yadā tu marmasthāneṣu māṃsaṃ bhakṣayanti tadā prabuddhaḥ paśyati kīṭikābhiḥ sarvaṃ śarīram ākīrṇam; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:512: yadi kāyaṃ calayiṣye [A_431b] vā saṃparivartayiṣye vā niyatam etāḥ praghātayiṣyāmi;
V03vinv172u:514: iti viditvā chidyamāneṣu marmasu mucyamāneṣu saṃdhiṣu praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:515: yathā mayā etāni aśītir kīṭikāsahasrāṇi māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpitāni,
V03vinv172u:516: tāny evam aham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya saddharmarasena saṃtarpayeyam iti.
V03vinv172u:518: yo 'sau kīṭikānāṃ mārgoddeśika eṣa evāsau kauṇḍinyo bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:519: yāni tāni aśītir kīṭikāsahasrāṇi tam āgamya māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpitāni,
V03vinv172u:522: etarhy apy etāni mayā saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāni;
V03vinv172u:523: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānām iti yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:524: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā (SBV II 18)
V03vinv172u:525: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:526: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:527_0: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena
V03vinv172u:527_2: sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya
V03vinv172u:528_0: yat tu mayātīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair
V03vinv172u:528_1: ete svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ; tac chrūyatām.
V03vinv172u:530: The story of the king Vajrabāhu
V03vinv172u:531: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ vajrabāhur nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:532: sa rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca mahati tyāge vartate;
V03vinv172u:537: bhavanto vārāṇasyāṃ caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu dānaśālā māpayitvā śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavaṇīpakādhvagayācanakebhyo yo yenārthī tasmai tad anuprayacchata iti;
V03vinv172u:538_0: evaṃ deva ity amātyā rajño vajrabāhor pratiśutya vārāṇasyāṃ caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu
V03vinv172u:539: yāvad apareṇa [A_432a] samayena vaiśravaṇena rājñā aḍakavattāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ paṃca yakṣā ojohārā nirvāsitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:540: itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramanto vārāṇasīm anuprāptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:541: te gopālakān paśupālakān tṛṇahārakān kāṣṭhahārakān pathājīvān utpathājīvāṃś ca manuṣyān dṛṣṭvā kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:542: bhavanto na yūyam asmān bibhīta? (SBV II 19)
V03vinv172u:544: bhavantaḥ kimarthaṃ bibhīmaḥ yeṣām asmākaṃ rājā maitryātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sarvasatvahitādhyāśayena trir divasasya maitrīṃ samāpadyate?
V03vinv172u:546_0: tataḥ te brāhmaṇaveṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya vārāṇasyām caturṣu dvāreṣu dānaśālāṃ pratyavekṣya
V03vinv172u:546_1: vajrabāhuṃ rājānaṃ maitryā vyutthitaṃ jñātvā vinītaveṣadhāriṇo rajñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:547: upasaṃkramya jayenāyuṣā ca rājānaṃ vardhayitvā ūcuḥ:
V03vinv172u:548: deva bubhukṣitāḥ smāhāreṇa anugrahaṃ kuruṣva iti; rājñā amātyān āhūyoktāḥ:
V03vinv172u:549: bhavanta etān brāhmaṇān praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpayata iti; te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:553: saṃbhavo 'sti rudhirasya vā vīthyā dharmanyāyalabdhaṃ rudhiraṃ prayacchata iti; te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:555: sadyohatena māṃsarudhireṇānugrahaṃ kuruṣva iti; rājā saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:556: kutaḥ sadyohatasya māṃsarudhirasya saṃbhavaḥ parasya pīḍām akṛtvā?
V03vinv172u:557: yanv aham ebhyaḥ svarudhiram anuprayaccheyam iti; tato vaidyān āhūya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:558: bhavanto mama sarvāṅgikaṃ śirāvedhaṃ kuruta; yācanakajanaṃ saṃtarpayiṣyāmi iti; vaidyāḥ kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:559: na vayaṃ prākṛtapuruṣāṇām arthāya devasya śarīre śastraṃ nipātayāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:560: kuśalāḥ bhavanti bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
V03vinv172u:561: tena svayam eva paṃcasu gātreṣu śastranipātaḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:562: tataḥ svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya teṣāṃ tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtvā yāṃ śrutvā te yakṣāḥ paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ.
V03vinv172u:564: yo 'sau vajrabāhur nāma rājā aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:565: ye amī paṃca yakṣā ojohārās te evāmī paṃca bhikṣavaḥ;
V03vinv172u:566: tadāpy ete svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ>
V03vinv172u:568: etarhy apy ete mayā saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā.
V03vinv172u:569_0: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe
V03vinv172u:569_1: yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitās tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ
V03vinv172u:570: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena (SBV II 20)
V03vinv172u:571: saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:572_0: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa yāvat sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena
V03vinv172u:572_1: paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme
V03vinv172u:573: yat tu mayātīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa pūrvavat duḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ ete svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ; tac chrūyatām.
V03vinv172u:576: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ maitrabalo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad bahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:578: [A_432b] yāvad apareṇa samayena vaiśravaṇena rājñā aḍakavattāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ paṃca ojohārā yakṣāḥ kasmiṇcid eva aparādhe pravāsitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:579: te taṃ janapadam anvāhiṇḍya vārāṇasīm anuprāptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:584: deva vārāṇasyām atīva janakāyo mṛta iti; rājñā teṣām ājñā dattā:
V03vinv172u:588: tad yuṣmābhir api sarvasatvānugatā maitrī manasi kartavyā;
V03vinv172u:590: te sarvasatvānugatāṃ maitrīṃ manasi kartum ārabdhā;
V03vinv172u:593: te praveśam alabhamānā gopālakāṃ paśupālakān tṛṇahārakāṃ kāṣṭhahārakāṃ pathājīvān utpathājīvāṃś ca manuṣyān dṛṣṭvā kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:595: iti; te kathayanti: na bibhīmaḥ; kiṃ kāraṇaṃ?
V03vinv172u:596: vayaṃ hi yad rājā maitrabalaś cintayati tac cintayāmaḥ; kiṃ maitrabalo rājā cintayati?
V03vinv172u:598: idam atra kāraṇaṃ yena vayam idānīm avatāraṃ na labhāmaha iti; te vārāṇasyāṃ dvāreṇa (SBV II 21)
V03vinv172u:601: yāvad apareṇa samayena maitrabalo rājā bahir udyānāya saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:602: tatas te brāhmaṇaveṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya śānteryāpathena rājānam upasaṃkramya jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvocuḥ:
V03vinv172u:603: deva bubhukṣitā sma; āhāreṇānugrahaṃ kuruṣva iti; rājñā amātyā āhūyoktāḥ:
V03vinv172u:604: bhavanta etān brāhmaṇān praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpayata; te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:605: deva māṃsarudhirabhakṣā vayam iti; rājñā amātyā abhihitāḥ:
V03vinv172u:608: saṃbhavo 'sti rudhirasya vā vithyā dharmanyāyalabdhaṃ māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ ca prayacchata iti;
V03vinv172u:609: deva sadyohatarudhiramāṃsabhakṣā vayaṃ sadyohatena māṃsenānugrahaṃ kuruṣva iti; rājā saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:610: kutas sadyohatasya māṃsarudhirasya saṃbhavaḥ parasyapīḍām akṛtvā;
V03vinv172u:611: yanv aham ebhyaḥ svarudhiram anuprayaccheyam iti;
V03vinv172u:613: bhavanto mama sarvāṅgikaṃ śirāvedhaṃ kuruta iti yācanakajanaṃ saṃtarpayiṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:615: deva na vayaṃ prākṛtapuruṣāṇām arthāya devasya śarīre śastraṃ nipātayāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:616: kuśalā bhavanti bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
V03vinv172u:617: tena svayam eva paṃcasu gātreṣu śāstranipātaḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:618: tataḥ svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya teṣāṃ tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā te yakṣā paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ.
V03vinv172u:620: yo 'sau maitrabalo nāma rājā 'bhūd aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:621: ye te paṃca ojohārās yakṣā [A_433a] ete eva te paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ;
V03vinv172u:622: tadāpy ete mayā svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:623: etarhy apy ete mayā saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā.
V03vinv172u:624: yadā bhagavatā ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaraṃ caritam; anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,
V03vinv172u:628: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:629: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaraṃ caritam; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:630: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām. (SBV II 22)
V03vinv172u:632: The story of Nandapāla the Potter (= Ghaṭīkarasutta, MN 81, cf. MV I 319ff.)
V03vinv172u:633: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vaibhiḍiṅgī nāma grāmanigamo 'bhūd ṛddhaś ca sphītaś ca bahujanamanuṣyaś ca;
V03vinv172u:634: vaibhiḍiṅgyāṃ bhikṣavo grāmanigame nyagrodho nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati,
V03vinv172u:636: vaibhiḍiṅgīṃ paribhuṃkte sotsadāṃ satṛṇakāṣṭhodakāṃ kṛkinā rājñā brahmadeyāṃ dattām;
V03vinv172u:637_0: nyagrodhasya khalu bhikṣavo brāhmaṇamahaśālasya uttaro nāmo māṇavo 'ntevāsī upeto
V03vinv172u:637_1: mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ saṃśuddho gṛhiṇyām anākṣipto jātivādena gotravādena ca yāvad āsaptamaṃ
V03vinv172u:638: adhyāpako mantradharo trayāṇāṃ vedānāṃ pāraṃgataḥ sanighaṇṭukaiṭabhānāṃ sākṣaraprabhedānām itihāsapaṃcamānāṃ sādṛśo vyākarakaḥ,
V03vinv172u:640: nyagrodhasya brāhmaṇamahaśālasya paṃcamātrāṇi māṇavakaśatāni brāhmaṇakān mantrān vācayanti;
V03vinv172u:641: vaibhiḍiṅgyāṃ bhikṣavo grāmanigame nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:643: buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dhammaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:645: buddhe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso dharme saṃghe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:646: duḥkhe samudaye nirodhe mārge niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso dṛṣṭasatya āgataphalābhisamitavāṃ nikṣiptaparṇamusalo na svahastaṃ pṛthivīṃ khanati na khānayati; nānyatra,
V03vinv172u:647: yat tad bhavati dakaprarugnaṃ vā mūṣikotkirā vā tataḥ kāyena mṛttikāṃ saṃhṛtya niṣprāṇakenodakena tīmayitvā bhājanāni kṛtvā ekāntam upanikṣipya evam āha:
V03vinv172u:648: eta āryā eta bhadramukhā tilān vā taṇḍulān vā mudgaprabhṛtīn vā māṣaprabhṛtīn vā ekānta upanikṣipya yo vā yena bhājanenārthī sa tad ādāya prakrāmatu iti;
V03vinv172u:652: uttarasya māṇavasya mitraṃ suhṛd vayasyako ca nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:653: upasaṃkramya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:654: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ [A_433b] nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaraṃ kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv172u:655: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv172u:656: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:657: tena khalu samayena uttaro māṇavaḥ sarvaśvetaṃ vaḍavāratham abhiruhya sauvarṇena daṇḍakamaṇḍalunā dhāryamānena māṇavakagaṇaparivṛto māṇavakagaṇapuraskṛto vaibhiḍiṅgyān niryāti;
V03vinv172u:658: bahir vaibhiḍiṅgyāḥ brāhmaṇakān mantrān vācayitukāmaḥ adrākṣīd uttaro māṇavo nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaraṃ dūrād eva;
V03vinv172u:660: kutas tvaṃ somya nandīpāla etarhy āgacchasi?
V03vinv172u:661: ito 'haṃ somya uttara etarhy āgacchāmi kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paryupāsya;
V03vinv172u:664: alaṃ somya nandīpāla kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena dṛṣṭenālaṃ paryupāsitena;
V03vinv172u:668: mā tvaṃ somya uttara evaṃ vada:
V03vinv172u:669: kutas tasmin śramaṇake bodhiḥ; bodhir hi paramaduṣkarā; api tu buddhaḥ sa bhagavān,
V03vinv172u:671: dvir api trir api nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ uttaraṃ māṇavakam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:674: dvir api trir api uttaro māṇavo nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaram idam avoat:
V03vinv172u:675: alaṃ somya nandīpāla kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena dṛṣṭena alaṃ paryupāsitena; tat kasya hetoḥ?
V03vinv172u:678: mā tvaṃ somyottara evaṃ vada kutas tasmin muṇḍake śramaṇake bodhiḥ;
V03vinv172u:682: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkara uttarasya māṇavasya ratham abhiruhya uttaraṃ māṇavam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:688: yatredaṇīṃ nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro dīrgharātram acaṇḍo 'rabhaso 'karkaśa 'sāhasikaḥ keśagrahaṇam apy agamad iti viditvā nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaram idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:689: somya nandīpāla ato 'pi yāvat; somya uttara,
V03vinv172u:690: ato 'pi yāvat; ato 'pi yāvat somya nandīpāla; ato 'pi yāvat,
V03vinv172u:691: somya uttara; tena hi somya nandīpāla muṃca,
V03vinv172u:694: athottaro māṇavo nandīpālaś ca ghaṭīkaraḥ ratham abhiruhya yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:695: tayor yāvatī yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena gatvā yānād avatīrya yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:696: upasaṃkramya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau;
V03vinv172u:697: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:698: ayaṃ bhadanta uttaro [A_434a] māṇavo na buddhe 'bhiprasanno na dharme na saṃghe 'bhiprasannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:699: sādhv asya bhagavān tathā dharmaṃ deśayed yathā uttaro māṇavo buddhe 'bhiprasīded dharme saṃghe 'bhiprasīded iti;
V03vinv172u:700: adhivāsayati kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddha uttaraṃ māṇavaṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv172u:701: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv172u:702: athottaro māṇavo nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaram idam avocat: kasmāt tvaṃ,
V03vinv172u:704: svākhyātaṃ dharmavinayaṃ śrutvā na pravrajasi samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anāgārikām?
V03vinv172u:705: na tvaṃ, somya kumāra, jānīṣe yathāham andhaṃ mātāpitaraṃ bibharmi,
V03vinv172u:706: kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kālena ca kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādayāmi;
V03vinv172u:707: pravraja tvaṃ somya nandīpāla mā vā;
V03vinv172u:709: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:710: ayaṃ bhadanta uttaro māṇava ākāṃkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
V03vinv172u:711: taṃ bhagavān pravrājayatūpasaṃpādayatu anukaṃpām upādāya iti;
V03vinv172u:714: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:715_0: atha kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaś aciraprakrāntaṃ nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaraṃ viditvā uttaraṃ
V03vinv172u:715_1: māṇavaṃ pravrājya upasaṃpādya yathābhiramyaṃ vaibhiḍiṃgyāṃ vihṛtya yena vārāṇasī
V03vinv172u:718: aśrauṣīt kṛkī rājā kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kāśiṣu janapade cārikāṃ caran vārāṇasīm anuprāpto vārāṇasyāṃ viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve iti;
V03vinv172u:719: śrutvā ca punar vārāṇasyāḥ niṣkramya yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:720: upasaṃkramya upasaṃkramya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau;
V03vinv172u:721: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ kṛkiṃ rājānaṃ kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv172u:722: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv172u:723: atha kṛkī rājā utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya kāśyapam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:724: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena iti;
V03vinv172u:725: adhivāsayati kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kṛkino rājñas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
V03vinv172u:726: atha kṛkī rājā kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā kāsyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:727_0: atha kṛkī rājā tām eva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyam
V03vinv172u:727_1: evotthāyāsanakāni prajñapya udakamaṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpya [A_434b] kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya
V03vinv172u:728: samayo bhadanta sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate iti;
V03vinv172u:729: atha kāsyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena kṛkeḥ rājño bhaktābhisāras tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:730: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:731: atha kṛkī rājā sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati;
V03vinv172u:732_0: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya
V03vinv172u:732_1: kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ sauvarṇaṃ
V03vinv172u:734: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena;
V03vinv172u:737: anena caivaṃrūpena parṇopagūḍhena śālinā bhagavantaṃ upasthāsyāmi bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:738: alaṃ mahārājā kṛtam etāvad yāvad eva cittam abhiprasannam;
V03vinv172u:739: dvir api trir api kṛkī rājā kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:740: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena;
V03vinv172u:743: anena caivaṃrūpena parṇopagūḍhena śālinā bhagavantaṃ upasthāsyāmi bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:744: dvir api trir api kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ kṛkiṃ rājānam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:745: alaṃ mahārājā kṛtam etāvad yāvad eva cittam abhiprasannam;
V03vinv172u:746: atha kṛkī rājā kāśyapaṃ saṃyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:747: asti kaścid bhagavan yo 'py evaṃrūpa upasthāyakaḥ tadyathā aham etarhy?
V03vinv172u:748: asti mahārāja tavaiva vijite vaibhiḍiṃgī nāma grāmanigamaḥ;
V03vinv172u:751: buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dhammaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:753_0: buddhe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso dharme saṃghe duḥkhe samudaye nirodhe mārge niṣkāṃkṣo
V03vinv172u:753_1: nirvicikitso dṛṣṭasatye āgataphalo 'bhisamitavāṃ nikṣiptaparṇamusalaḥ sa na svahastaṃ
V03vinv172u:754: yat tad bhavati dakaprarugnaṃ vā mūṣikotkirā vā tataḥ kāyena mṛttikāṃ saṃhṛtya niṣprāṇakenodakena tīmayitvā bhājanāni kṛtvaikāntam upanikṣipyaivam āha:
V03vinv172u:755: eta āryā eta bhadramukhā tilān vā taṇḍulān vā mudgaprabhṛtīn vā māṣaprabhṛtīn vā ekānta upanikṣipya yo vā yena bhājanenārthī bhavati sa tad ādāya prakrāmatu;
V03vinv172u:757: māṃ ca kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādayati; (SBV II 27)
V03vinv172u:758: ekam ahaṃ mahārāja samayaṃ vaibhiḍiṃgīṃ grāmanigamam upaniśritya viharāmi;
V03vinv172u:759: so 'haṃ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya vaibhiḍiṃgīṃ grāmanigamaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣam;
V03vinv172u:760: [A_435a] sāvādānaṃ vaibhiḍaṃgīṃ piṇḍāya caran yena ghaṭīkarasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:762: tena khalu samayena nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ bahir nirgato 'bhūt kenacid eva karaṇīyena;
V03vinv172u:765: ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukhaḥ śanair mandamandam argaḍam ākoṭayati?
V03vinv172u:767: ahaṃ kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ piṇḍakenārthī; tāv evam āhatuḥ:
V03vinv172u:768: praviśatu āryaḥ praviśatu bhadramukha ete kuṇḍālikāyāṃ kulmāṣāḥ piṭhirikāyāṃ ca sūpikam;
V03vinv172u:771: so 'haṃ mahārāja uttarakauravaṃ samayam adhiṣṭhāya svayam eva kuṇḍalikāyāḥ kulmāṣān piṭhirikāyāś ca sūpikaṃ gṛhītvā bhuktavān;
V03vinv172u:773: adrākṣīn nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kuṇḍalikāyāṃ kulmāṣān piṭhirikāyāṃ ca sūpikaṃ paribhuktam;
V03vinv172u:774: dṛṣṭvā ca punar andhau mātāpitarāv idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:775: amba tāta kenaite kuṇḍalikāyāṃ kulmāṣāḥ piṭhirikāyāṃ
V03vinv172u:776: ca sūpikaṃ paribhuktam; tāv evam āhatuḥ:
V03vinv172u:777: iha te somya nandīpāla aciranirgatasyāśrauṣva argaḍakasyākoṭanaśabdam;
V03vinv172u:779: ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukhaḥ śanair mandamandam argaḍam ākoṭayati?
V03vinv172u:781: ahaṃ kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ piṇḍakenārthī; tam enam evaṃ vadāvaḥ:
V03vinv172u:786: tena te kuṇḍālikāyāṃ kulmāṣāḥ piṭhirikāyāṃ ca sūpikaṃ paribhuktaṃ bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv172u:788_0: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kule 'tyarthaṃ viśvasto viśvāsam
V03vinv172u:788_1: āpannaḥ iti viditvā tenaiva prītiprāmodyena saptāham ekaparyaṃkenātināmayati ardhamāsaṃ
V03vinv172u:788_2: cāsya satatasahagatā smṛtiḥ kāyaṃ na vijahāti;
V03vinv172u:790: saptāhaṃ mātāpitroḥ yathā kuṇḍālikāyāḥ kulmāṣam. piṭhirikāyaś ca sūpikam evaṃ kuṇḍikāyā odanaṃ piṭhirikāyāś ca sūpikam;
V03vinv172u:792: samayaṃ vaibhiḍiṃgīṃ grāmanigamam upaniśritya ahaṃ varṣā upagataḥ;
V03vinv172u:794: tena khalu samayena nandīpālasya ghaṭīkārasyāveśanaśālā navatṛṇapraticchannā 'bhūt;
V03vinv172u:796: gacchata yūyaṃ bhikṣavo nandīpālasya ghaṭīkārasyāveśanaśālāṃ navatṛṇapraticchannām avacchādya mama vihāraṃ chādayata;
V03vinv172u:797: te mama om iti pratiśrutya nandīpālasya ghaṭīkārasya navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādayanti;
V03vinv172u:798: tena khalu samayena nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro bahirnirgato 'bhūt kenacid eva karaṇīyena;
V03vinv172u:799: aśrauṣṭāṃ nandīpālasya [A_435b] ghaṭīkarasyāndhau mātāpitarāv āveśanaśālāyām avacchādanaśabdaṃ;
V03vinv172u:801: ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukho nandīpālasya ghaṭīkarasya navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādayati?
V03vinv172u:802: te evam āhur vayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyopasthāyikāḥ;
V03vinv172u:803: kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tatprathamavarṣiṇā devena vihāro vṛṣyate;
V03vinv172u:804: te vayaṃ nandīpālasya ghaṭīkārasya navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya vihāraṃ praticchādayāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:805: tāv evam āhatuḥ harata āryā harata bhadramukhā bahirnirgato vaḥ upasthāyakaḥ;
V03vinv172u:806: tais tām avacchādya mama vihāraḥ praticchāditaḥ;
V03vinv172u:807: paścād āgato nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro 'drākṣīn navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchāditāṃ;
V03vinv172u:808: dṛṣṭvā ca punar andhau mātāpitarāv idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:809: amba tāta kenaiṣā navatṛṇapraticchannā āveśanaśālā avacchāditā; tāv evam āhatuḥ:
V03vinv172u:810: iha te somya nandīpāla aciranirgatasya aśrauṣva navatṛṇapraticchannāyā āveśanaśālāyā avacchādanaśabdam;
V03vinv172u:811: śrutvā ca punar evaṃ vadāvaḥ ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukho navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādayati?
V03vinv172u:812: te evam āhur vayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyopasthāyikāḥ;
V03vinv172u:813: kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tatprathamavarṣiṇā devena vihāro vṛṣyate;
V03vinv172u:814: te vayaṃ nandīpālasya ghaṭīkarasya navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya vihāraṃ praticchādayāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:815: tān āvām evaṃ vadāvaḥ harata āryā harata bhadramukhā bahirnirgato vaḥ upasthāyakaḥ;
V03vinv172u:818: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kule 'tyarthaṃ viśvasto viśvāsam (SBV II 29)
V03vinv172u:819: āpannaḥ iti viditvā tenaiva prītiprāmodyena saptāham ekaparyaṃkenātināmayati ardhamāsaṃ cāsya satatasamitā smṛtiḥ kāyaṃ na jahāti;
V03vinv172u:821: saptāhaṃ mātāpitroḥ taṃ khalu varṣāvāsaṃ nandīpālasya ghaṭīkarasyāveśanaśālā ekavāribindunāpi nābhivṛṣṭā;
V03vinv172u:822: yathāpitad buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena.
V03vinv172u:823: syāt khalu te mahārāja cetaso 'nyathātvam nādhivāsayati me kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān?
V03vinv172u:824: na tv eva nandīpālasya ghaṭīkarasya navatṛṇapraticchannāyām āveśanaśālāyām avacchāditāyāṃ cetaso 'nyathātvaṃ;
V03vinv172u:825: lābhā bhadanta nandīpālena ghaṭīkareṇa sulabdhā yasyāsya bhagavān kule 'tyarthaṃ viśvasto viśvāsam āpannaḥ.
V03vinv172u:826: atha kāsyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kṛkeḥ rājñas taddānam anayābhyanumodanayābhyanumodate;
V03vinv172u:828: rājā mukhaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ nadīnāṃ sāgaro mukham //
V03vinv172u:829: nakṣatrāṇāṃ mukhaṃ candra ādityas tapatāṃ mukham /
V03vinv172u:830: ūrdhvaṃ tiryag adhaś cāpi yāvatī jagato gatiḥ /
V03vinv172u:832: atha kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kṛkiṇaṃ rājānaṃ dharmyayā kathayā [A_436a] saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:833: atha kṛkī rājā aciraprakrāntaṃ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yatrotsadanadharmakaṃ tat sarvaṃ visarjanadharmakam iti kṛtvā kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:834_0: atha kṛkī rājā kāsyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yāvat tāvat pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhya
V03vinv172u:834_1: kāśyapasya pādau śirasā vanditvā kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ trir pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tata eva pratinivṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:835: atha kṛkī rājā aciraprakrāntaṃ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ viditvā anyatamaṃ puruṣam āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:836: ehi tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni pūrayitvā yena nandīpālo ghaṭīkaras tenopasaṃkrāma;
V03vinv172u:839: imāni te somya nandīpāla kṛkiṇā rājñā paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni parṇopagūḍhasya śāler anupreṣitāni;
V03vinv172u:840: atas tvam ātmānaṃ samyak sukhena prīṇaya andhaṃ ca mātāpitaram;
V03vinv172u:841: kāśyapaṃ ca samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya;
V03vinv172u:842: evaṃ deva iti sa puruṣaḥ kṛke rajñaḥ pratiśrutya parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni pūrayitvā yena nandīpālp ghaṭīkaras tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:844: imāni te somya nandīpāla kṛkiṇā rājñā parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāny anupreṣitāni;
V03vinv172u:845: atas tvam ātmānaṃ samyak sukhena prīṇaya andhaṃ ca mātāpitaram;
V03vinv172u:846: kāśyapaṃ ca samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya;
V03vinv172u:847: bhoḥ puruṣa rājā bahukṛtyo bahukaraṇīya ity uktvā nādhivāsayati.
V03vinv172u:849: yo 'sau uttaro māṇavaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:850: yan mayā kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe kharaṃ vākkarma niścaritaṃ:
V03vinv172u:853: tasya karmaṇo vipākena etarhi mayā ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaraṃ caritaṃ;
V03vinv172u:854: yadi punar bodhir apavaditābhaviṣyat punar api mayā triṇi kalpāsaṃkhyeyāni ātmabodhinimittaṃ parikhedito 'bhaviṣyam;
V03vinv172u:855: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:859: yam eva divasaṃ bodhisatvo nirgatas tam eva divasaṃ yaśodharā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:860: yadā bodhisatvo duṣkarāṇi carati tadāntaḥpuram api duṣkaraṃ caritum ārabdhaṃ;
V03vinv172u:862: yadā bhagavān niṣkiṃcanaṃ duṣkaram iti viditvā yathāsukham āśvasiti;
V03vinv172u:865: sarpistailābhyāṃ gātrāṇi mrakṣayati sukhodakena ca kāyaṃ pariṣiṃcati;
V03vinv172u:870: sukhodakena ca kāyaṃ pariṣiṃcati; tadāsau garbhaḥ punar api puṣṭiṃ gataḥ tasyā (SBV II 31)
V03vinv172u:871: garbhanimittāni prādurbhūtāni; sā śākyaiḥ saparihāsam ucyate:
V03vinv172u:872: tvaṃ bodhisatve tapovanaṃ gate vyabhicaritā iti; sā kathayati: śāntaṃ pāpaṃ,
V03vinv172u:875: dārako jātaḥ; yam eva divasaṃ jātaḥ,
V03vinv172u:876: tam eva divasaṃ rāhuṇā candro gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:877: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ [A_436b] vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv172u:880: asya janmani rāhuṇā candro gṛhītaḥ tad bhavatu dārakasya rāhula iti nāma iti;
V03vinv172u:881: jāte kumāre bhūyasyā mātrayā śākyā vibruvate eva;
V03vinv172u:882: tayāsau satyopayācanaṃ kṛtvā rāhulabhadro bodhisatvasya vyāyāmaśilāyāṃ sthāpayitvā krīḍāpuṣkariṇyām āplāvitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:883: yady ayaṃ bodhisatvena jātaḥ plavatām iti; plavitum ārabdhaḥ; sā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:884: pārād apāram āgacchatu iti; sa pārād apāram āgataḥ; te vismayam āpannāḥ; yaśodharā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:885: bhūyo 'pi bhavatāṃ pratyakṣīkariṣyāmi yathāyaṃ bodhisatvena jātaḥ,
V03vinv172u:887: yadā bhagavān atikrāntaḥ ṣaḍvarṣāṇy abhisaṃbuddhaḥ kapilavastv anuprāptaḥ ekaṃ divasaṃ rājakule bhuṃkte,
V03vinv172u:888: ekam antaḥpure; tadā yaśodharāyā etad abhavat:
V03vinv172u:889: ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yenāhaṃ bhagavantam anvāvarteyam it;
V03vinv172u:890: kapilavastuni cānyatamā parivrājikā vaśīkaraṇādikarmasv atyarthaṃ pravīṇā;
V03vinv172u:892: ārye kārṣāpaṇair vaśīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā preṣaya iti;
V03vinv172u:894: yaśodharayā rāhulasya haste datta uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:895: putra yas tava pitā tasmai anuprayaccha iti;
V03vinv172u:896: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:901: rāhulena sarvān buddhān pratyavekṣya bhagavato vṛddhānte sthitasya dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:905: rāhulabhadraḥ kumāro bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhaḥ nirvartyamāno 'pi na nirvartate:
V03vinv172u:908: na śakyam anena gṛhavāse vastum (SBV II 32)
V03vinv172u:910: rāhulena bhagavataḥ pratyabhijñātena kṛtena rājā śuddhodanaḥ sāntaḥpurajanaḥ śākyāś ca paraṃ vismayam upagatāḥ yaśodharāyāṃ cātyartham abhiprasannāḥ;
V03vinv172u:916: yadi rāhulabhadraḥ kumāro 'vaśyaṃ pravrājyate adyaikaṃ divasaṃ tiṣṭhatu yāvad aham asya pūjāṃ karomi iti;
V03vinv172u:917: rājñā śuddhodanena rāhulasya mahān utsavaḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:921: evaṃ bhadanta ity āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya rāhulabhadraḥ kumāraḥ pravrājitaḥ.
V03vinv172u:922: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:923: paśya bhadantāyuṣmatā rāhulena bhagavān modakena mahājanakāyasya madhye vijñāta iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:924: na bhikṣava etarhyi yathātīte 'py adhvani aham anena rāhulena mālayā vijñātaḥ; tac chrūyatām.
V03vinv172u:926: The story of the great thief
V03vinv172u:927: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo anyatarasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:929: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:930: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ [A_437a] putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:933: gacchāmi paṇyam ādāya mahāsamudram avatarāmi iti; sā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:937: tatas tasya patnyā śokavinodanaṃ kṛtvā sa dārako hastabalena jñātibalena cāpyāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:940: sā tasya svaśilpād bhogasaṃpattiṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:942: tasmin gate anayena vyasanam āpadyante iti;
V03vinv172u:944: bhrāta imam api bhāgineyaṃ kuvindakarma śikṣayeti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:950: sa kuvindaḥ susnātaḥ suprāvṛtaḥ praṇītam āhāraṃ bhuṃkte;
V03vinv172u:952: mātula tvam api tad eva karma karoṣi;
V03vinv172u:954: atha kasmāt tvaṃ susnātaḥ suprāvṛtaḥ praṇītam āhāraṃ bhuṃkṣe;
V03vinv172u:955: mama tu na saṃpadyate iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:957: divā kuvindatvaṃ rātrau cauryam iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:958: mātula yady evam aham api cauryaṃ karomi; bhāgineya śakṣyasi tvaṃ cauryaṃ kartuṃ?
V03vinv172u:962: tena tatra śaśakaḥ krītvā tasya dattaḥ bhāgineya sādhaya tāvad yad ahaṃ snātvāgacchāmi;
V03vinv172u:964: tena taṃ laghu laghv eva sādhayitvā ekapādo bhakṣitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:971: sa kathayati bhāgineyāsya caturthaḥ pādaḥ kva gataḥ?
V03vinv172u:972: sa kathayati: mātula śaśakasya caturthaḥ pādo nāsti; kva gamiṣyati?
V03vinv172u:973: iti; sa saṃlakṣayati: ahaṃ tāvac coraḥ,
V03vinv172u:974: ayaṃ tu mahācora iti; sa tam ādāya tripādakaṃ ca śaśakaṃ pānāgāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ:
V03vinv172u:975: bhāgineya madyaṃ pibāmaḥ; pibāmaḥ; tābhyāṃ pītaṃ; kuvindaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:977: mātula yena pītaṃ so 'palapatu; ahaṃ naiva pibāmi; kim apalapāmi iti; sa kuvindaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:979: śakyam anena sārdhaṃ cauryaṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:980: sa tena sārdhaṃ cauryaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:981: sa kuvindaḥ sandhau śiraḥ prakṣipati; tenocyate:
V03vinv172u:982: mātula cauryam api na jñāyate tvayā kartuṃ;
V03vinv172u:988: tataś coraś cora iti kolāhalo jāta iti padbhyāṃ gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:991: sa śiraś chitvā tad ādāya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:993: deva ekaś coraḥ sandhiṃ praviṣṭo gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:994: tasya ko 'pi śiraś chitvā tad ādāya prakrāntaḥ; rāja kathayati:
V03vinv172u:997: gacchata taṃ kabandhaṃ caturmahāpathe sthāpayitvā pratigupte pradeśe tiṣṭhata;
V03vinv172u:998: yas taṃ gṛhītvā roditi tenaikacoreṇa bhavitavyaṃ,
V03vinv172u:1000: tatas te rājapuruṣāḥ taṃ kabandhaṃ caturmahāpathe sthāpayitvā pratigupte pradeśe sthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1002: na nāma mayā mātulaṃ kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā roditavyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1003: sa unmattakaveṣam [A_437b] ātmānaṃ kṛtvā striyam api kaṇṭhe gṛhṇāti;
V03vinv172u:1004: puruṣam api vṛkṣam api aśvam api vṛṣabham api mahiṣam api chāgam api kukkuram api grahītum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1005: yadā lokena vijñāta unmattako 'yam iti tadā taṃ kabandhaṃ kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā yāvadāptaṃ ruditvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1007: deva unmattakas taṃ kabandhaṃ kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā yāvadāptaṃ ruditvā prakrānta iti; rāja kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1009: na śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yan na gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1014: sa śākaṭikaveṣaṃ kṛtvā kāṣṭhasya śakaṭaṃ pūrayitvā taṃ pradeśaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1015: tasyopari śakaṭaṃ kāṣṭhapūrṇaṃ sthāpayitvā balīvardān utsṛjya śakaṭe agniṃ datvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1016: tena dahyamānena sa kabandho dagdhaḥ; rājapuruṣai rājña niveditaṃ:
V03vinv172u:1017: deva sa ekacorako dagdhaḥ; rājā kathayati,
V03vinv172u:1018: kena; tair yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyātaṃ; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1019: bhavanto yo 'sau śākaṭikaḥ sa evāsāv ekacorikaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1020: na śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yan na gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1023: na nāma mayā mātulasya śmaśāne pitṛkāryaṃ kṛtam iti;
V03vinv172u:1024: sa brahmaṇaveṣaṃ kṛtvā adhiṣṭhāne bhikṣām aṭitvā taya tāṃ bhikṣāṃ śmaśāne paktvā piṇḍān datvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1026: deva brāhmaṇenādhiṣṭhāne bhikṣām aṭitvā yasmin pradeśe sa kabandho dagdhaḥ tatra paṃca piṇḍān datvā prakrānta iti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1027: bhavantaḥ sa evāsāv ekacorikaḥ; na śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yan na gṛhīta iti; ekacorikaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:1028: na nāma mayā mātulasyāsthīni gaṃgāyāṃ prakṣeptavyāni?
V03vinv172u:1030: sa kāpālikaveṣaṃ kṛtvā taṃ pradeśaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1031: sa tatra gātraṃ bhasmanā uddhūlayitvā asthīnāṃ bhasmanāṃ ca karparakaṃ pūrayitvā gaṃgāyāṃ prakṣipya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1032: rājapuruṣai rājño yathāvṛttam ārocitaṃ; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1034: na śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yan na gṛhītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1039: rājño duhitā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā tasmin jalodyāne sthāpitā;
V03vinv172u:1040: uktā ca yadi tvāṃ kaścid gṛhṇāti rāvayiṣyasi iti:
V03vinv172u:1042: yadaiṣā rāvayati tadā yuṣmābhir jalodyānaṃ gantavyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1043: yadi kaścit tatra puruṣo bhavati sa gṛhītvā māṃ neyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1045: na nāma mayā rājaduhitryā sārdhaṃ paricārayitavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:1055: ārakṣakā riktapiṭharikā eta uhyante ity apy upekṣitā vyavasthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1056: tato 'sāv ekacorikaḥ riktapiṭharikāyāṃ śiraḥ prakṣipya śrotasā uhyamānas taṃ pradeśam āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1063: eṣa coro māṃ paricārya gacchati iti; ārakṣakāḥ kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:1067: ārakṣakai rājño yathāvṛttam ārocitaṃ; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1068: na śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yan na gṛhītaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1069: dārikā coreṇa sārdhaṃ paricārayitvā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:1070: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām [A_438a] atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:1073: na mayā putrasya janmani pramodaḥ kṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1074: sa kāṃcukīyam ātmānaṃ kṛtvā rājakulān nirgamya pauruṣeyān āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:1075: bhavanto deva ājñāpayati pattanaṃ luṇṭhayata iti; te saṃlakṣayanti:
V03vinv172u:1084: rājyaṃ vā parityajāmi tasya vā nigrahaṃ karomi iti;
V03vinv172u:1089: yāvanto puruṣāḥ prativasanti taiḥ sarvair niṣparihārair bhūtvā maṇḍalavāṭaṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1090: yo na praviśati tasya vadho daṇḍa iti;
V03vinv172u:1093: tato rājñā tasmai dārakāya mālāṃ datvā uktaṃ:
V03vinv172u:1094: yas tava pitā tasmai tāṃ mālām anuprayaccha iti; ārakṣakāś ca puruṣā uktāḥ:
V03vinv172u:1095: yasyāyaṃ dārako mālāṃ dadāti yuṣmābhir gṛhītvā matsakāśam upaneyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1096: tatas tāṃ puṣpamālāṃ gṛhītvā paribhramitum ārabdho janakāyān nirīkṣamāṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1103: iti; te kathayanti; deva praghātyatām iti;
V03vinv172u:1107: tena tasmai sā duhitā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā bhāryārthaṃ dattā;
V03vinv172u:1110: yo 'sāv ekacorika aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1111: yo 'sau tasya putraḥ eṣa evāsau rāhulas tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1113: etarhy apy aham anena modakena vijñātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1114: evaṃ hi vo bhikṣavo 'cintyaḥ satvānāṃ karmavipākaḥ iti karmaparāyaṇair bhavitavyaṃ.
V03vinv172u:1116: Yaśodharā seeks to bring the Buddha back to her
V03vinv172u:1118: yadi rāhulasya pitā antaḥpuraṃ praviśati tathāivānucaritavyo yathā na bhūyo nirgacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:1119: tata ātmānam ādau kṛtvā gopikāmṛgajāpramukhāni ṣaṣṭistrīsahasrāṇi nānāvidhālaṃkārair alaṃkṛtāni surabhimālyadhūpavastrair vibhūṣitāni;
V03vinv172u:1120: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto vineyajanāpekṣā antaḥpuraṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1124: etāḥ striyāḥ kāmarāgābhibhūtāḥ satyānām abhājanabhūtā (SBV II 37)
V03vinv172u:1128: viditvā pūrvasyāṃ diśy upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya caturvidham īryāpathaṃ kalpayati;
V03vinv172u:1129: tadyathā caṃkramyate tiṣṭhati niṣīdati śayyāṃ kalpayati;
V03vinv172u:1131: tejodhātusamāpannasya buddhasya bhagavato vividhāny arcīṃṣi kāyān niścaranti;
V03vinv172u:1132: tadyathā nīlāni pītāni lohitāny avadātāni maṃjiṣṭhāni sphaṭikavarṇāni;
V03vinv172u:1138_0: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśy avaṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ diśi iti caturdiśaṃ caturvidham
V03vinv172u:1138_1: ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayan ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya
V03vinv172u:1139: atha tāḥ striyo bhagavata ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā āvarjitā mūlanikṛntā iva drumā bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya purastān niṣaṇṇāḥ dharmaśravaṇāya;
V03vinv172u:1140_0: tato bhagavatā tāsām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī
V03vinv172u:1140_1: dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā gopikāmṛgajāpramukhaiḥ ṣaṣṭistrīsahasraiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1141: yaśodharāyā atyarthaṃ kāmarāgābhibhūtāyā satyadarśanaṃ na kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1143: yannv ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ rasatṛṣṇayā anvāvarteyam iti;
V03vinv172u:1144: viditvā svayam eva bhagavato 'rthāya annapānaṃ sādhayitvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1145: adyāhaṃ svahastaṃ bhagavantaṃ saṃtarpayāmi iti; śrutvā bhikṣubhir bhagavata ārocayanti:
V03vinv172u:1146: yaśodharā bhadanta bhagavantaṃ svahastaṃ rasatṛṣṇayā anvāvartayitukāma iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:1147: pūrvam ahaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sarāgaḥ sadveṣaḥ samohaḥ rasapratisaṃvedī rasarāgapratisaṃvedī ca;
V03vinv172u:1148: etarhy ahaṃ vigatarāgo vigatadveṣo vigatamoho rasapratisaṃvedī no tu rasarāgapratisaṃvedī;
V03vinv172u:1149: tat katham idānīṃ yaśodharā rasatṛṣṇayā anvāvartayati iti.
V03vinv172u:1150: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1151: paśya bhadanta yaśodharā bhagavantaṃ vaśīkaraṇamodakenānvāvartayitukāmārabdhā; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:1152: na bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'py adhvani aham anayā modakenānvāvartitaḥ; tac chrūyatām (SBV II 38)
V03vinv172u:1155: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo anyatamasmin grāmake 'raṇyāyatane puṣpaphalasalilakandasaṃpanne riṣiḥ [A_439a] prativasati;
V03vinv172u:1158: tasya vyāḍamṛgā apy āśramapade viśvastavihāriṇo viharanti;
V03vinv172u:1166: prasavanakāle tam eva deśam āgamya prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:1168: sā gandhaṃ ghrātvā visabhāgaḥ satvaḥ iti saṃtrastā mūtrapurīṣam utsṛjantī chorayitvā prakrāntā;
V03vinv172u:1169: yāvad asau riṣis taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1171: sa samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ kasyāyaṃ putraḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1173: tena svāśramapadaṃ nītvā āpāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1174: tasyāpi vṛddhiṃ gacchataḥ śirasi mṛgaḍṛṅge prādurbhūte;
V03vinv172u:1175: tasya mṛgasya yādṛśe śṛṅge iti riṣyaśṛṇga iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:1179: yadā tasya maraṇāntikī vedanā prādurbhūtā na cireṇa kālaṃ kariṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:1181: putra asminn āśramapade nānādeśanivāsinaḥ riṣayaḥ kālena kālam upasaṃkrāmanti;
V03vinv172u:1182: te tvayā matpriyatayā svāgatavādasamudācāreṇa saṃmodya āsanenopanimantrayitavyā yathāśaktitaś ca phalamūlaiḥ pratipādyāḥ ity uktvā
V03vinv172u:1188: so 'pareṇa samayena salilārthī ghaṭam ādāya saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1193: tena pānīyastokaṃ gṛhītvā kṣipatā śāpo dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1195: tasmāt tvayā idaṃ divasam upādāya dvādaśavarṣāṇi na varṣitavyam (SBV II 39)
V03vinv172u:1201: bhavantaḥ kasyānubhāvād devo na varṣati iti; te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:1202: deva riṣiprakopād yady ayaṃ riṣis tasmāt tapasaḥ cālayituṃ śakyeta,
V03vinv172u:1204: anyathā na iti; rājā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ; antaḥpurāmātyakumārair ucyate:
V03vinv172u:1206: sa kathayati: riṣiprakopād devo na varṣayati; naimittikāś caivaṃ kathayanti,
V03vinv172u:1207: yady asau riṣis tasmāt tapasaś cālyate evaṃ devo varṣayati; anyathā na; tan na vijñāyate:
V03vinv172u:1208: kas taṃ śaknoti tasmāt tapaśaś cālayitum [A_439b] iti; tasya rājño duhitā śāntā nāma; sā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1210: ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathāsau riṣis tasmāt tapasaḥ calati iti;
V03vinv172u:1213: māṃ brāhmaṇakān mantrān pāṭhaya anyāṃś ca kanyāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1214: nausaṃkrame ca āśramapadaṃ kāraya puṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannam iti;
V03vinv172u:1215: tena brāhamṇakān mantrān pāṭhitā anyāś ca kanyāḥ,
V03vinv172u:1217: tataḥ tayā tāni phalāni vaśīkaraṇadravyaiḥ madyena ca samāpūritāni;
V03vinv172u:1218: aparāṇi ca nānāvicitrāṇi ca phalāni kāritāni;
V03vinv172u:1221: sā tābhiḥ kanyābhiḥ brāhmaṇakān mantrān pāṭhayantī āśramapadaṃ gatā;
V03vinv172u:1222: riṣeḥ śiṣyair niveditam upādhyāya bahavas tavāśramapadaṃ riṣaya āgatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1226: vyāyāmahīnā ca gatiḥ salīlā mukhāni ca śmaśruvivarjitāni /
V03vinv172u:1227: urāṃsi caiṣāṃ viṣamonnatāni veṣo hy apūrvo 'yaṃ mahāriṣīnām* //
V03vinv172u:1230: tābhis tāni phalāni paribhujya sa riṣir abhihito:
V03vinv172u:1232: asmākaṃ tv āśramo jalamadhye yatra phalāny amṛtaprakhyāni;
V03vinv172u:1233: api tu tvam asmābhir āśramapade upanimantrito bhava;
V03vinv172u:1237: tasya tatra madyapūrṇāni vaśīkaraṇadravyasaṃyuktāni nārikelaphalāni ca dattāni;
V03vinv172u:1238: sa madyamadākṣipto vaśīkaraṇadravyayogāt tayā sārdhaṃ vipratipannaḥ riddhiparihīṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1240: varṣābhiprāyā devateti ṛṣiṇā santarjitā; śāntā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1241: adyāpi tvam ātmānaṃ na jānīṣe ko 'ham iti;
V03vinv172u:1242: sa tayā rāgapāśapāśito rājñaḥ sakāsam unnītaḥ deva ayaṃ sa riṣiḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1245: rājñā sā tasyaiva riṣer bhāryārthaṃ saparivārā dattā;
V03vinv172u:1246: sa śāntāṃ pratyākhyāya tābhir anyābhiḥ sārdhaṃ paricārayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1247: tatra śāntā īrṣyākulīkṛtahṛdayā tasyāsatkāraṃ kartum ārabdhā;
V03vinv172u:1249: sa tayā sopānatkena pādena śirasi parāhataḥ; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:1250: yo 'haṃ meghasyāpi garjitaṃ na sahe sa idānīṃ rāgapāśitaḥ strīmātreṇaivaṃ khalīkṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1251: tena vīryam āsthāya punar api paṃcābhijñāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ.
V03vinv172u:1253: yo 'sāv ṛṣir aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1256: etarhy apy eṣā māṃ modakenānvāvartituṃ pravṛttā.
V03vinv172u:1259: yadā bhagavān antaḥpurān bhuktvā niṣkrāmati tadā yaśodharayā nairāśyam āpannayā bhartuḥ snehavaimukhyāc charaṇapṛṣṭham abhiruhya ātmā muktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1262: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1263: paśya bhadanta yaśodharayā bhagavanto 'rthāya śaraṇapṛṣṭhād ātmā muktaḥ iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:1264: na bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'py adhvany anayā mamārthāyātmā parityaktaḥ; tac chrūyatām (SBV II 41)
V03vinv172u:1266: The story of the Kinnara and the Kinnarī
V03vinv172u:1267: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā babhūva;
V03vinv172u:1270: tena tatra kinnaraḥ kinnarī ca dṛṣṭā; kinnaraḥ suptaḥ,
V03vinv172u:1272: rajñā ākarṇaṃ dhanuḥ pūrayitvā kinnaraḥ śareṇa marmani tāḍitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1275: rājā tām ādāya saṃprasthitaḥ; sā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1277: anujānīhi māṃ yāvad asya kinnarasya śarīrapūjāṃ kariṣyāmi iti; rājā saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:1279: paśyāmi tāvat katham asya śarīrapūjāṃ karoti iti;
V03vinv172u:1281: tatas tayā taṃ kinnaraṃ kāṣṭhair avaṣṭabhya citāṃ prajvālyātmā prakṣiptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1283: anyathā cintito py artha anyathā parivartitaḥ /
V03vinv172u:1286: yo 'sau kinnara aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1289: etarhy apy anayā mamārthāyātmā śaraṇapṛṣṭhān muktaḥ iti.
V03vinv172u:1294_0: yad aham enāṃ saṃsārakāntārād uttārayeyam iti viditvā tasya tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī
V03vinv172u:1294_1: dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā yaśodharayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ
V03vinv172u:1295: sā samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitā;
V03vinv172u:1297: svakulasaṃśānurūpatayā āryamārgapratilambhāc ca bhikṣuṇīnāṃ madhye samutpanneṣu kāryeṣv atyarthaṃ jihreti;
V03vinv172u:1299: eṣāgrā me bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikānāṃ hrīmatīnāṃ yaduta yaśodharā rāhulamātā iti.
V03vinv172u:1300: punar api bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1302: kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaḍvarṣāṇi kukṣiṇā garbho dhāritaḥ iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:1303: yaśodharayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātīṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni pūrvavad yāvad phalanti khalu dehinām.
V03vinv172u:1305: The story of the two Ābhīrīs
V03vinv172u:1306: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin gokule dvau ābhīryau prativasataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1308: te abhikṣṇaṃ mathitaghaṭam ādāya grāmāntaṃ gacchataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1309: tayor duhitā śāṭhyasamudācārajātā mātā ṛjukā; duhitā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1310: amba gṛhāṇa [A_440b] tāvan mathitaghaṭaṃ prasrāvaṃ karomi iti;
V03vinv172u:1313: na tām anugacchati; evaṃ tayāsau mātā ṣaṭkroṣān mathitaghaṭaṃ vāhitā.
V03vinv172u:1315: yāsāv ābhīrīduhitā eṣā eva sā yaśodharā tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1316: yad anayā mātā śāṭhyasamudācāreṇa ṣaṭkroṣān mathitaghaṭaṃ vāhitā,
V03vinv172u:1317: tasya karmaṇo vipākenānayā rāhulaḥ ṣaḍvarṣāṇi kukṣiṇā ūḍhaḥ iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānām karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:1318: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1319: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā rāhulena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena mātuḥ kukṣau ṣaḍvarṣāṇy avasthitaḥ iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:1320: rāhulenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:1321: rāhulena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati;
V03vinv172u:1322: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni na bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
V03vinv172u:1326: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
V03vinv172u:1327: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv172u:1328: sāmagrīm prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām // (SBV II 43)
V03vinv172u:1331: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ vārāṇasyāṃ nātidūre puṣpaphalasaṃpannam āśramapadaṃ nānāvihaganikūjitaṃ viśvastamṛgapakṣiniṣevitam;
V03vinv172u:1332: tatra dvāv ṛṣī bhrātarau prativasataḥ phalamūlāmbubhakṣāv ajinavalkaladhāriṇau śaṅkhaś ca likhitaś ca;
V03vinv172u:1336: amuṣminn udyāne dvāv ṛṣī bhrātarau prativasataḥ śaṅkhaś ca likhitaś ca;
V03vinv172u:1337: tatra śaṅkha upādhyāyo likhitaś ca śiṣyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1338: yāvad apareṇa samayena śaṅkha udakasya kuṇḍikāṃ pūrayitvā mūlaphalānām arthe vanaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1339: likhitas tu sarātram evotthāya pūrvataraṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1343: sa tṛṣṇārtaḥ saṃlakṣayati upādhyāyasantakaṃ pānīyaṃ pibāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:1345: yāvat śaṅkha riṣir mūlaphalāny ādāya tṛṣāparyākulīkṛtamukhaḥ āśramaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1351: upādhyāya ahaṃ coraḥ; mayā pītaṃ; daṇḍaṃ prayaccha iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1352: tvaṃ mama bhrātā śiṣyaś ca; yadi pītaṃ supītaṃ yathāsukham iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1353: upādhyāya na śaknomy aham etat kaukṛtyaṃ prativinodayituṃ;
V03vinv172u:1354: prayaccha me gurukaṃ daṇḍaṃ yaś corasya pradīyate iti;
V03vinv172u:1355: evam uktaḥ śaṅkha ṛṣiḥ [A_441a] prakupitaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1357: yadi tvaṃ daṇḍenārthī rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gaccha iti;
V03vinv172u:1359: tasmiṃś ca samaye rājā mṛgavadhāya saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1361: ahaṃ coro mahārāja yo 'syādattaṃ jalaṃ pibet /
V03vinv172u:1362: prayaccha me guruṃ daṇḍaṃ yaś corasya pradīyate //
V03vinv172u:1363: rājā kathayati: nāsti pānīyasyādattādānam iti; api tu kasya santakaṃ tvayā jalam apahṛtaṃ?
V03vinv172u:1367: sa kathayati deva na śaknomy ahaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ (SBV II 44)
V03vinv172u:1369: prayaccha me guruṃ daṇḍaṃ yaś corasya pradīyate iti;
V03vinv172u:1370: evam ukte rājā prakupitaḥ tīvreṇa paryavasthānena paryavasthitaḥ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1371: yady evam atraiva tiṣṭha na tāvat prayātavyaṃ yāvad ahaṃ pratinirvṛttaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1372: sa rājā mṛgavadhaṃ kṛtvā saṃcintyānyena dvāreṇa praviṣṭaḥ na bhūyo nirgacchati;
V03vinv172u:1376: tasminn eva pradeśe tiṣṭhataḥ ājñāṃ dātum arhasi iti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1378: eṣaivāsya daṇḍaḥ iti; amātyais tasya riṣer ākhyātaṃ:
V03vinv172u:1379: ṛṣe deva kathayati uddhṛtadaṇḍo 'sau gacchatv eṣa evāsya daṇḍaḥ iti; sa vigatakaukṛtyaḥ prakrāntaḥ.
V03vinv172u:1381: yo 'sau rājā brahmadatta eṣa eva sa rāhulaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1382: yad anena cittaṃ pradūṣya riṣir abhihitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1385: tasya karmaṇo vipākena mātuḥ kukṣau ṣaḍvarṣāṇy uṣitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1386: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:1387: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1388: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā bhadrikeṇa karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena pradhānapuruṣāṇāṃ rājā saṃvṛttaḥ?
V03vinv172u:1390: bhadrikeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:1398: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
V03vinv172u:1399: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv172u:1400: sāmagrīm prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
V03vinv172u:1402: Story of the beggar (concerning a previous birth of King Bhadrika)
V03vinv172u:1403: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamaḥ koṭṭamallakaḥ janapadād vārāṇasīm āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1408_0: yāvad rājā brahmadattaḥ samprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukaśārikākokilajīvañjīvakonnādite
V03vinv172u:1409: sa tatrāntaḥpureṇa sārdham udyāne sukham anubhūya middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1410: puṣpaphalalolupo mātṛgrāmaḥ puṣpaphalāni samanveṣamāṇaḥ paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1411: yāvad rājā brahmadattaḥ nidrālasyaṃ prativinodya laghu laghv eva vārāṇasīṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1413: yāvad anyatamā strī saṃbhrāntā muktāhāraṃ chorayitvā prakrāntā;
V03vinv172u:1414: yāvad asau koṭṭamallakas tasminn udyāne paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1417: sthānam etad vidyate yad arthāyānarthaṃ prāpayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:1419: yasya santako bhaviṣyati sa grahīṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:1421: deva amukayā udyāne muktāhāro vismṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1426: yāvat paśyati latāyām upanibaddhaṃ; te saṃlakṣayanti:
V03vinv172u:1429: yāvat paśyanti koṭṭamallakaṃ; sa tair uktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1430: bhoḥ puruṣa kenaiṣa muktāhāro latāyāṃ baddhvāvasthāpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1434: rājā kathayati bhavantas taṃ koṭṭamallakaṃ śabdāpayata;
V03vinv172u:1437: rājñā pṛṣṭaḥ bhoḥ puruṣa kasmāt tvayā muktāhāro latāyāṃ baddhvāvasthapitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:1439: deva nāham asya bhāgī devasyaivārhati iti; rājā abhiprasannaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1440: bhoḥ puruṣa varārhas tvaṃ; vada kaṃ te varam anuprayacchāmi iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1441: yadi devaḥ parituṣṭaḥ koṭṭamallakān bhojayitvā teṣāṃ pratyekam ekaikaṃ vastrayugenācchādya mām (SBV II 46)
V03vinv172u:1442: adhipatiṃ sthāpayatu iti; rājñāmātyānām ājñā dattā:
V03vinv172u:1443: bhavanto yuṣmābhiḥ koṭṭamallakān bhojayitvā pratyekam ekaikaṃ vastrayugenācchādya etaṃ puruṣaṃ teṣām adhipatiṃ sthāpayata;
V03vinv172u:1445: devasamājñāpayati yāvantaḥ koṭṭamallakāḥ vārāṇasyāṃ sarvair amuṣminn udyāne saṃnipatitavyam;
V03vinv172u:1446: ahaṃ koṭṭamallakān bhojayāmi ekaikaṃ vastrayugenācchādayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:1447: te sarve saṃnipatitāḥ āmatyaiḥ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1452: te praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitāḥ vastrayugenācchāditāḥ prītamanasaḥ kathayanti yathā devaḥ samājñāpayati iti;
V03vinv172u:1454: prakṛtyaiva koṭṭamallakāḥ kṣutpipāsābhibhūtāḥ vīthyām annapānam ācchindanti;
V03vinv172u:1455: te rājñā satkṛtā iti bhūyasyā mātrayā ācchettum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1458: rājā kathayati [A_442a] apramattair bhavadbhir ārakṣā kartavyā,
V03vinv172u:1460: yāvad anyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ pūpakān ādāya vīthīmadhyena gacchati;
V03vinv172u:1461: tena koṭṭamallakādhipatinā tasya sakāśāt pūpikā ācchinnāḥ;
V03vinv172u:1462: sa tān ādāya pratiguptaṃ pradeśaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1464: sa tair upadrūyamāno nadīṃ vārakām uttīrya anyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1465: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;
V03vinv172u:1466: yāvad anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddho daivāt taṃ pradeśam āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1467: tenāsau dṛṣṭaḥ kāyaprāsādikaḥ śānteryāpathaś ca; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:1468: nūnaṃ mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kārā na kṛtā yenāhaṃ mānuṣyam āsādya koṭṭamallako jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1469: yady ayaṃ mahātmā mamāntikāt pūpān pratigṛhṇīyād aham asmai dadyām iti;
V03vinv172u:1470: tatas tena pratyekabuddhena tasya cetasā cittam ājñāya parānugrahakāraṇāt pātram upanāmitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1472: kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā na vācikī;
V03vinv172u:1473: sa upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1476: drumaḥ pratyekabuddhasya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1479: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyam eva na virāgayeyam iti;
V03vinv172u:1481: asmākam api pūpikāṃ prayaccha iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1482: ayaṃ mahātmā riṣiḥ; asmai mayā pratipaditā iti; te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:1483: pratipādya kiṃ tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1484: pradhānapuruṣāṇāṃ rājā syām iti; te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:1485: vayam eva te pradhānapuruṣāḥ syāma yeṣāṃ tvaṃ rājā bhaviṣyasi iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1487: kiṃ tv asya riṣeḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kuruta iti;
V03vinv172u:1488: tais tasya pratyekabuddhasya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ vayaṃ te pradhānapuruṣāḥ syāma yeṣām ayaṃ rājā bhaviṣyati iti.
V03vinv172u:1490: yo 'sau koṭṭamallakādhipatir eṣa eva sa bhadrikaḥ śākyarājaḥ iti tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1491: ye te koṭṭamallakā etāny eva tāni pañcaśākyaśatāni;
V03vinv172u:1493: tasya karmaṇo vipākena eṣāṃ pañcānāṃ śākyaśatānāṃ rājā saṃvṛttaḥ;
