V03vinv172u:1494: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
V03vinv172u:1498: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulāni pātrāṇy abhyavakāśa upari kṣiptāni;
V03vinv172u:1500: athānyatamo markataḥ śālavṛkṣād avatīrya yena pātrāṇi [A_442b] tenopasaṃkramati;
V03vinv172u:1502: mā bhetsyati pātrāṇi iti; tatra bhagavān bhikṣūṇām āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv172u:1506: atha sa markaṭo yena bhagavataḥ pātraṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1507: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pātram ādāya taṃ śālāvṛkṣam abhiruhya kṣaudrasya madhuno 'neḍakasya pūrayitvā śanair mandamandaṃ śālavṛkṣād avatīrya bhagavata upanāmayati;
V03vinv172u:1508: tasya bhagavān na pratigṛhṇāti saprāṇakam iti kṛtvā;
V03vinv172u:1509: atha sa markaṭa ekānte prakramya (SBV II 48)
V03vinv172u:1511: tasya bhagavān na pratigṛhṇāti akalpikam iti kṛtvā;
V03vinv172u:1512: atha sa markaṭa ekānte prakramya śītalena vāriṇā pariṣicya bhagavata upanāmayati;
V03vinv172u:1514_0: atha sa markaṭa pratigṛhītaṃ me bhagavatā madhupātram iti viditvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditaḥ
V03vinv172u:1514_1: udagraprītisaumanasyajātaḥ prāñjalīkṛtaḥ pratipuṭakaṃ pratyavasṛto nartamānaḥ bhagavantaṃ
V03vinv172u:1514_2: namasyamānaḥ bhagavati prasādajāto bhagavantaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ pṛṣṭhato nāvalokayati;
V03vinv172u:1518: yam eva divasaṃ pratisandhir gṛhītas tam eva divasaṃ madhuvarṣaṃ patitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1519: pitrā cāsya naimittikā āhūya pṛṣṭāḥ; te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:1521: yāvad asau brāhmaṇī aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:1523: yam eva divasaṃ jātas tam api divasaṃ madhuvarṣaṃ patitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1524: tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃṣatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
V03vinv172u:1525: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma iti; jñātaya ūcuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1526: ayaṃ dārako yam eva divasaṃ mātuḥ kukṣim avakrāntas tam eva divasaṃ madhuvarṣaṃ patitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1527: yam api divasaṃ jātaḥ tam api divasaṃ madhuvarṣaṃ patitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1529: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya madhuvāsiṣṭha iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1531: yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ tadā svyākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1532: tasya pravrajitasyāpi sataḥ dine dine trīṇi madhupātrāṇi saṃpadyante;
V03vinv172u:1536: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1537: kiṃ bhadantāyuṣmatā madhuvāsiṣṭhena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākenāsya dine dine trīṇi pātrāṇi saṃpadyante iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:1539: karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāni pūrvavad yāvad phalanti khalu dehināṃ;
V03vinv172u:1540: dṛṣṭo yuṣmābhir bhikṣavaḥ sa markaṭaḥ yena tathāgatasya madhupātram upanāmitaṃ?
V03vinv172u:1542: yo 'sau markaṭa eṣa evāsau madhuvāsiṣṭhaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1544: tasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaṭkarmanirate brāhmaṇakule upapannaḥ pratisandhau cāsya jātau ca madhuvarṣaṃ patitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1545: yāvad etarhy api divase divase trīṇi madhupātrāṇi saṃpadyante;
V03vinv172u:1546: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1548: yadi madhuvāsiṣṭho bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ mahāsamudraṃ madhv adhimucyate;
V03vinv172u:1550: evaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ aprameyā tathāgatadakṣiṇā iti.
V03vinv172u:1551: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1552: kiṃ bhadantāyuṣmatā upālinā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena rājenāpitaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:1553: upālinaiva bhikṣavaḥ aprameyā tathāgatadakṣiṇā iti pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvad phalanti khalu dehināṃ.
V03vinv172u:1555: The story of the royal barber
V03vinv172u:1559: puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyati iti; sa ca rājakulaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ; tena bhāgineya uktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1562: tathā cāvatāraya yathā rājñaḥ iti; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:1568: kuśalamūlāvaropaṇam asya kartavyam iti viditvā tasyānukampārtham upari vihāyasam (SBV II 50)
V03vinv172u:1571: sa mūlanikṛnta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1572: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yathā me mātulo rājanāpitaḥ evam aham api rājanāpitaḥ syām iti.
V03vinv172u:1574: yo' sau rājanāpitasya bhāgineya eṣa evāsāv upālir bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:1575: yad anena pratyekabuddhasya keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena rajanāpitaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1576: bhūyo 'pi yad anena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tac chrūyatām.
V03vinv172u:1581: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:1582: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1583: bhūyo 'pi krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1584: bhūyo 'pi krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1590: mamātyayāt sarvaṃ svāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:1591: sa tena gṛhapatinā dṛṣṭa uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:1594: vayasya kathaṃ na cintāparo bhaviṣyāmi yasya me iyat dhanajātaṃ na putro na duhitā,
V03vinv172u:1595: mamātyayāt sarvam etad rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyati iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1596: yady evam eṣa mama sarvakanīyān putraḥ:
V03vinv172u:1600: te tasya putrāḥ yadā kenacit sārdhaṃ kaliṃ kurvanti tadā tena paribhāṣyante:
V03vinv172u:1601: yūyam api kaliṃ kurutha yeṣāṃ bhrātā nāpitaḥ iti; te daurmanasyajātāḥ saṃlakṣayanti:
V03vinv172u:1602: yat kiṃcid vayaṃ paribhūtāḥ sarvaṃ tad asya bhrātur doṣāt;
V03vinv172u:1606: amukasya gṛhapateḥ putrāṇāṃ na kenacit śmaśrukarma kartavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:1612: na kenacid eṣāṃ śmaśrukarma kartavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:1615: arhati pitā putraṃ dātuṃ; kim iti yuṣmābhir ācchinnaḥ?
V03vinv172u:1618: te daurmanasyajātāḥ lokāpavādabhayāt taṃ ghātayitum icchanti;
V03vinv172u:1622: te māṃ praghātayitum icchanti; anujānīhi pravrajāmi iti; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:1623: kāmam eva pravrajatu mā taiḥ prāṇān viyokṣyata iti viditvā uktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1625: yat kiṃcid guṇagaṇam adhigacchethās tadā mamārocayiṣyasi iti;
V03vinv172u:1628: mayā tasya pituḥ pratijñātam upadarśayiṣyāmi iti; gacchāmi,
V03vinv172u:1629: tām imāṃ pūrvikāṃ pratijñāṃ niryātayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:1630: sa tasya sakāśaṃ gatvā jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryaṃ yāvat mūlanikṛnta iva drumaḥ sa pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1631: yan mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kārāḥ kṛtāḥ anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena rājanāpitaḥ syām iti;
V03vinv172u:1632: bhūyo 'pi anena pañcasu pratyekabuddhaśateṣu kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam:
V03vinv172u:1634: punar api caturṣu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena rājanāpitaḥ syām iti;
V03vinv172u:1635: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūn vārān rājanāpitaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ.
V03vinv172u:1636: bhūyo 'pi bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1637: kiṃ bhadanta upālinā karma kṛtaṃ yena vinayadhārāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:1640: Upāli is the foremost among those who master and know the Vinaya
V03vinv172u:1641_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo
V03vinv172u:1641_1: nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi pūrvavad yāvat sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm [A_444a] upaniśritya
V03vinv172u:1644: bhikṣuḥ sa punaḥ kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena vinayadharāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1647: tad anena maraṇakālasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaṃ:
V03vinv172u:1648: yad mayā kāśyape bhagavati samyaksaṃbuddhe yāvadāyur brahmacaryaṃ caritaṃ,
V03vinv172u:1650_0: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena uttaro nāma māṇavo
V03vinv172u:1650_1: vyākṛto bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan
V03vinv172u:1651: tasyāhaṃ pravacane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryām;
V03vinv172u:1652: yathā ca me upādhyāyena bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena vinayadhārāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1653: evaṃ mām api sa bhagavāṃs śākyamunir vinayadharāṇām agraṃ nirdiṣed iti tatpraṇidhānavaśāt tathāgatena vinayadharāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1654: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1657: Untrue announcement of the death of the Buddha and the birth of Ānanda
V03vinv172u:1658: yadā bhagavatā ṣaṭtriṃśadbhūtakoṭiparivāraṃ māraṃ papīyaṃsam abhinirjitya anuttaraṃ jñānam adhigataṃ,
V03vinv172u:1664: na bhagavān kālagato 'pi tu bhagavatānuttaraṃ jñānam adhigatam iti;
V03vinv172u:1665: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ param ānandam upāgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:1667: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ vistareṇa kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
V03vinv172u:1668: kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma iti; jñātasya kathayaṃti:
V03vinv172u:1670: tad bhavatu dārakasyānanda iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam;
V03vinv172u:1672: dvābhyām aṃśadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:1673: sa dhātryaṃśagato naimittikair vyākṛto 'nena dārakeṇa bhagavataḥ śākyamuner upasthānaṃ kartavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:1674: dārako naimittikair vyākṛta iti śrutvā amṛtodanaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:1676: na tatpurastād avatāro 'py anena kartavya iti;
V03vinv172u:1677: sa yadā bhagavān kapilavastv āgacchati tadā (SBV II 53)
V03vinv172u:1679: yadā bhagavān vaiśālīṃ gacchati tadā punaḥ kapilavastu nīyate;
V03vinv172u:1680: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1681_0: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ
V03vinv172u:1681_5: trī rātres trir divasasya ca buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
V03vinv172u:1682_0: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkataprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko
V03vinv172u:1682_1: 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe
V03vinv172u:1687: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet //
V03vinv172u:1690: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati: caramabhaviko ānando dārakaḥ; sa mama śāsane pravrajiṣyati,
V03vinv172u:1691: pravrajya cānena mamopasthānaṃ kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ ca dhārayitavyaṃ mayi ca parinirvṛte amṛtam adhigantavyaṃ yan nv aham ānandaṃ kumāraṃ śāsane 'vatārayeyam iti;
V03vinv172u:1692: apravidita eva kapilavastunagaraṃ praviśyāmṛtodanasya bhavanam āgamya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1694: bhagavatā tathādhiṣṭhito yena svayam eva dvāram apāvṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1695: prathamata eva ca bhagavato pādau śirasā (SBV II 54)
V03vinv172u:1696: vanditvā bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthito 'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā ca bhagavantaṃ vījayamānaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1697: tato 'mṛtodano bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1698: ekānte niṣaṇṇaṃm amṛtodanaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya āsanād utthāya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1700: ity ānandaś caramabhavikaḥ satvo bhagavantaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1701: amṛtodanena sāntaḥpuraparivāreṇa na śakyate nivartayituṃ; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:1702: ayaṃ caramabhavikaḥ satvaḥ na tvayā śakyate nivartayituṃ,
V03vinv172u:1703: mā nivarteta iti; amṛtodanaḥ kathayati; bhagavan yady evam ānupūrvīm asya kurmaḥ; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:1707: svabandhujanaṃ ca kṣamāpayitvā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣito hastiskandham abhiruhya anekajanaparivṛto nyagrodhārāmābhimukho bhagavatsakāśaṃ preṣitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1708: [A_445a] tataś ca tasya vīthīmadhyena gacchato hastinā utpalahastako nigīrṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1710: anena kumāreṇa śrutidharāṇām agreṇa bhavitavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:1711: tasya yānasya yāvatī bhūmis tāvad yānena gatvā yānād avatīrya padbhyām eva nyagrodhārāmaṃ praviśya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1712: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1713: bhagavatā daśabalakāśyapasya samarpitaḥ kāśyapa pravrājaya kumāram iti;
V03vinv172u:1715: atha bhagavān yathābhiramyaṃ kapilavastuni vihṛtya yena rājagṛhaṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1719: bhagavatā jīvikasyājñā dattā ānandasya bhikṣoś cikitsāṃ kuruṣva iti;
V03vinv172u:1720: evaṃ bhadanta iti jīvikaḥ kumārabhṛto bhagavataḥ pratyaśauṣīd;
V03vinv172u:1721: atha bhagavān purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ dharmaṃ deśayati;
V03vinv172u:1722: āyuṣmān apy ānandas tatraiva niṣaṇṇaḥ dharmaśravaṇāya;
V03vinv172u:1729: bhagavan mayā aryānandasyātraiva niṣaṇṇasya piṭakaḥ pācitaḥ pāṭito rohitaś ca;
V03vinv172u:1731: yadi mama śarīraṃ tilaśaś chinnam abhaviṣyat tathāpi mayā na parijñātam abhaviṣyad bhagavato dharmaṃ deśayato dharmānvayaprasādāvarjitasantatinā;
V03vinv172u:1733: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1734: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā ānandena karma kṛtaṃ yenāsya pṛṣṭhe piṭako jātaḥ iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:1735: ānandenaiva bhikṣavaḥ bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni pūrvavad yāvad phalanti khalu dehināṃ.
V03vinv172u:1737: The story of the king Kirātas
V03vinv172u:1739: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin karvaṭake kirātānām adhipatiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:1740: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktāḥ ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;
V03vinv172u:1741: athānyatamaḥ pratyekabuddhas tena tenānvāhiṇḍamānaḥ kirātanagaram anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1742: sa tatra piṇḍārthī kirātarājasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1743: sa tena saṃjātāmarṣeṇa cittaṃ pradūṣya guḍikayā pṛṣṭhe tāḍitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1744: sa mahātmā nihatamadamānatvāt tasyābhavyatāṃ jñātvā prakrāntaḥ.
V03vinv172u:1746: yo 'sau kirātarājaḥ eṣa eva sa ānando bhikṣuḥ;
V03vinv172u:1747: yad anena pratyekabuddhaḥ saṃjātāmarṣeṇa cittaṃ pradūṣya pṛṣṭhe guḍikayā tāḍitaḥ tasya karmaṇo vipākena yatra yatra jāyate tatra tatrāsya paṃcajanmaśatāni pṛṣṭhe piṭako jāyate;
V03vinv172u:1748: yāvad etarhy apy asya carame bhave pṛṣṭhe piṭako jātaḥ (SBV II 56)
V03vinv172u:1750: Ānanda follows the Buddha and makes an exhibition of mathematical knowledge
V03vinv172u:1751: yadā āyuṣmān ānando bhagavatā sārdhaṃ gacchati tadāsya bhagavati tīvraprasādagauravaṃ [A_445b] hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ chambitatvaṃ copatiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:1752: yadā nirmāṇena na tādṛśaṃ prasādagauravaṃ hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ chambitatvaṃ copatiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:1753: yāvad anyatamena gṛhapatinā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1754: bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ tasya gṛhapater gṛhaṃ praviśya bhuktvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1756: āyuṣmann ānanda kiṃ tvam adya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ gataḥ āhosvin nirmāṇena iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1759: yadāhaṃ bhagavatā sārdhaṃ gacchāmi tato mama bhagavato 'ntike tīvraprasādagauravaṃ hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ chambitatvaṃ copatiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:1760: yadā buddhanirmāṇena tadā na tathā iti
V03vinv172u:1763: digvidikṣu śabdo visṛtaḥ ānando bhikṣur nimittakuśalaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:1764: atha bhagavān yathābhiramya rājagṛhe vihṛtya yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1767: athāyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat;
V03vinv172u:1769: ayaṃ śramaṇasya gautamasya śrāvakaḥ ānando bhikṣuḥ,
V03vinv172u:1771: pṛcchāmi tāvad enam asyāḥ śiṃśapāyāḥ kiyanti patrāṇi iti; sa tena pṛṣṭaḥ:
V03vinv172u:1772: ārya asyāḥ śiṃśapāyāḥ kiyanti patrāṇi iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1773: etāvanti śatāni sahasrāṇi śatasahasrāṇi ity uktvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1774: tena brāhmaṇena katipayāni patrāṇy apanīya gaṇayitvā choritāni;
V03vinv172u:1777: ārya idānīṃ jānīṣva asyāḥ śiṃśapāyāḥ kiyanti patrāṇi iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:1778: pūrvam etāvanti śatāni sahasrāṇi śatasahasrāṇi ca;
V03vinv172u:1779: ata etāvanty apanītāni iti uktvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1782: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1784: kṛtaṃ yena nimittakuśalo jātaḥ iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:1785: ānandenaiva bhikṣavaḥ bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehināṃ.
V03vinv172u:1791: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:1792: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1793: tasya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃṣatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kulasadṛśaṃ nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyataṃ;
V03vinv172u:1795: tena deśāntaraṃ gatvā ṣaṣṭisahasrakaṃ horāśāstram adhītam;
V03vinv172u:1796: evaṃ yāvat saṃsāre saṃsaratā paṃca janmaśatāni horājñānam adhītaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1798: tena hetunā tena pratyayena yatra yatropapannaḥ tatra tatra [A_446a] naimittikānām agro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1799: yāvad etarhy api paścime bhave naimittikānām agro jātaḥ.
V03vinv172u:1801: The story of the rice, the two patridges and the sugar-cane
V03vinv172u:1802: (concerning king Prasenajit and a previous birth of him)
V03vinv172u:1803: rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kośalasya pratidinaṃ bhojanakāle śālyodanaṃ phelāyāṃ nipatati tittirī dvāv ikṣuyaṣṭiś ca;
V03vinv172u:1806: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1807: kiṃ bhadanta rājñā prasenajitā kośalena karma kṛtaṃ yenāsya bhojanavelāyāṃ śālyodanaṃ phelāyāṃ nipatati tittirī dvāv ikṣuyaṣṭiś ca;
V03vinv172u:1810: rājñaiva bhikṣavaḥ prasenajitā kośalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni yenāsya bhojanavelāyāṃ (SBV II 58)
V03vinv172u:1811: śālyodanaṃ phelāyāṃ nipatati tittirī dvāv ikṣuyaṣṭiś ca; tayor ekaḥ phelāyāṃ, dvitīyo bhūmyāṃ.
V03vinv172u:1812: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ anyatamo gṛhapatiḥ prativasaty āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1815: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktāḥ ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;
V03vinv172u:1817: sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya piṇḍapātam aṭaṃs tasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1818: sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ kāyaprāsādikaḥ cittaprāsādikaś ca;
V03vinv172u:1819: tena tasmai tatprathamato navānnam ānetavyam iti kṛtvā śālyodanam ikṣuyaṣṭis tittiridvayaṃ dattaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1822: yo 'sau gṛhapatir eṣa evāsau rājā prasenajit kośālas tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1823_0: yad anena pratyekabuddhāya navaṃ śālyodanam ikṣuyaṣṭis tittiridvayaṃ ca dattaṃ tena
V03vinv172u:1823_1: karmaṇā bahūni varṣāṇī bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi divyamānuṣaṃ saukhyam anubhūtam;
V03vinv172u:1824: etarhy apy asya bhojanavelāyāṃ śālyodanam ikṣuyaṣṭis tittiridvayaṃ ekaḥ phelāyāṃ patati dvitīyo bhūmyāṃ.
V03vinv172u:1827: tad ayaṃ prāktanasya karmaṇaḥ phalavipāka iti viditvā bhagavati saśrāvakasaṃghe prasannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1829: naimittikena ca vyākṛtam āryānandasya paṭṭabandho bhaviṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:1830: yāvat prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām āyuṣmata ānandasya lalāṭe piṭako jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1834: yannv aham asya svayam evopasthānaṃ kūryām iti;
V03vinv172u:1838: rājñā prasenajitā kośalena āyuṣmata ānandasya svayam eva śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ dhāritaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1839: śirāyāṃ ca muktāyāṃ lalāṭe [A_446b] paṭṭo baddhaḥ. (SBV II 59)
V03vinv172u:1840: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:1841_0: kiṃ bhadantāyuṣmatānandena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena rājñā prasenajitā kośalena
V03vinv172u:1841_1: mūrdhni śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ dhāritaṃ svayam eva śuklapaṭṭo baddhaḥ upasthānaṃ ca
V03vinv172u:1842: ānandenaiva bhikṣavaḥ bhikṣuṇā pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehināṃ.
V03vinv172u:1846: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyām anyatamo vaidyaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:1849: svayam eva cikitsā kṛtā upasthānaṃ ca.
V03vinv172u:1851: yo 'sau vaidya eṣa evāsau ānanadabhikṣuḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:1852: yad anena pratyekabuddhāya kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena anekāni varṣāṇi varṣaśatāni varṣasahasrāṇi rājāmātyabrāhmaṇagṛhapatibhir asyopasthānaṃ kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1853: yāvad etarhy asya rājñā prasenajitā kośalena śatiśalākaṃ chatraṃ dhāritaṃ;
V03vinv172u:1856: The Buddha chooses Ānanda as servant
V03vinv172u:1863: tena khalu samayena evaṃrūpā saṃbahulā sthavirasthavirā mahāśrāvakā bhagavataḥ sāmantakam upaniśritya viharanty araṇyakuṭikāyā<ṃ>,
V03vinv172u:1865: āyuṣmān aśvajid bhadrikaḥ bāṣpaḥ mahānāmā yaśā pūrṇaḥ vimalaḥ gavāmpatiḥ subāhuḥ āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ (SBV II 60)
V03vinv172u:1866_0: āyuṣmān mahākauṣṭhilaḥ āyuṣmān mahākapphinaḥ āyuṣmān aniruddhaḥ nandikaḥ kimpilaḥ
V03vinv172u:1866_1: yaśā śālāviharīyakasthaviraḥ pūrṇaḥ kuṇḍopadhānīyakasthavira itīme cānye ca sthavirasthavirā
V03vinv172u:1867: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: aham asmi bhikṣavaḥ etarhi jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ,

V03vinv172u:1869: utsāhayata me bhikṣavo bhikṣum upasthāyakaṃ yo mām upasthānaṃ kariṣyati manāpena nāmanāpena,
V03vinv172u:1872: athāyuṣmān ājñātakauṇḍinya utthāyāsanād ekāṃśam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat*:

V03vinv172u:1880_0: athāyuṣmān aśvajid bhadrikaḥ bāṣpaḥ mahānāmā yaśā pūrṇaḥ vimalaḥ gavaṃpatiḥ subāhuḥ
V03vinv172u:1880_1: āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ āyuṣmān mahākauṣṭhilaḥ
V03vinv172u:1880_2: āyuṣmān mahākapphinaḥ āyuṣmān aniruddhaḥ nandikaḥ kiṃpilaḥ yaśā śālāvihārīyakasthaviraḥ

V03vinv172u:1884: tvam api pūrṇo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ;
V03vinv172u:1889: kaḥ punar bhagavato bhikṣur abhipreta upasthāyako bhaviṣyati?
V03vinv172u:1890: yannv ahaṃ tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyeyaṃ yathā samāhite citte bhagavato mānasam (SBV II 61)
V03vinv172u:1892: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte bhagavataḥ mānasam avalokayati;
V03vinv172u:1893: adrākṣīd āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavato mānasaṃ āyuṣmaty ānande pratiṣṭhitam ānando me bhikṣur upasthāsyati manāpena nāmanāpena,
V03vinv172u:1896: dṛṣṭvā ca punas tasmāt samādher vyutthāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram idam avocat*:

V03vinv172u:1900: tadyathā kūṭāgāre vā kūṭāgāraśālāyāṃ vā uttarāyatāyāṃ prācīnāyatāyāṃ pūrveṇa vātāyanena sūryaraśmayaḥ praviṣya paścimāṃ bhittiṃ niśritya tiṣṭheyuḥ;
V03vinv172u:1901: evam eva bhagavato mānasam āyuṣmaty ānande pratiṣṭhitam ānando me bhikṣur upasthāsyati manāpena nāmanāpena,

V03vinv172u:1904: athāyuṣmān chāriputra āyuṣmāṃ ca mahāmaudgalyāyano yenāyuṣmān ānandas tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:1905: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmatā ānandena sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇau;
V03vinv172u:1907: āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:1908: utsaha tvam āyuṣman ānanda bhagavantam upasthātuṃ,
V03vinv172u:1910: nāhaṃ āyuṣman śāriputra utsahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ;
V03vinv172u:1913: tadyathā agniḥ prajvalito durāsado bhavati duṣprasaho yadutārcirantarikayā,

V03vinv172u:1916: tadyathā siṃho mṛgarājā [A_447b] giriguhāgato durāsado bhavati duṣprasaho yaduta daṃṣṭrāntarikayā,
V03vinv172u:1917: evam eva durāsadā buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ;

V03vinv172u:2028: sa ceha iti; sa tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati: maharṣe tvaṃ piṇḍakenārthī,

V03vinv172u:2033: rājñā tasya bhānumantaḥ kumāraḥ upasthāyako dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2036: saptāhasyātyayāt kālaṃ kariṣyatīti; sa tenoktaḥ: bhrātaḥ kimarthaṃ na pravrajasi?
V03vinv172u:2037: iti; sa kathayati: maharṣe pravrajāmi; yady evaṃ gaccha,
V03vinv172u:2038: pitaram avalokya; sa rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ; deva anujānīhi māṃ,
V03vinv172u:2044: sa pratyekabuddhaḥ svayam eva rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2047: pravrajyā śreyasi bhāno yasmāt saṃvarṇitā jinaiḥ // iti;
V03vinv172u:2055: anyathā cintitā hy arthā anyathā parivartitāḥ /
V03vinv172u:2056: alpakaṃ jīvitaṃ bhāno paraṃ saptāham eva tu //
V03vinv172u:2062: sa ātmanaḥ alpakaṃ jīvitaṃ jñātvā tīvreṇa prasādena tasyopasthānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2064: tasya pātraṃ karatale hṛhītvā bhuṃjānasya vāyunā hastaḥ kampate;
V03vinv172u:2065: tatas tena rājakumāreṇa kaṭakam avatārya pātrasya [A_449a] ādhārako dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2067: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:2070: kuśalamūlena ye dharmasantāne praviśeyuḥ te niścalā avatiṣṭheyuḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:2071: sa tasya pūrvaṃ parimaṇḍalaiḥ padavyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayati; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:2072: tvaṃ pūrvam āgārikabhūtaḥ parimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalaiḥ padair vyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayasi;
V03vinv172u:2074: kimarthaṃ na deśayasi iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:2076: ye te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ te buddhā bhagavantaḥ parimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalaiḥ padavyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayanti iti;
V03vinv172u:2078: yo 'sau buddho bhagavān parimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalaiḥ padavyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayati,
V03vinv172u:2079: tasyāhaṃ bhrātā syām upasthāyakaś ca; sa tena pratyekabuddhena pravrājitaḥ uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:2080: vatsa etad eva te manasi kartavyaṃ mayā saptāhasyātyayāt martavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:2081: tena tena saptāhena na kiṃcid adhigataṃ;
V03vinv172u:2083: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane pravrajya bahuśrutaḥ syāṃ,

V03vinv172u:2087: yad anena pratyekabuddhasya bhrātur upasthānaṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavato bhrātā saṃvṛttaḥ upasthāyako bahuśrutaḥ śrutadharaḥ śrutasannicayaś ca.
V03vinv172u:2088: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:2089: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā ānandena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavatā bahuśrutāṇāṃ śrutadharāṇāṃ śrutasannicayāṇām agro nirdiṣṭa iti; bhagavān āha:

V03vinv172u:2155: atha bhagavān devadattasya idam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgatam utpannaṃ viditvā devadattam idam (SBV II 69)
V03vinv172u:2156: avocat: adhiśīle tvaṃ gautama yoniśo manasi kuru,
V03vinv172u:2158: anyac ca; adhicitte adhiprajñe tvaṃ gautama yoniśo manasi kuru; ṛddhiś ca te bhaviṣyati,

V03vinv172u:2164: athāyuṣmān ājñātakauṇḍinyo bhagavato mānasaṃ vyavalokya devadattasya cedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgataṃ viditvā devadattam idam avocat:

V03vinv172u:2168_0: sthaviro 'pi me kauṇḍinyo na vyapadiśati ṛddher mārgam iti viditvā āyuṣmān aśvajid
V03vinv172u:2168_1: bhadriko bāṣpo mahānāmā pūrṇo vimalo gavaṃpatiḥ subāhur yena paṃca sthaviraśatāni tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2171: atha paṃca sthaviraśatāni bhagavato mānasaṃ vyavalokya sthavirasthavirāṇāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ devadattasya cedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgataṃ viditvā devadattam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:2172: rūpaṃ tvaṃ devadatta yoniśo manasi kuru,
V03vinv172u:2174: anyac ca; vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārān vijñānaṃ tvaṃ devadatta yoniśo manasi kuru,
V03vinv172u:2177: paṃcāpi sthaviraśatāni ṛddher mārgaṃ na vyapadiśanti;
V03vinv172u:2178: kiṃ punar ebhir āyuṣmadbhir bhagavatā sārdhaṃ purvam eva saṅgītaṃ bhaviṣyati?
V03vinv172u:2179: tathā hi me na kaścid vyapadiśanti ṛddher mārgaṃ; atha devadattasyaitad abhavat*:
V03vinv172u:2180: atha ko nu me pratibalaḥ syād ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭuṃ?

V03vinv172u:2184: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapo rāhagṛhe viharati senikāguhāyaṃ [A_450b] atha devadattasyaitad abhavat*:
V03vinv172u:2185: ayaṃ sthaviro daśabalakāśyapo dīrgharātram aśaṭha amāyāvī;
V03vinv172u:2186: ṛjukaṛjukajātīyo bhrātṛsālohitasya ca me nandasya upādhyāyo bhavati;
V03vinv172u:2187: pratibalaś ca me sthaviro daśabalakāśyapaḥ ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭum iti viditvā yenāyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapas tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2189: āyuṣmato daśabalakāśyapasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
V03vinv172u:2190: ekāntasthito devadattaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ daśabalakāśyapam idam avocat*:
V03vinv172u:2192_0: athāyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapaḥ bhagavato mānasam avyavalokya sthavirasthavirāṇāṃ ca
V03vinv172u:2192_1: bhikṣūṇāṃ devadattasya cedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgatam utpannam ity aviditvā ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadiśati;
V03vinv172u:2193: tatra devadattena pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktena viharatā prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya ṛddhir abhinirhṛtā;
V03vinv172u:2197: tiraḥkuḍyaṃ tiraḥśailaṃ tiraḥprākāram asajjamānena kāyena gacchati tadyathā ākāśe;

V03vinv172u:2202: kiṃ punar me yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tato varṇagandharasopetānāṃ jambūpeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
V03vinv172u:2204: yadvā punar asyās sāmantakena bilvavanaṃ kapitthavanam āmalakīvanaṃ tato varṇagandharasopetānām āmalakapeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
V03vinv172u:2206: uttarakurudvīpaṃ gatvā akṛṣṭoptasya taṇḍulaphalaśāleḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
V03vinv172u:2208: cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān ca devān gatvā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
V03vinv172u:2210: ye vā te janapadā ṛddhāś ca yāvad ākirṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
V03vinv172u:2215: kiṃ punar aham asmin magadhakṣetre pradhānapuruṣam anvāvartayeyaṃ:
V03vinv172u:2218: ayam ajātaśatruḥ kumāraḥ pitur atyayāt paitryarājyaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāsyati;
V03vinv172u:2221: atha devadattaḥ abhijāto hastyājāneyo bhūtvā ajātaśatroḥ kumārasya [A_451a] niveśanam apadvāreṇa praviśya dvāreṇa pratiniṣkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:2222: dvāreṇa praviśya apadvāreṇa pratiniṣkrāmati abhijātaḥ aśvājāneyaḥ bhikṣur api muṇḍaḥ saṅghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2223: dahro 'pīdānīṃ kumāraḥ suvarṇamekhalādhārī bhūtvā ajātaśatroḥ kumārasya utsaṅge āvartate;
V03vinv172u:2225: ajātaśatrur api enaṃ kumāram āliṅgati cumbati pariṣvajati;
V03vinv172u:2227: tad api devadatto 'bhyavaharati yathāpital lābhasatkāreṇa abhibhūtaḥ paryādattacittaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:2228: tatrājātaśatruḥ kumāro bhūyasyā mātrayā pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ pratilabdhavān:
V03vinv172u:2229: mahardhikataro batāryo devadattaḥ śāstur antikāt* iti;
V03vinv172u:2231: paṃcamātrai rathaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sāyaṃ ca prātaś ca upasthānakaro niryāti;
V03vinv172u:2232: paṃcamātrāṇi cāsya sthālīpākaśatāni bhaktābhisāre bhaktābhisāre upasaṃharati;
V03vinv172u:2235: The gifts and honours of Ajātaśatru infatuate Devadatta and his magical powers leave him entirely
V03vinv172u:2236: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣan;
V03vinv172u:2237: aśrauṣuḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2239: rājāsya māgadhaḥ ajātaśatruḥ vaidehīputraḥ paṃcamātrai rathaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sāyaṃ ca prātaś ca upasthānakaro niryāti;
V03vinv172u:2240: paṃcamātrāṇi cāsya sthālīpākaśatāni bhaktābhisāre bhaktābhisāre upasaṃharati;
V03vinv172u:2241: devadattaḥ paṃcamātrair bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ bhaktāgra (SBV II 72)
V03vinv172u:2243: śrutvā punaḥ rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyāḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrantāḥ;
V03vinv172u:2244: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ;
V03vinv172u:2245: ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo bhagavantam idam avocan:
V03vinv172u:2246: iha vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ prāvikṣāma;
V03vinv172u:2247: aśrauṣma vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caranto:
V03vinv172u:2249: rājasya māgadhaḥ ajātaśatrur vaidehīputraḥ paṃcamātrai rathaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sāyaṃ ca prātaś ca upasthānakaro niryāti;
V03vinv172u:2250: paṃcamātrāṇi cāsya sthālīpākaśatāni bhaktābhisāre bhaktābhisāre upasaṃharati;
V03vinv172u:2251: devadatto 'pi paṃcamātrair bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ bhaktāgra upaniṣīdati;
V03vinv172u:2252: mā yūyaṃ bhikṣavo devadattasya lābhasatkāraṃ spṛhayata; tat kasya hetoḥ?
V03vinv172u:2255: tadyathā bhikṣavo vadhāya kadalī phalaṃ dadāti parābhavāya kadalī phalaṃ dadāti;
V03vinv172u:2258: tadyathā vadhāya veṇur naḍaḥ phalaṃ dadāti;
V03vinv172u:2264: yāvac ca bhikṣavo devadattasya ayam evaṃrūpo lābhasatkāraḥ utpadyate,
V03vinv172u:2265: tat kasya bhaviṣyati mohapuruṣasya dīrgharātram anarthāya duḥkhāya;
V03vinv172u:2266: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yal lābhasatkāram abhibhaviṣyāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2267: na ca na utpanno lābhasatkāraḥ cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati;
V03vinv172u:2269: phalaṃ vai kadalīṃ hanti phalaṃ veṇuṃ phalaṃ naḍam* /
V03vinv172u:2271: yāvad eva hy anarthāya jñāto bhavati bāliśaḥ /
V03vinv172u:2272: hanti bālasya śuklāṃsaṃ mūrdhno 'py asya nipātayat* //
V03vinv172u:2273: atha devadattasya lābhasatkārābhibhūtasya paryādattacittasya idam evaṃrūpo pāpakam icchāgatam utpannam:
V03vinv172u:2274: etarhi bhagavān jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ klāmyati catasraḥ parṣado 'vavaditum;
V03vinv172u:2275: aho vata bhagavān mama bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pratinisṛjet;
V03vinv172u:2277: bhagavān alpotsuko viharet dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāram anuyuktaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:2278: sahacittotpādāt sa punar devadattas tasya ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2279: parihīṇaś ca punar nājñāsīd ity apy ahaṃ parihīṇaḥ iti.
V03vinv172u:2281: Maudgalyāyana informs the Buddha as Devadatta is aiming at the direction of the congregation
V03vinv172u:2282: tena khalu samayena kakudo bhikṣuḥ kroḍaputro bhagavataḥ śrāvako bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryaṃ caritvā caturo brahmavihārān bhāvayitvā,
V03vinv172u:2285: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ bhārgaveṣu viharati śiśumāragirau bhīṣaṇikāvane mṛgadāve;
V03vinv172u:2286: atha kakudo brahmā devadattaṃ tasyā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaṃ viditvā,
V03vinv172u:2287: tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃkucitaṃ vā bāhuṃ prasārayet,
V03vinv172u:2288: prasāritaṃ vā saṃkucayed evam eva kakudo brahmā brahmaloke 'ntarhito bhārgaveṣu pratyaṣṭhād āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya purastād;
V03vinv172u:2289: atha kakudo brahmā āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*;
V03vinv172u:2290: yat khalu bhadanta maudgalyāyana jānīyā devadattasya lābhasatkāreṇābhibhūtasya paryādattacittasya idam evaṃrūpo pāpakam icchāgatam utpannam:
V03vinv172u:2291: etarhi bhagavān jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ klāmyati catasraḥ parṣado 'vavaditum; aho (SBV II 74)
V03vinv172u:2294: bhagavān alpotsuko viharet dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārayogam anuyuktaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:2295: sahacittotpādāt sa punas tasyā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2296: parihīṇaś ca punar nājñāsīd ity apy ahaṃ parihīṇa iti;
V03vinv172u:2297: bhadanta sādhu maudgalyāyana [A_452a] yena bahagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmeḥ;
V03vinv172u:2298: upasaṃkramya bhagavantam etam evārthaṃ vistareṇārocayeḥ anukampām upādāya;
V03vinv172u:2299: adhivāsayaty āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ kakudasya brahmaṇas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
V03vinv172u:2300: atha kakudo brahmā āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2301: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ aciraprakrāntaṃ kakudaṃ brahmāṇaṃ viditvā tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ,
V03vinv172u:2302: yathā samāhite citte bhārgeṣv antarhitaḥ rājagṛhe pratyaṣṭhād veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv172u:2304: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2305: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano yāvān evābhūt kakudena brahmaṇā sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāras tat sarvaṃ vistareṇārocayati;
V03vinv172u:2306: evam ukto bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
V03vinv172u:2307: na khalu maudgalyāyana devadattaḥ pūrvam eva cetasā spharitvā viditaḥ?
V03vinv172u:2308: kiṃ tataḥ paścāt kakudena brahmaṇā ārocitam?
V03vinv172u:2310: iyaṃ ca punar bhagavata āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena sārdham antarākathā viprasṛtā.
V03vinv172u:2312: Devadatta visits the Buddha and departs indignant
V03vinv172u:2313: atha devadattaś catubhir bhikṣubhiḥ sahāyakaiḥ kokālikena khaṇḍadravyeṇa kaṭamorakatiṣyeṇa samudradattena ca sārdhaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2314: adrākṣīd bhagavān devadattaṃ dūrād eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:2318: idānīṃ eṣa mohapuruṣo mama purastād ātmanaivātmānaṃ vyākariṣyati;
V03vinv172u:2320: pādau śirasā vanditvā tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ,
V03vinv172u:2321: yathā samāhite citte veṇuvane 'ntarhito bhārgaveṣu pratyaṣṭhād śiśumāragirau bhīṣaṇikāvane mṛgadāve.
V03vinv172u:2323: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
V03vinv172u:2325: etarhi bhagavān jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ klāmyati catasraḥ parṣado 'vavaditum;
V03vinv172u:2326: aho vata bhagavān mama bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pratinisṛjet;
V03vinv172u:2329: śāriputramaudgalyāyanayos tāvad ahaṃ mohapuruṣa peśalayoḥ sabrahmacāriṇor api bhikṣusaṃghaṃ na pratinisṛjāmi;
V03vinv172u:2330: kutaḥ punas tvayi nisrakṣyāmi śave kheṭāśake?
V03vinv172u:2334: tatra devadatto [A_452b] bhagavato 'ntike kopaṃ ca dveṣaṃ ca mānaṃ ca mrakṣaṃ ca āghātaṃ ca akṣāntiṃ ca apratyayaṃ ca prāviṣkārṣīt*;
V03vinv172u:2335: atha devadatto hum iti kṛtvā triḥ śiraḥ kampayitva bhagavato antikāt prakrāntaḥ.
V03vinv172u:2338: The sermon on the five Teachers
V03vinv172u:2339: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthito 'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā ca bhagavantaṃ vījayamānaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2341: gacchānanda yāvanto veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpam upaniśritya viharanti tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyāṃ sannipātaya;
V03vinv172u:2342: evaṃ bhadanta ity āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya,
V03vinv172u:2343: yāvanto bhikṣavo veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpam upaniśritya viharanti tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyāṃ sannipātya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2344: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
V03vinv172u:2346: idam avocat*: yāvanto bhadanta bhikṣavo veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpam upaniśritya viharanti,
V03vinv172u:2348: sannipatitāḥ; yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti.
V03vinv172u:2350: upasaṃkramya purastāt bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2352: paṃceme bhikṣavaḥ śāstāraḥ santaḥ saṃvidyamānā loke; katame paṃca?
V03vinv172u:2354: ihaikaḥ śāstā apariśuddhaśīla eva san pariśuddhaṃ me śīlam akliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2356: ayaṃ bhagavān śāstā apariśuddhaśīla eva san pariśuddhaṃ me śīlam asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2357: vayaṃ ced enaṃ pareṣām ārocayema tenāsya syād amanāpaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2358: yenāsya syād amanāpaṃ kiṃ vayaṃ tena śāstāraṃ samudācariṣyāmaḥ?
V03vinv172u:2359: eṣa bhagavān śāstā svayam eva pratijānāti;
V03vinv172u:2361: ity apy enaṃ śrāvakāḥ śīlavanto 'nurakṣitavyaṃ manyante;
V03vinv172u:2362: evaṃrūpaḥ śāstā śrāvakāṇām antikāt śīlānurakṣanaṃ pratyāśaṃsati;
V03vinv172u:2363: ayaṃ prathamaḥ śāstā san sanvidyamāno loke.
V03vinv172u:2365: punar aparam ihaikaḥ śāstā apariśuddhajīva eva pariśuddho me ajīvaḥ akliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2367: ayaṃ bhagavān śāstā apariśuddhajīva eva san pariśuddho me ājīva asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2368: vayaṃ ced enaṃ pareṣām ārocayema tenāsya syād amanāpaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2369: yenāsya syād amanāpaṃ kiṃ vayaṃ tena śāstāraṃ samudācariṣyāmaḥ?
V03vinv172u:2370: eṣa bhagavān śāstā svayam eva pratijānāti;
V03vinv172u:2372: ity apy enaṃ śrāvakāḥ ājīvato 'nurakṣitavyaṃ manyante;
V03vinv172u:2373: evaṃrūpaḥ śāstā śrāvakāṇām antikāt śīlānurakṣanaṃ pratyāśaṃsati;
V03vinv172u:2374: ayaṃ dvitīyaḥ śāstā san sanvidyamāno loke.
V03vinv172u:2376: punar aparam ihaikaḥ śāstā [A_453a] apariśuddhajñānadarśana eva san pariśuddhaṃ me jñānadarśanam akliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2379: apariśuddhajñānadarśana eva san pariśuddhaṃ me jñānadarśanam asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2380: vayaṃ ced enaṃ pareṣām ārocayema tenāsya syād amanāpaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2381: yenāsya syād amanāpaṃ kiṃ vayaṃ tena śāstāraṃ samudācariṣyāmaḥ?
V03vinv172u:2382: eṣa bhagavān śāstā svayam eva pratijānāti;
V03vinv172u:2384: ity apy enaṃ śrāvakāḥ jñānadarśanato 'nurakṣitavyaṃ manyante;
V03vinv172u:2385: evaṃrūpaḥ śāstā śrāvakāṇām antikād jñānadarśanānurakṣanaṃ pratyāśaṃsati;
V03vinv172u:2386: ayaṃ tṛtīyaḥ śāstā san sanvidyamāno loke.
V03vinv172u:2388: punar aparam ihaikaḥ śāstā asaṃpannavyākaraṇa eva san saṃpannaṃ me vyākaraṇam asaṃkliṣṭam iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2390: ayaṃ bhagavān śāstā asaṃpannavyākaraṇa eva san saṃpannaṃ me vyākaraṇam asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2391: vayaṃ ced enaṃ pareṣām ārocayema tenāsya syād amanāpaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2392: yenāsya syād amanāpaṃ kiṃ vayaṃ tena śāstāraṃ samudācariṣyāmaḥ?
V03vinv172u:2393: eṣa bhagavān śāstā svayam eva pratijānāti;
V03vinv172u:2395: ity apy enaṃ śrāvakāḥ saṃpannavyākaraṇo 'nurakṣitavyaṃ manyante;
V03vinv172u:2396: evaṃrūpaḥ śāstā śrāvakāṇām antikāt saṃpannavyākaraṇānurakṣanaṃ pratyāśaṃsati;
V03vinv172u:2397: ayaṃ caturthaḥ śāstā san sanvidyamāno loke.
V03vinv172u:2399: punar aparam ihaikaḥ śāstā durākhyātadharmavinaya eva san svākhyāto me dharmavinayaḥ asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2401: ayaṃ bhagavān śāstā durākhyātadharmavinaya eva san svākhyāto me dharmavinayaḥ asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
V03vinv172u:2402: vayaṃ ced enaṃ pareṣām ārocayema tenāsya syād amanāpaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2403: yenāsya syād amanāpaṃ kiṃ vayaṃ tena śāstāraṃ samudācariṣyāmaḥ?
V03vinv172u:2404: eṣa bhagavān śāstā svayam eva pratijānāti;
V03vinv172u:2406: ity apy enaṃ śrāvakāḥ svākhyātadharmavinayato 'nurakṣitavyaṃ manyante;
V03vinv172u:2407: evaṃrūpaḥ śāstā śrāvakāṇām antikāt svākhyātadharmavinayānurakṣanaṃ pratyāśaṃsati;
V03vinv172u:2408: ayaṃ paṃcamaḥ śāstā san sanvidyamāno loke.
V03vinv172u:2409: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ pariśuddhśīla eva san pariśuddhaṃ (SBV II 78)
V03vinv172u:2413: ayaṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ pariśuddhajīva eva san pariśuddho me ajīvaḥ asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijāne;
V03vinv172u:2416: ahaṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ pariśuddhajñānadarśana [A_453b] eva san pariśuddhaṃ me jñānadarśanam asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijāne;
V03vinv172u:2419: ahaṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ saṃpannavyākaraṇa eva san saṃpannaṃ me vyākaraṇam asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijāne;
V03vinv172u:2422: ahaṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ svākhyātadharmavinaya eva san svākhyāto me dharmavinayaḥ asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijāne;
V03vinv172u:2426: prasahya prasahya; na ca vo dhanayiṣye,

V03vinv172u:2663: yadā āyuṣmatā daśabalakāśyapena devadattasya ṛddher mārgo vyapadiṣṭaḥ,
V03vinv172u:2664: tadāsau bhikṣubhir ucyate: kasmāt tvayā sthavira devadattasya pāpecchasya ṛddher mārgo vyapadiṣṭaḥ?
V03vinv172u:2666: nāham āyuṣmanto jāne yathāyaṃ pāpeccha iti;
V03vinv172u:2667: yadi mayā jñātam abhaviṣyat ṛkāro 'py asya mayā na vyapadiṣṭo 'bhaviṣyat;
V03vinv172u:2672: na tvaṃ tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāmasi iti; te saṃlakṣayanti:
V03vinv172u:2673: apy eva nāmāyam asmābhiḥ prabodhitaḥ tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāmet;
V03vinv172u:2678: pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktena viharatā prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya ṛddhir abhinirhṛtā iti;
V03vinv172u:2679: sa vākpravyāharaṇakālasamanantaram eva tayā akṛtajñatayā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ.
V03vinv172u:2680: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:2681: paśya bhadanta devadattaḥ akṛtajñatayā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:2683: yathā atīte 'py adhvany eṣaḥ akṛtajñatayā vidyāyāḥ parihīṇaḥ; tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:2685: The story of an out-caste versed in magic and of a brāhmaṇa student
V03vinv172u:2687: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca; (SBV II 87)
V03vinv172u:2688: tatra caṇḍālo vidyāmantradharo vidyāmantrakuśalaḥ gāndhārīvidyāṃ parivartya ṛddhyā gandhamādanāt parvatāt akālartukāni puṣpaphalāny ādāya rājñe brahmadattāyopanayati;
V03vinv172u:2690: yāvad anyatamo māṇavo mantrārthī mantragavaṣī śravaparampayā janapadāt vārāṇasīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2691: tato mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya tasya caṇḍālasya vidyāmantradhāriṇaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2693: icchāmy aham upādhyāyasya śuśrūṣāṃ kartuṃ; kasyārthe?
V03vinv172u:2695: na vidyā kasyacid deyā martavyaṃ saha vidyayā /
V03vinv172u:2696: prayacched vidyayā vidyāṃ śuśrūṣābhir dhanena vā // <iti>
V03vinv172u:2697: sa kathayati: upādhyāya yady evam ahaṃ śuśrūṣāṃ karomi; kiyantaṃ kālaṃ kartavyā?
V03vinv172u:2699: dvādaśabhir varṣaiḥ śuśrūṣayā dīyeta vā na vā;
V03vinv172u:2701: tata ārādhanaparamaḥ satkṛtya guruśuśrūṣāṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2702: yāvad apareṇa samayenāsau caṇḍālo madyamadākṣipto gṛham āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:2710: yannv aham aṅgaṇikāyāṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ datvā avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2711: dharmatā hy eṣā śauṇḍānāṃ yo balavāṃs tasya vāntir bhavati;
V03vinv172u:2713: tena tīkṣṇamadyavegāt māṇavasya pṛṣṭhe vāntaṃ; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:2714: yady ahaṃ kāyaṃ cālayeyaṃ vācaṃ vā niścārayeyaṃ sthānam etad vidyate yad upādhyāyaḥ śabdaṃ śrutvā pratibuddho na punaḥ śayyāṃ kalpayet;
V03vinv172u:2716: yāvad caṇḍālaḥ svayam eva pratibuddhaḥ paśyati taṃ tathā viprakṛtaṃ; tataḥ pṛcchati,
V03vinv172u:2717: ko 'yaṃ; sa kathayati: upādhyāya ahaṃ somaśarmā; vatsa (SBV II 88)
V03vinv172u:2728: tato 'nyatra gamiṣyāmi iti; tena sā vidyā parivartitā; bhavanatalam utpatya,
V03vinv172u:2736: sa cātyarthaṃ vidyāmantradhārī akāmakaraṇīyaś ca brāhmaṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2738: tasya vṛttim ācchidya asmai māṇavāya dīyatām iti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:2740: tataḥ purohitena caṇḍālād vṛttim ācchidya tasmai brāhmaṇāya dattā;
V03vinv172u:2741: sa tayā akṛtajñatayā tasya vidyāyāḥ parihīṇaḥ.
V03vinv172u:2742: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yo 'sau caṇḍālaḥ eṣa evāsau daśabalakāśyapaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:2743: so 'sau māṇavaḥ eṣa eva asau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:2746: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kṛtajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2747: svalpam api kṛtaṃ na nāśayiṣyāmaḥ prāg eva prabhūtataram;
V03vinv172u:2751: atha bhagavān yathābhiramyaṃ rājagṛhe vihṛtya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛtaḥ bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ,
V03vinv172u:2752: magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran gayām anuprāptaḥ gayāyāṃ viharati;
V03vinv172u:2753: [A_457a] rājñā bimbisāreṇa bhagavataḥ parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni prāpitāni;
V03vinv172u:2755: paśya vṛddharājā śramaṇasya gautamasya kīdṛśān kārān karoti;
V03vinv172u:2757: asmākam api tvayā piṇḍakena avighātaḥ karaṇīyaḥ. (SBV II 89)
V03vinv172u:2759: devadattasyājātaśatruṇā rājñā parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni pratimārgaṃ preṣitāni;
V03vinv172u:2764: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:2765: paśya bhadanta rājā ajātaśatrur apātram apātravarṣī ca iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:2768: yathā atīte 'py adhvany eṣaḥ apātram apātravarṣī; tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:2770: The story of a mango tree
V03vinv172u:2771: (concerning a previous birth of prince Ajātaśatru)
V03vinv172u:2772: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasminn agrāmake araṇyāyatane ṛṣīṇām āśramapadaṃ,
V03vinv172u:2776: yāvat tasminn āśramapade āmravṛkṣaḥ phalabhārāvanataśākhaḥ pakvaphalas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:2778: yā tasmin vṛkṣe adhyuṣitā devatā sā mātsaryābhibhūtā na prayacchati;
V03vinv172u:2779: tatas te ṛṣayaḥ mūlārthinaḥ ekam ṛṣim āśramapade sthāpayitvā bhrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:2780: tatsamanantaram eva paṃca coraśatāny āśramapadam anuprāptāni;
V03vinv172u:2781: tair asau vṛkṣo dattaḥ; te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:2782: katham asmāt phalāni paribhoktavyāni iti; corasenāpatiḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:2783: vṛkṣaṃ paraśunā mūle chitvā phalāni bhakṣayata iti;
V03vinv172u:2784: evam ukte devatayā sarvāṇi phalāni bhūmyāṃ pātitāni;
V03vinv172u:2789: dadāti vṛkṣo na phalaṃ śāntānāṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ /
V03vinv172u:2790: dadāti tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ corāṇāṃ pāpakāriṇāṃ // iti
V03vinv172u:2794: mātsaryābhibhūtayā devatayā phalāni ṛṣīṇāṃ na dattāni;
V03vinv172u:2797: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yāsau devatā eṣa evāsav ajātaśatruḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:2798: tadāpy eṣa ajātaśatruḥ devatābhūtaḥ apātram apātravarṣī ca;
V03vinv172u:2799: etarhi apy eṣa apātram apātravarṣī ca iti. (SBV II 90)
V03vinv172u:2802: atha bhagavān magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran rājagṛham anuprāptaḥ rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv172u:2803: devadatto rājagṛhanivāsino janakāyasya nityam evāparādhaṃ karoti;
V03vinv172u:2805: sa bhagavata upālambhaṃ preṣayati; tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:2806: gaccha ānanda saṃghāṭīm [A_457b] ādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena rājagṛhe rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām ārocaya yad devadatto vā,
V03vinv172u:2808: na tena buddho vā dharmo vā saṃgho vā saṃbadhyate iti; yadi kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:2813: tena gatvā rājagṛhe nagararathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām ārocitaṃ,
V03vinv172u:2814: te na bhūyo bhagavata upālambhaṃ preṣayanti.
V03vinv172u:2819: tatra bhagavān jīvakaṃ vaidyarājam āmantrayate: āścaryaṃ jīvaka?
V03vinv172u:2822: jānāmi bhagavan; na jānāsi jīvaka; na cāpi sugata; 1)
V03vinv172u:2828: kim adbhutaṃ? bhagavan buddhotpādaḥ, saddharmasya ca deśanā, saṃghasya ca supratipattiḥ; 3)
V03vinv172u:2830: kiṃ na jānāsi? bhagavan kena kutra martavyam iti.
V03vinv172u:2831: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:2832: paśya bhadanta jīvakena bhagavataḥ saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ vijñātam iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:2834: yathā atīte 'py adhvany anena mama saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ vijñātaṃ; tac chrūyatāṃ. (SBV II 91)
V03vinv172u:2836: The story of a gṛhapati and his son
V03vinv172u:2841: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:2842: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:2843: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:2845: tasyās trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃṣatidivasān jātāyāḥ jātimahaṃ kṛtvā valayeti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2846: bhūyo 'py asya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2847: tasyāpi kulasadṛśaṃ nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:2848: jāto me ṛṇaharo dhanaharaś ca; gacchāmi paṇyam ādāya deśāntaram iti; bhūyaḥ sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:2849: iyaṃ mama patnī rūpavatī; yady aham asyāḥ prabhūtān kārṣāpaṇān datvā gacchāmi,
V03vinv172u:2850: sthānam etad vidyate yat parapuruṣaiḥ sārdhaṃ vikariṣyati;
V03vinv172u:2851: yannv aham asyāḥ svalpān kārṣāpaṇān datvā gaccheyam iti;
V03vinv172u:2854: grīvāyāṃ muktāhāraṃ baddhvā śmaśāne aśvakarṇasya mūle nikhanya paṇyam ādāya deśāntaraṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:2858: tatas tayā pūrvikayā patnyā valayā sa ca dārakaḥ hastabalena jñātibalena ca pāyitau,
V03vinv172u:2860: saṃvardhitau; tau kathayataḥ: amba pitā asmākaṃ kva gataḥ?
V03vinv172u:2862: putra asmin deśe amukam adhiṣṭhānaṃ tatra tiṣṭhati [A_458a] tasya ca mahatī dhanasaṃpattiḥ śrūyate,
V03vinv172u:2863: gaccha yadi kiṃcid asyojjīvanopāyas te bhaviṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:2864: sa pitaraṃ samanveṣamāṇaḥ anupūrveṇa tasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:2865: sa vīthyām anvāhiṇḍamānaḥ pitrā mukhabimbakena pratyabhijñātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2869: iti; tena vistareṇa samākhyātaṃ; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:2870: eṣa evāsau mama putraḥ iti; sa tena svagṛhītaḥ uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:2872: mamāyaṃ pitā iti; sa tasyātyarthaṃ snehaṃ kartuṃ ārabdhaḥ; (SBV II 92)
V03vinv172u:2873: tatas tair anyaiḥ putrair ucyate: tāta kasyāyaṃ dārakaḥ?
V03vinv172u:2875: mamāyaṃ vayasyasya putraḥ iti; taiḥ saṃlakṣitaṃ:
V03vinv172u:2876: yathāyam asyātyarthaṃ snehavān nūnam asyaiva putraḥ iti; te parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ:
V03vinv172u:2877: ayam aparo bhrātā iti; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:2880: sthānam etad vidyate yad enaṃ praghātayiṣyanti;
V03vinv172u:2881: yadi ca kiṃcid dāsyāmi antarmārge dāyādyakāraṇād ghātayiṣyanti;
V03vinv172u:2882: yannv aham evaṃ preṣayeyam iti viditvā cīrikā likhitvā dattā:
V03vinv172u:2884: tasmin khanan vai nipuṇo 'pramatto dāyādyam ātmīyam upaiṣyasi tvaṃ //
V03vinv172u:2885: kaṇṭhe tu yat tad valayāyā deyam iti.
V03vinv172u:2886: sa cīrikām ādāya saṃprasthitaḥ; antarmārge bhrātṛbhir gṛhītaḥ; uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:2887: kiṃ tvayā pituḥ sakāśāl labdhaṃ sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:2888: na kiṃcid iyaṃ cīrikā; te saṃlakṣayanti:
V03vinv172u:2892: anupūrveṇa svagṛhe praviṣṭo mārgaśramaṃ prativinodayati; mātrā abhihitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:2893: kiṃ tvayā pituḥ sakāśāl labdham iti; sa kathayati: na kiṃcid api,
V03vinv172u:2894: kiṃtu iyaṃ cīrikā; sā kathayati: vyaṃśitas tvaṃ tena,
V03vinv172u:2896: na kiṃcit saṃpannam iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:2897: amba mahātmāsau; na māṃ vyaṃśayiṣyati iti; sa tāṃ cīrikāṃ vācayitum ārabdhaḥ: grāmeti,
V03vinv172u:2901: hayā ucyante aśvāḥ; tatkarṇanāmā vṛkṣaḥ; aśvakarṇamūle ity uktaṃ bhavati; prāgbhūmita iti,
V03vinv172u:2904: sa evaṃ gāthārthaṃ vicārya niḥsaṃpātavelāyāṃ śmaśānaṃ gataḥ; tatsamīpe paśyati,
V03vinv172u:2906: sa tasya pūrve digbhāge yugamātraṃ māpayitvā khanitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2909: sa tam ādāya āttamanāttamano gṛhaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:2912: yo 'sau gṛhapatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:2913: yo 'sau tasya putraḥ eṣa evāsau jīvakaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:2914: tadāpy anena mama saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ vijñātaṃ.
V03vinv172u:2916: The sichness of the Buddha. The Buddha heals Devadatta
V03vinv172u:2919: na śakyam atyalpena ghṛtena cikitsāṃ kartuṃ;
V03vinv172u:2920: tena pātraṃ gṛhītvā dvātriṃśad ghṛtapalāni tulonmitāni kṛtvā bhagavate pradattāni;
V03vinv172u:2922: bhikṣavaḥ [A_458b] bhagavataḥ pātraśeṣam iti kṛtvā namasyanti.
V03vinv172u:2924: aham api ghṛtaṃ pibāmīti; tena jīvakaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ:
V03vinv172u:2925: jīvaka kiyati mātrā ghṛtasya śramaṇena gautamena pītā?
V03vinv172u:2928: aham api dvātriṃśat palāni pibāmi iti; jīvakaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:2931: tvaṃ punar na śakṣyasi jarayitum iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:2932: aham api vajraśarīraḥ; kimarthaṃ na jarayāmi?
V03vinv172u:2937: aparasminn eva divase jīvakena bhagavato maṇḍo dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2938: devadattena mānād bhagavān pibatīti ajīrṇe eva ghṛte maṇḍaḥ pītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2941: sa tannimittaṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām (SBV II 94)
V03vinv172u:2942: amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate; na rātrau na divā nidrām āsādayati.
V03vinv172u:2945_0: tato bhagavatā gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvataṃ bhitvā caktasvastikanandyāvartena
V03vinv172u:2945_1: anekapuṇyaśatanirjātena bhītānām āśvāsanakaraṃ karaṃ devadattasya sthāpayitvā satyopayācanaṃ kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2946: yena satyena yathā rāhulabhadre priye ekaputrake cittam anūnānadhikaṃ tathaiva devadatte tena satyena rujā śamaṃ gacched iti;
V03vinv172u:2956: devadatto bhagavatā satyopayācanayā pragāḍhavedanābhibhūtaḥ prāṇair viyujyamānaḥ svasthīkṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:2957: yaṃ śrutvā devadattapakṣyā apy atyantābhiniviṣṭā bhagavaty āścaryaṃ praveditavantaḥ:
V03vinv172u:2958: aho 'sya samyaksaṃpannā maitrī; aho satveṣu subhāvitā karuṇā iti.
V03vinv172u:2960: devadatta tvaṃ bhagavatā svasthīkṛtaḥ; anyathā prāṇair viyuktaḥ syāḥ iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:2962: yayā lokaṃ samanvāvartayati iti; bhikṣavaḥ kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:2965: svasthīkṛtas tvaṃ bhagavatā iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:2970: upasaṃkramya saṃśayajātaḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:2971: paśya bhadanta devadattaḥ akṛtajñaḥ akṛtavedī; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:2973: yathā [A_459a] atīte 'py adhvani eṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī; tac chrūyatāṃ. (SBV II 95)
V03vinv172u:2976: dvau ṛkṣau śibirājā ca vidārā jujjukena ca //
V03vinv172u:2978: The story of a Sage and of an ungrateful elephant
V03vinv172u:2980: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasminn agrāmake araṇyāyatane nānāvidhapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannam udyānaṃ;
V03vinv172u:2986: sā bhītā trastā kalabhaṃ parityajya mūtrapurīṣam utsṛjantī niṣpalāyitā;
V03vinv172u:2987: yāvad asau ṛṣir āśramapadān niṣkramya āśramapadasāmantakena diśo vyavalokayan saṃparibhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2989: tato 'sau ṛṣiḥ kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ tanmātṛsamanveṣaṇābhiniviṣṭabuddhiḥ samantato vyavalokayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2990: yadā sarvāvasthaṃ na paśyati tadā tam ādāyāśramapadaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2991: sa tena putravad āpāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:2999: sa yadā saṃjātarāgaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ tadā santarjyamāno 'py avajñāṃ karoti;
V03vinv172u:3000: yāvad apareṇa samayena ṛṣiṇā bhṛśaṃ tarjitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3004: na saṃgatiḥ kāpuruṣeṇa bhadrika kṛtaghnasatvena sudāruṇena /
V03vinv172u:3005: cirānuyāto 'pi karoti pāpikaṃ nāgo yathaivāśramakauśikasya // iti
V03vinv172u:3006: kim ādarād durjanaṃ sevase tvam annena pānena tathobhayena /
V03vinv172u:3007: avaśyam ante sa nihanti mitraṃ nāgo yathaivāśramakauśikasya // iti
V03vinv172u:3009: yo 'sau ṛṣir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3010: yo 'sau hastināgaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3013: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī, tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3017: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ atīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ mahendrasena nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:3019: yat kiṃcit svapne paśyati sarvaṃ tat tathaiva bhavati;
V03vinv172u:3020: tasya ca rājño vijite suvarṇapārśvo nāma bodhisatvaḥ mṛgeṣūpapanno mṛgāṇām adhipatiḥ;
V03vinv172u:3023: yas taṃ paśyati sa nirīkṣamānas tatraiva tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:3025: sa lubdhakabhayād anyalokabhayāc ca bhītaś carati;
V03vinv172u:3026: dharmatā hy eṣā aciravyativṛtte lokasanniveśe tiryañco 'pi vākpravyāharaṇasamarthā bhavanti;
V03vinv172u:3029: bho mātula kasmāt tvam evaṃ bhītabhītaś carasi?
V03vinv172u:3031: bhāgineya mamedaṃ rūpaṃ sarvalokaśubhaṃ saṃprārthanīyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:3032: so 'haṃ lokabhayāl lubdhakabhayāc ca bhītabhītaś (SBV II 97)
V03vinv172u:3039: yāvad anyatamaḥ puruṣo dviṣadbhiḥ paścādbāhugāḍhabandhanabaddho navāmbupūrṇāyāṃ hemalohyāṃ hemamālinyāṃ śīghrasrotasi nadyāṃ prakṣiptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3041: bhavāmi kasya dāso 'haṃ kasya vā paricārakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3042: yo me 'dya jīvitaṃ dadyād yal lokeṣu sudurlabham // iti;
V03vinv172u:3043: daivād asau mṛgādhipatiḥ salilāśayāt mṛgagaṇaparivṛto nadīsamīpam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3044: tataḥ puruṣavirāvaṃ śrutvā te mṛgāḥ samantād vidrutāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3045: dharmatā hy eṣā bodhisatvānāṃ yad api kāyena vinipatanti,
V03vinv172u:3047: tataḥ sa mṛgādhipatiḥ kāruṇyād āmreḍitahṛdayaḥ sahasā nadīm avatartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3048: kākaś cāsya pūrvamaryādāvadhṛtamatiḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ anubaddha eva saṃrakṣaṇāya;
V03vinv172u:3049: sa taṃ puruṣaṃ kṛtoddharaṇavyavasāyaṃ viditvā evam āha:
V03vinv172u:3052: akṛtajñā hy ete manuṣyāḥ nopakāraṃ manyante iti;
V03vinv172u:3054: sa tasya vacanam avacanaṃ kṛtvā nadīm avagāhya taṃ puruṣaṃ priyam ivaikaputraṃ pṛṣṭham abhirohya,
V03vinv172u:3059: vatsa anena pathā yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha iti;
V03vinv172u:3060: tato 'sau puruṣaḥ kṛtāṃjaliḥ pādayor nipatya taṃ mṛgādhipatim idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:3061: tava dāso hy ahaṃ tāta tavaiva paricārakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3062: tvayā me jīvitaṃ dattaṃ yal lokeṣu sudurlabham // iti
V03vinv172u:3064: ma me tvam adya dāsaḥ syāḥ mā caiva paricārakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3065: na vācyas tv aham anyebhyo hanyur māṃ carmakāraṇāt //
V03vinv172u:3066: api tu vatsa idaṃ tvayā kartavyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3067: kṛte pratyupakārāt nāhaṃ tvayā kasyacin nivedyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3068: atilobhanīyam idaṃ me śarīraṃ prārthanīyaṃ sarvalokasya iti;
V03vinv172u:3069: tatas sa puruṣa tatheti pratijñāya mṛgādhipatiṃ (SBV II 98)
V03vinv172u:3071_0: yāvad apareṇa samayena candraprabhā devī ratiparikhedakhinnā mahāśayane atyarthaṃ
V03vinv172u:3071_1: middham avakrāntā rātryāḥ paścime yāme svapnam adrākṣīd atiparamaramaṇīyaśarīraṃ
V03vinv172u:3071_2: mṛgādhipatiṃ siṃhāsane niṣadya mahatyāṃ rājaparṣadi dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3072: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pratyakṣavat svapnadarśanasaṃjanitasaumanasyā laghu laghv eva mahāśayanād utthāya rājño niveditavatī;
V03vinv172u:3073: śrutvā rājā tasyāḥ satyasvapnāyāḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3074: aniṣṭagatyupapannena satā kathaṃ nāma siṃhāsane niṣadya mahatyāṃ rājaparṣadi dharmo deśayitavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3075: tataś candraprabhā devī priyamadhuracāturyakathāsamudācārayogena muhūrtaṃ rājānam upalāḍya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3076: deva kriyatāṃ yatnaḥ tasya mṛgasyānayanāya iti; tato rājñā amātyānām [A_460a] ājñā dattā:
V03vinv172u:3077: bhavanto yāvanto madviṣayanivāsino mṛgalubdhakās tiṣṭhanti te sarve matsakāśam upaneyāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3079: devaḥ samājñāpayati madviṣayanivāsibhir mṛgalubdhakair ihāgantavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:3080: tad yuṣmābhiḥ sarvamṛgalubdhakā iha preṣayitavyāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3081: taiḥ sarve viṣayanivāsino mṛgalubdhakā rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ preṣitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3083: bhavanto śrutaṃ mayā madvijite paramaramaṇīyarūpavigraho mṛgo 'stīti;
V03vinv172u:3084: sa yuṣmābhir mṛduśithilabandhanopanibaddho matsakāśam akhedita upaneyaḥ iti; te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:3086: iyatā kālena devasya vijite paryaṭadbhir na kadācid evaṃvidho mṛgavaraḥ śrutapūrvaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3087: kimuta dṛṣṭaḥ tam arhati devaḥ śravaparamparayā samanveṣya amuṣmin deśe tiṣṭhatīti;
V03vinv172u:3089: evaṃ devasya vayaṃ niyatam ājñāṃ saṃpādayāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3091: bhavanto vārāṇasyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayata samājñāpayati devaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3093: yo me tasya pravṛttiṃ nivedayati tam ahaṃ mahatā satkāreṇa satkaromi;
V03vinv172u:3095: amātyai rājñaḥ pratiśrutya vārāṇasyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritaṃ:
V03vinv172u:3096: śṛṇvantu bhavanto vārāṇasīnivāsinaḥ paurā nānādeśābhyāgatāś ca janāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3097: deva evaṃ samājñāpayati madvijite atiparamaramaṇīyavigraho mṛgādhipatir asti;
V03vinv172u:3098: yo me tasya pravṛttiṃ nivedayati tam ahaṃ mahatā satkāreṇa satkaromi;
V03vinv172u:3104: nāsti kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karma akaraṇīyam iti sa kāmanidānotthena dveṣavahnitīvreṇa santāpitahṛdayaḥ saṃlakṣayti:
V03vinv172u:3107: kiṃ mayā punas tādṛśī avasthā prāpayitavyā?
V03vinv172u:3109: sa prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ rājñaḥ parṣadi sanniṣaṇṇasya rājakāryam adhitiṣṭhataḥ,
V03vinv172u:3110: anivārite rājakuladvāre nānāvicitrasurabhipuṣpāṇy ādāya dauvārikāmātyaparaṃparayā rājānaṃ saṃśrāvya parṣadam abhyavagāhya satkāravidhipūrvakeṇa rājño niveditayati:
V03vinv172u:3111: amuṣmin deśe nānātaruṣaṇḍamaṇḍite viśvastamṛgapakṣiṇi suvarṇapārśvo mṛgādhipatir anekamṛgagaṇaparivṛtas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:3112: ahaṃ taṃ devasya atiramaṇīyavigrahaṃ mṛgavaram upadarśayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:3113: tato rājā tacchravaṇasaṃjanitasaumanasyaḥ anekāmātyaśatasahasraparivṛtaḥ kutūhalajātenānyena nānādeśābhyāgatena vārāṇasīnivāsinā ca paurajānapadena saṃpuraskṛtaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3116: yāvad asau kākaḥ bodhisatvasya kṛtāvadhiḥ diśām avalokakaḥ tasmin vanaṣaṇḍavṛkṣaśikhare niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3119: mṛgarāja mayā tvaṃ pūrvam uktaḥ akṛtajñā manuṣyāḥ,
V03vinv172u:3122: ayaṃ sa puruṣo mahatā prābhṛtenāgataḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3127: kāmaṃ svaprāṇavināśo na tu satvādhyupekṣaṇam iti viditvā rājānaṃ pratyudgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3128: tataḥ sa puruṣo nirghṛṇahṛdayas tyaktaparaloko mṛgadarśanād āvarjitamatis taṃ mṛgavaram ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyām upadarśayann āha:
V03vinv172u:3130: atyudīrṇaparipūrṇāni hi karmāṇi na vipākakālam apekṣante;
V03vinv172u:3131: vākpravyāharaṇakālasamanantaram eva tasya puruṣasya ubhau pāṇī pṛthivyāṃ nipatitau;
V03vinv172u:3132: tataḥ sa rājā saṃvegajātas taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭavān: bhoḥ puruṣa kim idam?
V03vinv172u:3133: iti; sa duḥkhavedanābhyāhataḥ sagadgadaṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:3134: nāsau coro mahārāja haraty arthaṃ nihatya yaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3135: sa tu coro mahārāja yasya nāsti kṛtajñatā // (SBV II 100)
V03vinv172u:3137: iti; tena sarvaṃ yathāvistareṇa samākhyātaṃ; tato rājā akṛtajñapuruṣaṃ gāthayā pratyābhāṣata:
V03vinv172u:3142: tato rājā bodhisatvasya tāṃ prabhāvamahattāṃ jñātvā amātyān āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:3147: candanavāripariṣiktaṃ surabhidhūpaghaṭikopanibaddham ucchṛtadhvajapatākam āmuktapaṭṭādāmakalāpaṃ nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ,
V03vinv172u:3151: tato rājñā asāv atiramaṇīyavigraho mṛgādhipatir mahatyā vibhūtyā vārāṇasīṃ nagarīṃ praveśya siṃhāsane niṣāditaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3152: tato mahatyā rājaṛddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena rājā sāntaḥpurakumārāmātyapaurajānapadais parivārya niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3153: atha mṛgādhipatibodhisatvena samantāt tāṃ parṣadam avalokya rājñas tasyāś ca parṣadas tathāvidho dharmo deśitaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3154: yaṃ śrutvā rājñā saparivāreṇa paṃcaśikṣāpadāni gṛhītāni;
V03vinv172u:3159: yo 'sau suvarṇapārśvo mṛgādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3160: yo 'sau puruṣaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3163: punar api yathā devadattaḥ akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3165: The story of a lord of monkeys and of a maker of garlands
V03vinv172u:3169: sa divā divasam eva nadīpuṣpāṇy (SBV II 101)
V03vinv172u:3171: yāvad apareṇa samayena nadīm uttaratā āmraphalam uhyamānam anārtavaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3178: deva īdṛśāny āmraphalāni dātum arhasi iti; rājñā pratīhāraḥ pṛṣṭaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3181: dauvārikeṇa dattam iti; dauvārikaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3183: bhavanta aāhūyatāṃ mālākāraḥ iti; rājapuruṣair āhūtaḥ; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3185: tena yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyātaṃ; rājñā tasyaivājñā dattā: gaccha,
V03vinv172u:3189: tena pūrvakāmraphalānusāreṇa sambalam ādāya gacchatā parvataikadeśe sa āmravṛkṣo dṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3192: tataḥ sa mālākāras taṃ vṛkṣam itaś cāmutaś ca nirīkṣate samdhiroḍhuṃ;
V03vinv172u:3194: tasy tatra āmraphalāśayād bahavo divasā atikrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3197: yathā vā tathā vā adhiruhāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:3198: sa pāṣāṇan avalambya avalambya adhiroḍhum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3200: tasmiṃś ca parvate vānarabhūto bodhisatvo vānarāṇām adhipatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:3201: daivād asau tasmin parvate yūtham apahāya taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3203: kuśalā bhavanti bodhisatvāḥ teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
V03vinv172u:3204: sa tasya hitādhānatatparatayā na śakyate kramam antareṇa uddhartum iti pāṣāṇair abhyāsaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3205: yadāsya parividitaḥ śaknomy aham enam uddhartum iti tadā sa tena prapātāt krameṇoddhṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3206: pāṣāṇavyāyāmāt tasya ca mālākārasyoddharaṇād atīva pariśrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3210: iti; tena yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyātaṃ; bodhisatvaḥ saṃlakṣayati: gato (SBV II 102)
V03vinv172u:3213: anikṣiptotsāhaḥ sa mahātmā parahitādhānatatparaḥ pariśrānto 'pi taṃ vṛkṣam adhiruhya āmraphalāni pātayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3219: bhoḥ puruṣa digavalokanaṃ tāvat kuru; pariśrānto 'smi; muhūrtaṃ svapāmi iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3220: evaṃ kuruṣva; sa middham avakrāntaḥ; puruṣaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:3221: kṣīṇapathyadano 'haṃ yady āmraphalaṃ bhakṣayan gamiṣyāmi rājñaḥ kiṃ mayā deyaṃ?
V03vinv172u:3222: [A_461b] tasmād etam eva vānaraṃ hatvā śuṇḍīvallūrakāṇi kṛtvā mārgaṃ gacchāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:3223: tenāsau nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena mahatyā śilayā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3226: ekatyās tu manuṣyāḥ kṛtam upakāraṃ na jānanti //
V03vinv172u:3228: yo 'sau markaṭādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3229: yo 'sau mālākaraḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3232: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3234: The story of a lord of a dārukoṭaka bird and a lion
V03vinv172u:3236: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ anyatamasminn agrāmake araṇyāyatane parvatagiriguhāpravaṇe puṣpaphalasamṛddhe pakṣiṣūpapanno dārukoṭako babhūva;
V03vinv172u:3237: tasminn eva ca parvataikadeśe siṃho mṛgarājaḥ yatheṣṭapracāravihāratayā mṛgān praghātya praghātya bhakṣayati;
V03vinv172u:3238: tasyāpareṇa samayena māṃsaṃ bhakṣayataḥ asthi dantāntareṇa praviṣṭaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3242: daivāt sa dārukoṭako vṛkṣāntarasañcārābhyāsād yasmin pradeśe mṛgādhipatis taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3243: tena asau siṃho duḥkhavedanābhyāhato dṛṣṭaḥ; uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:3246: sa kathayati: bhāgineya duḥkhavedanābhyāhato 'smi; kīdṛśaṃ tava duḥkhaṃ?
V03vinv172u:3251: tat tvayā mama kālena kālaṃ yogodvahanaṃ kartavyaṃ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3252: evaṃ bhavatu; kariṣyāmi iti; sa dārukoṭakaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:3253: tathāsya cikitsāṃ karomi yathā kṛtam api na jānīte;
V03vinv172u:3256: yāvad asau mṛgādhipatiḥ sukhavāyusaṃsparśaviṣkambhitāsyo mahatyāṃ pṛthivīśilāyāṃ vāmapārśvaṃ śirasy ādhāya middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3257: tato 'sau dārukoṭakas tasya mṛgādhipates samīpam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3258: paśyati tathā tathā vipralambhavihāriṇaṃ; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:3260: iti viditvā suparīkṣitaṃ kṛtvā dantānataravilagnam asthi pakṣanipātakrameṇa sahasā apakṛṣya mukhavivarān niṣkramya tam eva nirīkṣamāṇo vṛkṣe 'vasthitaḥ niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3261: tataḥ sa mṛgādhipatir asthiśalyāpahārasaṃjanitasaumanasyo nidrāklamaṃ prativinodya utthāya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3262: athāsau dārukoṭakaḥ taṃ mṛgādhipatiṃ vyapagataduḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ viditvā pramuditamanās tatsamīpam upasaṃkramya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3263: mātula idaṃ tad asthi tava duḥkhanimittabhūtam iti;
V03vinv172u:3264: tato 'sau mṛgādhipatiḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3265: bhāgineya asyopakārasya mayā tavāvaśyaṃ pratyupakāraḥ kartavyaḥ kālena kālam upasaṃkramethāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3266: śobhanam eva tathā bhavatu ity uktvā sa dārukoṭakaḥ prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3267: yāvad apareṇa samayena sa [A_462a] mṛgādhipatir māṃsaṃ bhakṣayati;
V03vinv172u:3268: sa ca dārukoṭakaḥ śyenakasya pakṣiṇaḥ kramāntaraparibhraṣṭaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3269: mṛtam iva ātmānaṃ manyamānaḥ kṣudhāparigatahṛdayaḥ tasya mṛgādhipateḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ ārtinivedanaṃ kṛtvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3273: daṃṣṭrāntarālasaktas tvaṃ jīvan na bahumanyase // iti
V03vinv172u:3276: naṣṭaṃ kāpuruṣe sevā akṛtajñe ca yat kṛtam // iti
V03vinv172u:3278: yo 'sau dārukoṭakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3279: yo 'sau siṃho mṛgarājaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3282: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3284: The story of a lord of a bear and a poor man
V03vinv172u:3286: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇāsyāṃ nagaryām anyatamo daridrapuruṣaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:3288: so 'pareṇa samayena kālyam evotthāya paraśum ābhaṅgīm ādāya kāṣṭhārthī vanaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3290: tataḥ sa puruṣaḥ yuktaṃ vāyuktaṃ vā idam iti sthānāntarasamanveṣaṇayā vṛkṣād vṛkṣāntaraṃ gacchati;
V03vinv172u:3294: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā santrasto niṣpalāyitum ārabdhaḥ; ṛkṣaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3298: sa jātaśaṅko 'pi sādhvasān na śaknoti gantuṃ;
V03vinv172u:3299: tatas tena ṛkṣeṇa bāhubhyām upagṛhya dhāritaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3301: saptāhadurdinaṃ ca saṃvṛttaṃ; varṣaty eva devaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3303: saptāhasyātyayād aṣṭame divase vyabhre dine vigatabalāhake deve ṛkṣeṇa caturdiśaṃ vyavalokya prabhūtāni mūlaphalāni datvā sa puruṣaḥ abhihitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3309: tāta gacchāmi; api tu mayā tava pratyupakāraḥ kartavyaḥ iti; sa kathayati (SBV II 105)
V03vinv172u:3311: yathā māṃ na kasyacin nivedayasi iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3313: sa taṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pādayor nipatya prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3317: mitra tvam iyatā kālena ihāgataḥ; putradāraṃ te viklavībhūtam; atīva virauti:
V03vinv172u:3318: tvaṃ kilākālasāptāhikameghena śvāpadena vā praghātitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3321: iti; tena yathāvṛtaṃ sarvam ārocitaṃ; sa kathayati: vayasya kāmaṃ yena vā tena vā jīvikaṃ kalpayāmi,
V03vinv172u:3323: sa tena tathā tathā pratilobhito māṃsapratyaṃśadvayena yathā pratipanno mārgam upadarśayan saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3324: yāvad anupūrveṇa [A_462b] guhām anuprāptaḥ yatrāsau mahātmā ṛkṣas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:3325: tato nairghṛṇyam āsthāya akṛtajñatāṃ ca kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3327: tatas tena lubdhena paraprāṇoparodhinā guhāyām agnir dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3328: atha sa mahātmā ṛkṣo dhūmavyākulīkṛtamanā aśruparyākuleṣaṇo gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv172u:3329: kasya kiṃ vyapanītaṃ me vasatā girigahvare /
V03vinv172u:3333: ity uktvā kālagataḥ; tatas tair viśasyamāṃsasya bhāgān kṛtvā sa kṛtaghnapuruṣo 'bhihitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3337: tatas tena mṛgalubdhakena taṃ tathā viprakṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā hā kaṣṭaṃ hā kaṣṭam ity uktvā svakān api pratyaṃśān parityajya prakrāntam;
V03vinv172u:3338: etad atyadbhutaṃ śrutvā mahājanakāyas tasmin pradeśe sannipatitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3341: tato rājā brahmadattas tasya carma gṛhītva vismayotphullalocanaḥ (SBV II 106)
V03vinv172u:3342: etam arthaṃ bhikṣusaṃghāya nivedayāmīti taṃ saṃghārāmaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3343: carma puṣkariṇyāṃ sthāpayitvā vṛddhānte niṣaṇṇaḥ saṃghasyaitam arthaṃ vistareṇa rocayati;
V03vinv172u:3347: pūjanīyas tribhir lokaiḥ tvayāpy eṣa narottama // iti
V03vinv172u:3352: tato rājā brahmadattaḥ sāntaḥpurakumārāmātyapaurajānapadaḥ sarvagandhakāṣṭhāny ādāya taṃ pradeśam abhigataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3353: sarvaṃ tan māṃsam asthi kalebaraṃ ca ekadhye kārayitvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3354: bhavantaḥ sarvagandhakāṣṭhaiś citāṃ citvā mahatā satkāreṇa dhyāpayata iti;
V03vinv172u:3355: tasmiṃś ca pradeśe mahān stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3358: yaiś ca tatra kārāḥ kṛtāḥ te sarve mokṣaparāyaṇāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ.
V03vinv172u:3360: yo 'sau ṛkṣaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3361: yo 'sāv akṛtajñaḥ puruṣaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3364: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3366: Another story of a bear of a poor man
V03vinv172u:3368: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇāsyāṃ nagaryām anyatamo daridrapuruṣaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:3370: so 'pareṇa samayena kālyam evotthāya paraśum ābhaṅgīm ādāya kāṣṭhārthī vanaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3371: tatparvatapradeśe vividhataruṣaṇḍamaṇḍite nānāpuṣpaphalasamṛddhe aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ ṛkṣeṣūpapannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3372: yāvad asau kāṣṭhahārakaḥ kāṣṭhāni paryeṣamāṇaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe vyāghreṇābhidrutaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3374: vṛkṣam abhirūḍho yasminvṛkṣe sa ṛkṣo bodhisatvas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:3377: sa ca vyāghra āhāragṛddhas taṃ vṛkṣatalaṃ naiva muñcati;
V03vinv172u:3379: bho mahātmann ete manuṣyāḥ kṛṣṇaśirasaḥ akṛtajñāḥ bhavanti;
V03vinv172u:3386: tathāpy asau vyāghraḥ māṃsaśoṇitābhilāṣī tiṣṭhaty eva;
V03vinv172u:3392: sa tasyotsaṅganiṣaṇṇaḥ śramakheditapariṣrāntaś ca middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3394: bhoḥ puruṣa kiyantaṃ kālaṃ tvayātra sthātavyaṃ?
V03vinv172u:3396: iti; sa nirghṛṇahṛdayaḥ pāpakarmā tyaktaparalokaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:3397: śobhanam eṣa kathayati; kiyantaṃ kālaṃ mayātra sthātavyaṃ?
V03vinv172u:3400: tena mahātmanā patatābhihitaṃ hā nai vā te hā kiṃ cit dus se mi ity uktvā patitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3402: sa tasya saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:3407: hā nai vā te hā kiṃ cit dus se mi iti;
V03vinv172u:3410: te vidyāmantradhāriṇo bhūtacikitsakān anyāṃś ca śramaṇabrāhmaṇān suhṛtsambandhibāndhavān pṛcchati;
V03vinv172u:3413: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nātidūre āśramapade vividhataruṣaṇḍamaṇḍite puṣpaphalasalilasaṃpanne anekavihaganikūjite ṛṣiḥ paṃcābhijñaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:3414: tasya puruṣasya jñātayas taṃ puruṣan ādāya tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ pādayor nipatya kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:3419: anena durātmanā kṛtopakārī bodhisatvo vyāghrasya purastāt pātitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3420: tena mahātmanā cintitam asmai dharmaṃ deśayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:3422: tasya patato bhrāntasya daśānāṃ ślokānām ekaikam akṣaraṃ pratibhātaṃ hā nai vā te hā kiṃ cit dus se mi iti;
V03vinv172u:3425: upādhyāya kathayasva tāvat kīdṛśas te ślokāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3426: sa ṛṣir anupūrveṇa tān ślokān kathayitum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3427: hā kāṣṭaṃ bata loke 'smin adharmaḥ khalu dāruṇaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3428: asaty eṣu manuṣyeṣu hiṃsā mitreṣu vidyate // 1 //
V03vinv172u:3429: naivāsane na śayane nāpi caiva ca caṅkrame /
V03vinv172u:3430: na kasyāṃcid avasthāyāṃ mitradruk sukham edhate // 2 //
V03vinv172u:3431: vāṇī te karuṇārttena tatā yā caiva bhāṣitā /
V03vinv172u:3432: sā tvāṃ dahati durbuddhe khāṇḍavaṃ jvalitaṃ yathā // 3 //
V03vinv172u:3433: tena hi tvaṃ pare loke 'nubhaviṣyasi vedanām //
V03vinv172u:3435: hā heti krandamānas tvaṃ raurave bhṛśadāruṇe /
V03vinv172u:3437: kiṃ te na prakṛtaṃ karma raudrasyāśubhakarmaṇaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3439: cittaṃ pāpaṃ vyavasyanti dharmalopo [A_463b] hi dhāruṇaḥ /
V03vinv172u:3440: smara ṛkṣaṃ ca vyāghraṃ ca yat pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ tvayā // 7 //
V03vinv172u:3441: durbuddhe tvaṃ na jānīṣe yathā mitreṣu vartitum /
V03vinv172u:3442: hantāraṃ labhate hantā vairī vairāṇi paśyati // 8 //
V03vinv172u:3443: sevitas tvaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ prāpte vyāghramahābhaye /
V03vinv172u:3444: rakṣitaś ca śayānas tvaṃ tvayāsau kiṃ na rakṣitaḥ // 9 //
V03vinv172u:3448: yo 'sau ṛkṣaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3449: yo 'sau kṛtaghnaḥ satvaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3452: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3454: The story of the king Śibi
V03vinv172u:3456: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo śibighoṣāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ śibir nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ (SBV II 109)
V03vinv172u:3458: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgi nissaṅgaparityāgī mahati ca tyāge vartate;
V03vinv172u:3459: tasya nāsti kiṃcid adattam aparityaktaṃ yaduta śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyaḥ kṛpaṇebhyo vaṇīpakebhyaḥ adhvagebhyaḥ yācanakebhyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3460: yadbhūyasā tu glānebhyaḥ ācaritaṃ tasya rājñaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3461: kālyam evotthāya mātāpitarāv abhivādya glānāvalokyanaṃ kṛtvā arthādhikaraṇe niṣīdati;
V03vinv172u:3463: sa sarvavaidyapratyākhyāto nirapekṣo jīvite maraṇābhimuktaḥ tena tenānvāhiṇḍamānaḥ śibighoṣāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3464_0: tasmiṃś ca samaye rājā saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpitaphaliteṣu pādapeṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukākokilajīvañjīvonnādite
V03vinv172u:3465: sa ca vyādhitas tīvrarujopatāpasaṅjanitadaurmanasyo muhuḥ śvāsoparudhhyamānatanur aśruparyākulekaṇo daṇḍapāṇiḥ śanaiḥ śanai rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3469: tataḥ śibirājā karuṇadīnavilambitair akṣarair ucyamānas tadāturavacanaṃ śrutvā kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ tatra eva pratinivṛttaḥ amātyān āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:3473: tato rājā taṃ puruṣaṃ śabdayitvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3474: bhavantaḥ kurutāsya cikitsām iti; vaidyā vicāryaikamatena kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:3475: deva yaḥ puruṣaḥ janmano na kasyacid ruṣitapūrvaḥ tasya rudhireṇa yavāgūṃ sādhayitvā yadi bhojyate,
V03vinv172u:3476: evam ayaṃ svasthībhavati; nānyathā iti; śrutvā rājā saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:3479: īdṛśena yo 'haṃ pareṣāṃ duḥkhārtānāṃ na śaknomi śāntiṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:3480: evaṃ vicintya rājā svasantatiṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhaḥ; tena dhātrī pṛṣṭā:
V03vinv172u:3483: deva yadā [A_464a] tvaṃ mamāṃsagatas tadā aham api na kasyacid ruṣitapūrvā;
V03vinv172u:3486: putra yadā tvaṃ mama kukṣigatas tadā aham api na kasyacid ruṣitapūrvā,
V03vinv172u:3488: idānīṃ saṃpannaṃ bhaiṣajyam iti; tena vaidyā uktāḥ:
V03vinv172u:3491: deva na vayaṃ prākṛtapuruṣasyārthāya devasya kāye śastraṃ nipātayāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3492: kuśalā bhavanti bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
V03vinv172u:3493: tena svayam eva paṃcasu gātreṣu śirā muktā;
V03vinv172u:3499: kathaṃ nāma ekasya prākṛtasatvasyārthāya iyantaḥ satvāḥ parityajyante?
V03vinv172u:3502: tad anenopāyena ṣaṇ māsān paṃcasu gātreṣu śirā muktā;
V03vinv172u:3508: na śobhanaṃ; te tasya pratyaham oja upaharanti,
V03vinv172u:3509: yenāsau yāpayati; yadā tasya puruṣasya vyādhir upaśāntaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3510: tadā śibinā rājñā paṃcabhir grāmavaraiḥ saṃvibhaktaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3513: śibinā rājñā paṃcasu gātreṣu śirā muktā;
V03vinv172u:3514: svarudhireṇa glānasya iyantaṃ kālam upasthānaṃ kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3516: tataḥ kutūhalajātaḥ satvā āgamya taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchanti:
V03vinv172u:3517: bhoḥ puruṣa satyaṃ tava kila śibinā rājñā iyantaṃ kālam upasthānaṃ kṛtam?
V03vinv172u:3518: iti; sa kathayati: kiṃ mamānena kṛtaṃ?
V03vinv172u:3519: duṣṭaśoṇitaṃ pṛthivyāṃ vā choryeta anyasya vā dīyeta,
V03vinv172u:3522: yenāsya gṛhaṃ sarvaṃ ca svāpateyaṃ dagdhaṃ.
V03vinv172u:3524: yo 'sau śibī rājā aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3525: yo 'sau kṛtaghnaḥpuruṣaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3528: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3532: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasyāṃ rājadhānyām anyatamo rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:3533: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:3536: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:3537: dārako jātaḥ abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaḥ chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūs tuṅganāso [A_464b] sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3539: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv172u:3543: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya kalyāṇakārīti nāma iti;
V03vinv172u:3546: dvābhyām aṃśadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:3547: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
V03vinv172u:3548: bhūyaḥ sa rājā devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:3549: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:3550: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:3555: kalyāṇakārī kumāro maitryātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sarvasatveṣu dayāvān dānarucir dānābhirataḥ;
V03vinv172u:3556: sa śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavaṇīpakayācanakebhyo dānaṃ dadāti; sa pitrā ucyate:
