V03vinv172u:3557: putra mā tvaṃ satataṃ dānam anuprayaccha;
V03vinv172u:3558: kuto 'smākam etāvad dhanajātaṃ bhaviṣyati yannv aham anvaham evaṃ dāsyāmīti;
V03vinv172u:3559: dharmatā hy eṣā dātur dānapater yad bahujanasya priyo bhavati manāpaś ca;
V03vinv172u:3561: tasyānyatareṇa bhūmyantareṇa rājñā guṇamāhātmyaṃ śrutvā duhitā dattā;
V03vinv172u:3565: yāvan na dhanopārjanaṃ kṛtaṃ; tad anujñātum ārhasi tāta,
V03vinv172u:3571: yadi mahāsamudrāt samṛddhayānapātro 'bhyāgacchati bhūyasā bahujanapriyo bhavati (SBV II 112)
V03vinv172u:3573: sthānam etad vidyate yat tiṣṭhata eva pituḥ rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayati;
V03vinv172u:3578: iti viditvā pituḥ sakāśam upasaṃkramya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3580: aham api tena sārdhaṃ gacchāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:3585: yo yuṣmākam utsahate kalyāṇakāriṇā sārthavāhena sārdham aśulkena agulmena atarapaṇyena mahāsamudram avatartuṃ [A_465a] mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyaṃ samudānayatu iti;
V03vinv172u:3587_0: tataḥ kalyāṇakārī sārthavāhaḥ akalyāṇakāriṇā bhrātrā sārdhaṃ kṛtakutūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanaḥ
V03vinv172u:3587_1: anekavaṇikśataparivāraḥ śakaṭair bhārair mūṭaiḥ piṭakaiḥ uṣṭrair gobhir gardabhaiḥ
V03vinv172u:3588: so 'nupūrveṇa grāmanigamarājarāṣṭradhānīṣu paṭṭanāny avalokya samudratīram anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3589: sa paṃcabhiḥ purāṇaśatair vahanaṃ kṛtvā paṃca pauruṣeyān gṛhītvā āhārakaṃ nirhārakaṃ nāvikaṃ kaivartaṃ karṇadhāraṃ ca trir ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3592: mama gale lageḥ; mā kāhalībhaviṣyasi iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3594: yāvat tad vahanam anuguṇena vāyunā ratnadvīpam anuprāptaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3597: yo 'sau śrūyate ratnadvīpo nāma vajravaiḍūryendranīlamarakatādīnāṃ ratnānām ākaraḥ iti tam anuprāptāḥ sma;
V03vinv172u:3603: kalyāṇakāriṇā kumāreṇa mahārhāṇi ratnāni kaṭyām upanibaddhāni;
V03vinv172u:3605: tīrasya nātidūre makareṇa matsyajātena anayena vyasanam āpāditaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3609: tasya parivartamānasya akalyāṇakāriṇā kaṭyupanibaddhāni ratnāni dṛṣṭāni; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:3610: ayaṃ nāma ratnāni gṛhītvā gamiṣyati; ahaṃ riktapāṇir gamiṣyāmi;
V03vinv172u:3611: iti viditvā tena tasya gāḍhamiddhāvaṣṭabdhasya tāni ratnāny apahṛtāni;
V03vinv172u:3613: sa tam andhaṃ samudratīre chorayitvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3614: daivāt gopālakā gāś cārayantas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3616: bhoḥ puruṣa kas tvam īdṛśaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3621: tasya pālabandhor bhāryā yauvanamadākṣepāt vīṇāsvanaṃ śrutvā taṃ prārthayituṃ pravṛttā;
V03vinv172u:3622: sa kṛtaghnaceṣṭitam anusmṛtya karṇau pidhāyāvasthito nādhivāsayati;
V03vinv172u:3623: kāmādhyavasitānāṃ nāsti kiṃcid akaraṇīyam iti tayā svāmi vigrāhitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3624: mām ayam andhaḥ puruṣaḥ prārthayati iti;
V03vinv172u:3626: pratikruṣṭam etad vairāṇāṃ yaduta strīvairaṃ; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:3628: nāsti kiṃcid asya karaṇīyam ṛte nirvāsanād iti;
V03vinv172u:3629: sa tena gṛhān nirvāsitaḥ rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu vīṇayā jīvikāṃ kalpayati;
V03vinv172u:3632: so 'py anupūrveṇa sīmāntarasya rājño nagaram anuprāptaḥ yenāsya pūrvaṃ duhitā dattā;
V03vinv172u:3634: tasyā nānādeśanivāsino rājaputrāḥ purohitaputrāś ca varakā āgacchanti; sāpi tātenocyate:
V03vinv172u:3635: putri yasya tvaṃ dattā sa kalyāṇakārī kumāro mahāsamudraṃ (SBV II 114)
V03vinv172u:3639: yasyaiva tvāṃ na dāsyāmi sa visukho bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv172u:3642: tāta yady evaṃ nagaraśobhāṃ kāraya; ahaṃ svayaṃvarāya avatarāmi iti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3645_0: tac ca nagaram apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ candanavāripariṣiktaṃ
V03vinv172u:3651_0: tataḥ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ sā rājakumārī nānālaṃkāravibhūṣitā anekakumārīparivṛttā
V03vinv172u:3651_1: vanadevateva kusumitavanamadhye atīva vibhrājamānā mahatā śrīsamudāyena madhye nagarasya
V03vinv172u:3652: sa kalyāṇakārī anyatamasmin pradeśe vīṇām āśrāvayaṃs tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:3654: balavad api hetubalaṃ pratyabalam apekṣata iti;
V03vinv172u:3655: tataḥ sā rājakumārī vīṇāsvanāvarjitahṛdayā vīṇāvādake kalyāṇakāriṇy ākṣiptā;
V03vinv172u:3657: eṣa mama svāmī iti; janakāyo durmanāḥ saṃvṛttaḥ; kecid vegam asahamānāḥ avadhyātum ārabdhāḥ:
V03vinv172u:3658_0: kathaṃ nāma nānādeśābhyāgatān rājāmātyapurohitaputrān anyāṃś ca nagaranivāsinaḥ pradhānapuruṣān
V03vinv172u:3658_1: pratyākhyāya rājakumāryā evaṃrūpayauvanakalāsaṃpadyuktayā andhalakaḥ svāmī vṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3660: deva kumāryā svayaṃvarāvatīrṇayā svāmī vṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3665: putri saṃvidyante rājāno dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ sārthavāhāḥ amātyaputrāḥ purohitaputrāś [A_466a] ca rūpayauvanavibhavasaṃpannāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3668: tāta sa eva me rocate iti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3669: yady evaṃ kimarthaṃ tiṣṭhasi iti; sā tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3671: vṛtaḥ iti; na te śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ; kiṃ tvaṃ cintayasi?
V03vinv172u:3672: eṣo 'ndhalakaḥ; ahaṃ parapuruṣaiḥ sārdhaṃ paricārayiṣyāmi it:
V03vinv172u:3674: nāham evaṃvidhasya karmaṇaḥ kāriṇī iti; sa kathayati: kathaṃ jñāyate?
V03vinv172u:3676: yena satyena satyavacanena tasya kalyāṇakāriṇo rājakumārasya tava cāntike rāgaḥ samutpannaḥ,
V03vinv172u:3678: anena satyena satyavacanena tavaikam akṣi yathāpaurāṇaṃ syād iti;
V03vinv172u:3679: satyādhiṣṭhānasamanantaram eva tasyaikaṃ cakṣuḥ yathāpaurāṇaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ:
V03vinv172u:3681: sa evāhaṃ kalyāṇakārī; akalyāṇakāriṇā bhrātrā etāṃ daśāṃ nītaḥ; sā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3682: kathaṃ jñāyate tvam evāsau kalyāṇakārī iti; so 'pi satyopayācanaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3683: yena satyena satyavacanena tasya mamākṣiṇī samutpāṭayato 'ntike īṣad api na praduṣṭaṃ cittaṃ me,
V03vinv172u:3684: anena satyena satyavacanena mama dvitīyam akṣi yathāpaurāṇaṃ bhaved iti;
V03vinv172u:3685: tasya saha satyayācanayā dvitīyam akṣi yathāpaurāṇaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3686: tataḥ sā rājakumārī kalyāṇakāriṇam avikalendriyam ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3691: tatas tenāsau duhitā mahatā śrīsamudāyena pariṇītā;
V03vinv172u:3692: sa ca kalyāṇakārī mahatā balasamudāyena tannagaraṃ gatvā akalyāṇakāriṇaṃ cyāvayitvā pitṛke
V03vinv172u:3695: yo 'sau kalyāṇakārī aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3696: yo 'sau akalyṇakārī eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3699: punar apy eṣa yathā akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3703: bhūtapūrvam anyatamasyāṃ rājadhānyām anyatamo rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:3704: sa devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:3705: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kramaśaś catvāraḥ putrā jātāḥ,
V03vinv172u:3715: ekaikāṃ striyaṃ jīvitād vyaparopya tanmāṃsena kāntāramārgān nistarema iti;
V03vinv172u:3719: kim atra prāptakālaṃ bhāryām ādāya niṣpalāyeya iti;
V03vinv172u:3721: sāsya bhāryā annapānaviyogān mārgaśramakhedāc ca kāhalībhūtā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3722: āryaputra prāṇair viyokṣye iti; viśākhaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:3723: mayā rākṣasamadhyāt paritrātā; idānīṃ yadi mariṣyati,
V03vinv172u:3725: tena ūrumāṃsaṃ chitvā tasyā bhakṣaṇāya dattaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3726: bāhubhyāṃ ca śire muktvā rudhiraṃ pāyitā;
V03vinv172u:3727: so 'nupūrveṇa tām ādāya anyatamaṃ parvatam upasṛptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3729: tasya ca parvatasya sannikṛṣṭe nadī vahati;
V03vinv172u:3730: tasyāṃ puruṣaḥ śatruṇā hastapādavikalaḥ kṛtvā pravāhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3734: sa karuṇāmreḍitacittasantatiḥ parvatam abhiruhya samantād vyavalokayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3736: sa laghu laghv eva parvatād avatīrya nadīm abhyavagāhya taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭham abhirohya nadīm uttīrya tīre sthāpayitvā taṃ duḥkhasantāpitahṛdayaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3742: sā tasyopasthānaṃ kurvatī praṇayasaumukhyā muhur muhur upasaṃkramya vividhābhiḥ kathābhir upatiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:3743: dharmatā hy eṣā prakṛtyā mandarāgiṇo bhavanti bodhisatvāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3744: viśākhas tayā sārdhaṃ kadācit paricārayati kadācin na paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:3745: bodhisatvānubhāvena ca tāni kandamūlaphalāni atīva vīryavanti;
V03vinv172u:3746: tāny asau paribhuṃjānā kleśaprābalyāt taṃ hastapādavikalaṃ prārthayitum ārabdhā;
V03vinv172u:3748: ahaṃ tāvad idānīṃ gatapratyāgataprāṇaḥ kathaṃcij jīvitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3749: yadi punar īdṛśaṃ karomi sthānam etad vidyate yad ayaṃ tava bhartā māṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayati iti;
V03vinv172u:3753: sā tena sārdham ānandasaumanasyād eva atīva saṃraktā preṣyamāṇāpi tatsakāśān na gacchati; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:3759: ayaṃ tava svāmī yadi jānīte āvayoḥ saṃprayogaṃ niyataṃ tava anarthaṃ karoti,
V03vinv172u:3760: māṃ ca jīvitād vyaparopayati iti; sā saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:3764: sā śiro vastreṇa veṣṭayitvā parvataśilāyāṃ niṣadyāvasthitā;
V03vinv172u:3766: paśyati tāṃ tathā viprakṛtāṃ; tataḥ pṛcchati:
V03vinv172u:3767: bhadre kim etad iti; sā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3768: āryaputra śirorujā me 'tīva bādhate iti; viśākhaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3769: kimatra kartavyam iti; tayā pāṣāṇabhedakaḥ parvataprāgbhāre dṛṣṭaḥ iti sā [A_467a] kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3770: āryaputra pūrvam apy eṣā śirorujā āsid vaidyena pāṣāṇabhedako vyapadiṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3777: ṛjuko 'sau mahātmā tasyāḥ śāṭhyaṃ na vetti; sa pratipannaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3789: bhavanto rājā kālagataḥ; kam idānīṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpayāmaḥ iti; tair lakṣaṇajñāḥ puruṣāḥ prayuktāḥ:
V03vinv172u:3791: yaḥ puṇyamaheśākhyaḥ satvaḥ taṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpayāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3793: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv172u:3794: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
V03vinv172u:3795: viśākhaḥ pratyupasthitavipākatvād rājyasaṃvartanīyasya karmaṇaḥ nadīm uttīrya ekasmin pradeśe niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3798: pradeśam āgatāḥ paśyanti taṃ mahātmānaṃ rājyalakṣaṇasaṃpannaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3799: te pramuditamanasaḥ amātyānāṃ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:3800: samanveṣitaḥ asmābhiḥ puṇyamaheśākhyaḥ satvo yo rājyam arhati iti;
V03vinv172u:3801: tatas tair amātyair mārgaśobhāṃ nagaraśobhāṃ ca kṛtvā mahatā śrīsamudāyena nagaraṃ praveśya divasatithimuhūrtanakṣatrānupūrvyā rājye 'bhiṣiktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3802_0: tasya devī nāstīti amātyāḥ purohitāḥ bhūmyantararājānaḥ anye ca dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ
V03vinv172u:3802_1: sārthavāhāḥ svakasvakā duhitṝn sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitāḥ ādāya tannagaram āgatāḥ rājā pariṇeṣyatīti;
V03vinv172u:3803: sa rājā striyā vipralabdho na pratipadyate;
V03vinv172u:3807: nānādeśanivāsinaḥ pradhānapuruṣāḥ bhūmyantarāś ca rājānaḥ itastyāś ca pradhānapuruṣāḥ kanyāḥ sajjīkṛtya vyavasthitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3811: puṇyānubhāvāt satvānām upabhogā vīryavanto bhavanti saṃpadyante ca;
V03vinv172u:3812: yadā bodhisatvas tasmāt parvatāt kṛtaghnastriyā muktas tadā tasmin parvate mūlaphalāni tanūbhūtāni;
V03vinv172u:3814: tataḥ sā strī durbhikṣākālamṛtyubhayabhītā taṃ hastapādavikalaṃ puruṣaṃ skandhe āropya grāmāntaṃ samavasṛtā;
V03vinv172u:3817: asti caiṣa lokadharmo yā strī pativratā sā loke pūjyate;
V03vinv172u:3818: sā yatra praviśati tatra bhikṣāṃ labhate;
V03vinv172u:3819: yāvad asāv anupūrveṇa tāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptā;
V03vinv172u:3821: kecit kutūhalajātāḥ tāṃ draṣṭuṃ bahir nirgatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:3824: bhavantaḥ ayaṃ rājā sarvāḥ striyo jugupsate;
V03vinv172u:3825: na paśyatīmāṃ satīṃ pativratāṃ hastapādavikalaṃ puruṣaṃ skandhenādāya paribhramatīm iti;
V03vinv172u:3828: āhūyatāṃ sā strī paśyāmi iti; sā āhūtā,
V03vinv172u:3831: skandhena vahase ruṇḍam idānīṃ tvaṃ pativratā //
V03vinv172u:3832: pātayitvā prapāte māṃ śilodbhedasya kāraṇāt / (SBV II 119)
V03vinv172u:3833: skandhena vahase ruṇḍam idānīṃ tvaṃ pativratā // iti
V03vinv172u:3835: yo 'sau rājakumāraḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3836: yāsav bhāryā eṣa eva sa devadattas tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:3839: punar apy yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:3843_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo viśvapuryāṃ rājadhānyām viśvāmitro nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati
V03vinv172u:3843_1: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamarataskararogāpagataṃ
V03vinv172u:3845: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3846: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:3847: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:3848: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:3849: dārako jātaḥ abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaḥ chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3850: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv172u:3855: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya viśvantara iti nāma iti;
V03vinv172u:3857: dvābhyām aṃśadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikadhātrībhyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:3858: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
V03vinv172u:3859: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṅkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:3860: yāni tāni rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ [A_468a] janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryam anuprāptānāṃ mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalam abhinirjitya adhyāvasatāṃ (SBV II 120)
V03vinv172u:3861_0: pṛthag bhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni tadyathā hastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe
V03vinv172u:3861_1: tsarau dhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe aṃkuśagrahe pāśagrahe tomaragrahe chedye bhedye vedhye
V03vinv172u:3861_2: muṣṭibandhe pādabandhe śikhābandhe dūravedhe śabdavedhe marmavedhe akṣūṇavedhe dṛḍhaprahāritāyāṃ
V03vinv172u:3862_0: viśvantaraḥ kumāro śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko
V03vinv172u:3862_1: mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca
V03vinv172u:3863: tasya pradānavistaram upaśrutya yojanaśatād api arthinaḥ abhyāgacchanti;
V03vinv172u:3866: atha kecid viprā vedavedāṅgavido viśvantaram abhigamyocuḥ;
V03vinv172u:3867: jayatu bhavān kṣatriyakumāraḥ iti; āha ca
V03vinv172u:3868: sarveṣu khalu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ sarvado bhavān /
V03vinv172u:3869: ratham etad dvijātibhyo dānaṃ tvaṃ dātum arhasi //
V03vinv172u:3870: ity evam ukto viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ laghu laghv eva tasmād rathād avatīrya hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditahṛdayas tebhyo dvijātibhyas taṃ rathavaram upadarśayann uvāca
V03vinv172u:3871: yathā mayā rathas tyakto viprebhyaḥ parayā mudā /
V03vinv172u:3872: tathāhaṃ tribhavaṃ tyaktvā spṛśeyaṃ bodhim uttamām // (SBV II 121)
V03vinv172u:3874_2: parituṣṭabhṛtyamitrasevakānuyātrikaiḥ candra iva nakṣatragaṇaiḥ parivṛtaḥ saṃprāpte
V03vinv172u:3875: atha kecit pratyarthikaprayuktā viprās tvaritatvaritaṃ viśvantaraṃ kumāram abhigamya ūcuḥ:
V03vinv172u:3876: jayatu bhavān kṣatriyakumāraḥ iti; āha ca
V03vinv172u:3878: dātum etaṃ gajavaram asmabhyas tvam ihārhasi // iti
V03vinv172u:3879: evam uktaś ca bodhisatvas tasmād api gajavarāl laghu laghv eva avatīrya hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditamanās tebhyas taṃ gajavaram upadarśayann uvāca
V03vinv172u:3880: yathā mayā gajas tyakto viprebhyaḥ parayā mudā /
V03vinv172u:3881: tathāhaṃ tribhavaṃ tyaktvā spṛśeyaṃ bodhim uttamām //
V03vinv172u:3883: putreṇa ca tebhyo viśvantareṇa rājyavardhano nāma gajavaraḥ pratyarthikaprayuktebhyo dattaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:3884: [A_468b] śrutvā ca punaḥ rājñā visvāmitreṇa kopakupitena viśvantaraḥ kumāraḥ āhūyoktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:3885: gaccha kumāra na te madviṣaye vastavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:3886: tato viśvantaraḥ kumāraḥ pitrā parityaktaḥ cintayāmāsa:
V03vinv172u:3887: bodhāya mayā kṛtavyavasāyena sarvalokānugrahārthaṃ baddhasannāhena gajo 'sau tyaktaḥ
V03vinv172u:3888: tad gṛhe vartamānena dānaṃ deyaṃ yathābalam /
V03vinv172u:3889: tapovanaṃ vā saṃśritya kartavyo niyamaḥ paraḥ //
V03vinv172u:3890: tad ahaṃ gṛham utsṛjya prayāsyāmi tapovanam /
V03vinv172u:3891: vaktuṃ na tūtsahe vākyaṃ na dāsyāmīti yācitaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:3892: athaivaṃ kṛtamatir bodhisatvo bhāryāyā mādryāḥ sakāśam abhigamya etad vistareṇa nivedayāmāsa;
V03vinv172u:3893: tataḥ sā mādrī sahaśravaṇād eva (SBV II 122)
V03vinv172u:3895: āryaputra yady evam aham api tapovanaṃ yāsyāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:3896: na śakyaṃ mayā āryaputraviyuktayā muhūrtam api prāṇān dhārayituṃ; kutaḥ
V03vinv172u:3897: gaganam iva candrahīnaṃ sasyavihīnā bhaved yathā pṛthivī /
V03vinv172u:3898: nalinīva jalavihīnā bhartṛvihīnā bhavet tathā nārī // iti
V03vinv172u:3899: bodhisatva uvāca: avaśyam āvayor ante viyogena bhavitavyam,
V03vinv172u:3908: tatrāpi ca mayā avaśyaṃ yathāśaktyā dānaṃ deyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:3909: tatra bhavatyā na kiṃcid anutāpaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3910: tat punar api tāvat saṃpradhāryatām iti; mādrī kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3911: āryaputra yathāśaktyā aham āryaputram anuvartiṣye iti; bodhisatvaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:3912: yady evaṃ smartavyā te iyaṃ pratijñā iti;
V03vinv172u:3913: tato bodhisatvaḥ pitaram upagamya mūrdhnā ca praṇipatyovāca
V03vinv172u:3914: kṣamasva yat tāta mayāparāddhaṃ gajapradānaṃ prati pārthivendra /
V03vinv172u:3915: eṣa prayāsyāmi purād araṇyaṃ kośakṣayo mā nṛpate tavābhūt // iti
V03vinv172u:3917: putra tiṣṭha nivartyatāṃ dānān matir iti; bodhisatva uvāca
V03vinv172u:3919: pradānān na tv ahaṃ cittaṃ nivarteya mahīpate //
V03vinv172u:3921: tataḥ putraduhitṛkalatrasahitaḥ śokotkaṇṭhaḥ paurajānapadasahasrair anugamyamānaḥ tasmān nagarān nirjagāma;
V03vinv172u:3922: kaścit puruṣaḥ taṃ rudanaparidevitaśabdaṃ śrutvā mahājanakāyaṃ ca nagaradvāreṇa nirgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā anyataraṃ puruṣam uvāca:
V03vinv172u:3923: bhoḥ puruṣa kiṃkṛto 'yaṃ mahājanasya ruditaśabdaḥ iti; sa uvāca:
V03vinv172u:3928: paurāḥ sametya subhṛśaṃ karuṇaṃ rudanti // iti
V03vinv172u:3929: tato bodhisatvas tasmān nagarān nirgatān paurān yathānyāyyam abhigamyovāca:
V03vinv172u:3931: suciram api hi priyasaṃyogo bhūtvā avaśyam evānte [A_469a] viprayogāvasānaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3934: sarveṣu lokeṣv avaśasya jantoḥ priyair viyogo bhavantīti matvā /
V03vinv172u:3935: kāryā bhavadbhir bhuvi sarvayatnaiḥ sthirāprakampyā ca śamāya buddhiḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:3936: atha triṃśadyojanātikrāntaṃ bodhisatvam avekṣya anyatamo brāhmaṇaḥ abhigamyovāca:
V03vinv172u:3939: tad arhati bhavān anena rathavareṇa me saphalaṃ śramaṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:3940: tato mādrī saṃjātāmarṣā niṣṭhurābhidhānena taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
V03vinv172u:3941: aho dvijasyāsya sudāruṇā matir vane 'pi yo 'bhyarthayate nṛpātmajam /
V03vinv172u:3942: na nāma kāruṇyam ihāsya jāyate narendraputre nṛpatiśriyā cyute // iti
V03vinv172u:3943: bodhisatva uvāca: na khalu na khalu bhavatyā brāhmaṇaḥ paribhāṣaṇīyaḥ; kutaḥ
V03vinv172u:3944: yady ete na bhaveyur artharucayo mādri pratigrāhakāḥ
V03vinv172u:3945: bodhiṃ kaḥ samavāpnuyād bhuvi naraḥ sarvapradānād ṛte /
V03vinv172u:3947: dānādyābhir avāpnuvanti niyataṃ sarvajñatām uttamām // iti
V03vinv172u:3948: tato bodhisatvas tam apy aśvarathaṃ pareṇa harṣeṇa tasmai brāhmaṇāya datvā uvāca
V03vinv172u:3949: anena mātsaryamalapravāhinā rathapradānena mamāstv iha dvija / (SBV II 124)
V03vinv172u:3950: maharṣibhiḥ sadbhir anupravartito nirāsravo dharmamayo mahārathaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:3951: tato viśvantaraḥ pramuditahṛdayas tam api rathavaraṃ brāhmaṇāya datvā kṛṣṇājināṃ kumārīṃ skandhe āropya mādrī ca jālinaṃ kumāraṃ tapovanābhimukhau saṃprasthitau;
V03vinv172u:3953: tato viśvantaras tasmiṃs tapovane svahṛdayapraritoṣakaraṃ vratam āsthāya vijahāra;
V03vinv172u:3961: tadarthaṃ bālakāv etau mama tvaṃ dātum arhasi // iti
V03vinv172u:3962: evam ukto viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ iṣṭasutaparityāgaṃ prati muhūrtaṃ cintāparo babhūva;
V03vinv172u:3964: yato 'haṃ bhavantam arthaye; tat kim idaṃ vicāryate
V03vinv172u:3966: yathā śibiḥ śruto nityaṃ tathā tvaṃ kartum arhasi // iti
V03vinv172u:3967: evam ukto bodhisatvas taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca: bho mahābrāhmaṇa
V03vinv172u:3969: kiṃ punaḥ svasutatyāge mama syān matir anyathā //
V03vinv172u:3973: mā bhūd vaktā ca me kaścit kumārau nirghṛṇo bhṛśam /
V03vinv172u:3974: bālau tyajati nātmānaṃ sādhu brāhmaṇa māṃ naya // iti
V03vinv172u:3976_0: bhoḥ kṣatriyakumāra naitad bhavataḥ pratirūpaṃ mahati rājavaṃśe prasūtasya sarvasyāṃ
V03vinv172u:3976_1: pṛthivyāṃ khyātayaśasaḥ sarvaprāṇiṣu dayānukrośapravṛttasya dānamānasatkāragandhahastinaḥ (SBV II 125)
V03vinv172u:3977: śramaṇabrāhmaṇātithigurujanapūjakasya kṛpaṇavaṇīpakānāthadaridrajanaparigrāhakasya sarvamanorathaparipūrakasya amoghadarśanasya yat mama vandhyam āgamanaṃ bhavet,
V03vinv172u:3978: mogho vā mārgaśramaḥ nirarthakaṃ vā darśanam;
V03vinv172u:3979: aphalā sā āśā cirakālāśāsito vā cetasy āśāsakaḥ;
V03vinv172u:3980: tat śighraṃ saṅkkalpaturagasya manorathasya tadvacananāstikyapratyāhatasya me nirvṛttir bhavet;
V03vinv172u:3981: tad arhati bhavān paripūrṇamanorathaṃ māṃ visarjayituṃ kutaḥ
V03vinv172u:3985: na tava sudaṃṣṭra samo 'sti dānaśaktyā // iti
V03vinv172u:3986: athaitad vacanaṃ brāhmaṇasyopaśrutya viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ imāṃ cintām āpede tanayasnehaviklavaḥ
V03vinv172u:3988: prāpsyāmy ahaṃ ca mādrī ca duḥkhaṃ putraviyogajam //
V03vinv172u:3991: kāmaṃ putraviyogārto bhuvi śokaṃ vrajāmy aham /
V03vinv172u:3992: bhagnapratijño na tv eva bhaviṣyāmi kṣatavrataḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:3993: tato viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ iṣṭasutaparityāgaṃ prati kṛtaniścaya uvāca: eṣa bho
V03vinv172u:3994: lokaṃ duḥkhamāharṇave pratibhaye majjantam ārtaṃ bhṛśam
V03vinv172u:3997: bālāv aśrujalāmbupūrṇanayanau viprāya tasmai dadau // (SBV II 126)
V03vinv172u:4000: tārayeyam ahaṃ tena lokaṃ saṃsārasāgarāt // iti
V03vinv172u:4001: dattamātrayoś ca punas tayor bāladārakayoḥ iyaṃ ca vasumatī ṣaḍvikāraṃ cacāla;
V03vinv172u:4002: tatas tena bhūmikampena tadvanavāsinas tāpasāḥ saṃtrastāḥ anyonyam ūcuḥ
V03vinv172u:4004: jñatavyam iha suvyaktaṃ prabhāvaḥ kasya īdṛśaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4006: sa teṣām ṛṣīṇām etam arthaṃ nivedayāmāsa
V03vinv172u:4010: viśvantaras tyajati kampati yena bhūmiḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4011: tatas tau bāladārakau pitur āśayaparityāgabuddhim avagamya karuṇakaruṇaṃ rudantau viśvantarasya pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭāv ūcatuḥ:
V03vinv172u:4012: prasīda tāta mā āvāṃ parityākṣīḥ; kvedāniṃ guruvihīnau gamiṣyāvaḥ iti
V03vinv172u:4013: ambā ca tāta niṣkrāntā tvaṃ ca no dātum arhasi /
V03vinv172u:4014: yāvat tām api paśyāvas tato dāsyati nau bhavān // iti
V03vinv172u:4015: tato bodhisatvaḥ snehaviklavaḥ sāśrudurdinanayanaḥ tau bāladārakau [A_470a] parityajyovāca: putrakau
V03vinv172u:4016: na me hṛdayam asnigdhaṃ nākṛpā nāpi nairghṛṇam /
V03vinv172u:4018: apy evāhaṃ parāṃ bodhim abhigamya śivāṃ svayam /
V03vinv172u:4020: tatas tau bāladārakau pitur āśayaparityāgam avagamya karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭāv ūcatuḥ
V03vinv172u:4021: yady evaṃ vyavasāyas te vacanād āvayos tvayā
V03vinv172u:4022: vaktavyā jananī tāta kṣantum amba tvam arhasi // iti (SBV II 127)
V03vinv172u:4024: yan nau guror apakṛtaṃ tvayi bālabhāvāt
V03vinv172u:4025: yady apriyaṃ vacanam anyad udāhṛtaṃ vā /
V03vinv172u:4026: śuśrūṣaṇaṃ ca paripūritam eva na syāt
V03vinv172u:4028: ity uktvā pitaram abhivādya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya guruvacanalālasau muhurmuhuḥ saṃparivartamānau nayanāmbupariplutākṣakau tasmād āśramād viniścakrāmatuḥ;
V03vinv172u:4029: tato bodhisatvas tair atikaruṇair bāladārakavacobhiḥ viklavīkṛtahṛdayo bodhau manaḥ praṇidhāya tapovanaparṇakuṭīṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4030: niṣkrāntamātrayoś ca bāladārakayoḥ ayaṃ trisahasramahāsahasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4031: anekaiś ca devatāsahasraiḥ hāhākṛtam antarikṣaṃ babhūva
V03vinv172u:4032: aho pradānamāhātmyam aho khalv asya niścayaḥ /
V03vinv172u:4033: bālāv imau sutau tyaktvā yan na vikriyate manaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4034: tasmiṃś ca samaye mādrī mūlaphalāny ādāya āśramābhimukhī saṃprasthitā;
V03vinv172u:4035: tena ca mahatā bhūmikampena tvaritam āśramapadaṃ pratasthe;
V03vinv172u:4036: anyatamā devatā siṃharūpadhāriṇī bhūtva mārgam avarudhyāvasthitā,
V03vinv172u:4037: mā haiva mādrī bodhisattvasya sarvasatvanirmokṣaṇakṛtodyogasya dānapāramitāyāṃ vighnam utpādayiṣyatīti
V03vinv172u:4048: ity evam uktā sā siṃharūpadhāriṇī devatā tasmān mārgād apakrāntā;
V03vinv172u:4049: tato mādrī nimittāny apraśastānīti matvā muhūrtaṃ cintayāmāsa:
V03vinv172u:4051: yathā vanavāsināṃ bhūtānāṃ vikrośanaśabdo vyaktam āśramapade akuśalaṃ bhaviṣyati iti; āha ca
V03vinv172u:4052: yathā sphurati me netraṃ yathā rauti vihaṅgamaḥ /
V03vinv172u:4053: dhruvaṃ tau bālakau tyaktau yathā me matir utsukā //
V03vinv172u:4054: yathāyaṃ pṛthivīkampo vepate hṛdayaṃ ca me /
V03vinv172u:4055: vyaktau tau bālakau tyaktau yathā kāyaś ca sīdati // iti
V03vinv172u:4056: sā evam anarthaśatasahasrāṇi cintayantī āsramapadaṃ gatā;
V03vinv172u:4060: asmin pradeśe jālinaḥ kumāraḥ sahabhaginyā mṛgapotakair [A_470b] abhīkṣṇaṃ krīḍitavān;
V03vinv172u:4064_0: atha vā ambā na dṛśyate iti parṇakuṭīṃ praviśya śayitau bhaviṣyataḥ ity evam āśaṅkāparigatahṛdayā
V03vinv172u:4064_1: sutadarśanalālasā mūlaphalāny ekānte upanikṣipya bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇā bhartuḥ pādayor nipatya pṛcchati:
V03vinv172u:4065: āryaputra kva gatau bāladārakau iti; viśvantara uvāca
V03vinv172u:4067: tasya tau dārakau dattau tvam anujñātum arhasi // iti
V03vinv172u:4068: athaivam uktā mādrī viṣadigdhaviddheva mṛgī bhūmau nipapāta;
V03vinv172u:4069: jalāśayoddhṛteva matsī pṛthivyām āvartanaparivartanaṃ karoti sma;
V03vinv172u:4071: naṣṭavatseva gaur bahuvidhaṃ hambhāravair vilalāpa; āha ca
V03vinv172u:4075: kāṃ gatiṃ mama gatau hi putrakau //
V03vinv172u:4079: vrajatas tasya vaśe na duḥkhitau // (SBV II 129)
V03vinv172u:4104: tato mādrī tābhyāṃ bāladārakābhyāṃ ye vṛkṣā ropitakāyapālitakās tān kisalayasaṃchannāṇ dṛṣṭvā sasaṃbhramā pariṣvajyovāca
V03vinv172u:4109: punaś ca tayor bāladārakayoḥ krīḍanakān āśramavāsino mṛgaśābakān dṛṣṭvā karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ vacanam uvāca (SBV II 130)
V03vinv172u:4114: tato yena mārgeṇa tau bāladārakau gatau taṃ mārgam anusarantī tayor bāladārakayor itaś cāmutaś ca padāny anṛjukāni dṛṣṭvā tīvraduḥkhābhyāhatā punar uvāca [A_471a]
V03vinv172u:4121: tato bodhisatvas tāṃ tathā paridevanātmikāṃ dṛṣṭvā tābhis tābhiḥ śrutibhir anityatāpratisaṃyuktābhiḥ bahuprakāram anusaṃjñāpayann uvāca
V03vinv172u:4122: na darpān na ca vidveṣān mayā tyaktaṃ sutadvayam /
V03vinv172u:4123: sarvasatvahitārthaṃ tu tyaktau tau dustyajau sutau //
V03vinv172u:4125: prāpnuvanti mahāsatvāḥ śibivad bodhim uttamām // iti
V03vinv172u:4128: dadyāṃ svān dārān vāhanaṃ cāpi vittaṃ
V03vinv172u:4129: sarvaṃ sarvebhyo dātum eṣā matir me // iti
V03vinv172u:4130: atha mādrī dhairyam ālambya cittena bodhisatvam uvāca
V03vinv172u:4131: na karomy antarāyaṃ te mā te bhūn matir anyathā /
V03vinv172u:4132: mām apīcchasi ced dātuṃ nirviśaṅkaṃ prayaccha mām //
V03vinv172u:4135: tam arthaṃ prāpnuhi kṣipraṃ tārayan hi bhavāj jagat // iti
V03vinv172u:4136: tataḥ śakro devendraḥ tad atyadbhutam atiduṣkaraṃ ca mādryā bodhisatvasya ca vyavasāyam āgamya tridaśagaṇaparivṛtaḥ upari (SBV II 131)
V03vinv172u:4137: vihāyasā tadāśramapadam upagamya udāreṇāvabhāsena tad vanam avabhāsya gaganatalastha eva bodhisatvam uvāca
V03vinv172u:4140: tvam eko niḥsaṅgas tyajasi tanayān snehajanakān
V03vinv172u:4141: dhruvaṃ kṣemaṃ śāntaṃ vimalavirajaṃ prāpsyasi padam // iti
V03vinv172u:4142: tad evaṃ protsāhya bodhisatvaṃ śakro devendraś cintayāmāsa:
V03vinv172u:4145: tato bodhisatvasakāśād apakramya brāhmaṇaveṣam āsthāya punar bodhisatvam uvāca
V03vinv172u:4149: nirlajjaś cāpi lubdhaś ca tvam iha brāhmaṇādhamaḥ /
V03vinv172u:4150: saddharmaniratāṃ yas tvaṃ mām icchasi pativratām // iti
V03vinv172u:4151: tato viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ karuṇāparigatahṛdayo mādrīṃ nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4153: na śocāmy aham ātmānaṃ nāpekṣā me tathātmani /
V03vinv172u:4154: yathā tvām anuśocāmi katham eko bhaviṣyasi // iti
V03vinv172u:4161: idam asmin vane dānaṃ paścimaṃ me bhaviṣyati
V03vinv172u:4163: iti viditvā mādrīpāṇau gṛhitvā taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
V03vinv172u:4165: mama bhāryām imām iṣṭāṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ dvijottama // iti
V03vinv172u:4167: ṣaḍvikārā mahī kṛtsnā cacālāmbuni naur yathā //
V03vinv172u:4168: tato mādrī bāṣpoparuddhyamānagadgadakaṇṭhā brāhmaṇavaśam āgatā patiputraduhitṛrahitā idam abhravīt
V03vinv172u:4169: kīdṛṅ mayā kṛtaṃ karma anāryaṃ pūrvajanmasu /
V03vinv172u:4170: naṣṭavatseva gaur yena viraumi vijane vane //
V03vinv172u:4171: tataḥ śakro devendro brāhmaṇaveṣam antardhāpya svaveṣeṇa sthitvā mādrīm uvāca
V03vinv172u:4172: na brāhmaṇo 'smi subhage na ca mānuṣo 'smi
V03vinv172u:4173: śakras tv ahaṃ hy asuranāśakaraḥ surendraḥ /
V03vinv172u:4175: tad brūhi kiṃ varam ihecchasi matsakāśāt // iti
V03vinv172u:4179: tathety uktvā mahendraḥ punar āśramapadaṃ praviśya bodhisatvam upajagmivān;
V03vinv172u:4180: mādrīṃ ca vāmena pāṇinā gṛhitvā bodhisatvam uvāca
V03vinv172u:4181: ahaṃ mādrīm imāṃ tubhyaṃ dadāmi paricārikām /
V03vinv172u:4182: na ca te kasyacid deyā nyāsadroho hi garhitaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4183: tato śakro devendras taṃ bāladārakaparigrahītāraṃ tathā vyāmohayāmāsa yathā anyanagaraśaṅkayā tad eva nagaram upetya tau bāladārakau vikretum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4185: etau putrasya te putrau brāhmaṇo 'smin purottame /
V03vinv172u:4186: jālinaṃ caiva kṛṣṇāṃ ca vikrīṇīte sudāruṇaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4191: yāvad anyenāmātyena rājñaḥ sakāśam upanītau (SBV II 133)
V03vinv172u:4198: tam ihānayata kṣipraṃ patnyā sārdhaṃ sulocanam // iti
V03vinv172u:4199: tataḥ śakro devendro bodhisatvam abhinamasya svabhavanam upajagāma;
V03vinv172u:4200: paścāc ca rājani viśvāmitre abhyatīte brāhmaṇāmātyapaurajānapadaiḥ sārdhaṃ tadāśramapadaṃ gatvā bodhisatvaṃ yācitvā svapuram ānīya rājye pratiṣṭhāpitavān;
V03vinv172u:4202: sa śraṃanabrāhmaṇavanīpakasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavānujīvijaneṣu anekaprakārāṇi dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:4208: prāpnuvanti narāḥ śuddhim asmin loke paratra ca // iti
V03vinv172u:4209: yadā viśvāmitreṇa rājñā viśvantaranimittaṃ jujjukāya brāhmaṇāya prabhūtaṃ dhanaṃ dattaṃ tadāsau vistīrṇavibhavo jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4211: yā ca kācit tava śrīr asau viśvantaraṃ kumāram āgamya iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4216: yo 'sau viśvantaro nāma rājakumāraḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4217: yo 'sau jujjukaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4220: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kṛtajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṛtavedinaḥ svalpam api kṛtaṃ na nāśyayiṣyāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4222: ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam (SBV II 134)
V03vinv172u:4226: tena khalu samayena campāyāṃ potalo nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati,
V03vinv172u:4227: āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv172u:4229: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:4230: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:4231: sā upasthīyate śīte śītopakaraṇaiḥ uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇaiḥ vaidyaprajñaptair āhāraiḥ,
V03vinv172u:4232: nātitiktaiḥ nātyamlaiḥ nātilavaṇaiḥ nātimadhuraiḥ nātikaṭukaī nātikaṣāyaiḥ tiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukaṣāyavivarjitaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:4233: hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrī apsarā iva nandane vane vicāriṇī maṃcān maṃcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantī adharimāṃ bhūmiṃ;
V03vinv172u:4234: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñāṃ śabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad garbhasya paripākāya
V03vinv172u:4235: tena khalu samayena potalako gṛhapatiḥ rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena;
V03vinv172u:4236: sā cāṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt śravaṇe nakṣatre prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:4238: tasya pādatalayor adhastāt caturaṅgulamātrāṇi romāṇi suvarṇavarṇavarṇāni jātāni;
V03vinv172u:4239: yāvat potalakasya gṛhapateḥ svamanuṣyaḥ tvaritatvaritaṃ rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ,
V03vinv172u:4241: gṛhapate diṣṭyā vardhase putras te jātaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4242: sa prītisaumanasyajātaḥ bhūyaḥ pṛcchati kiṃ kathayasi gṛhapate putras te jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4244: atha tasya puruṣasyaitad abhavat kim ayaṃ gṛhapatir bhūyo bhūyaḥ pṛcchati?
V03vinv172u:4245: mā māṃ pralāpayitukāmaḥ iti viditvā tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ; gṛhapatiḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4246: bhoḥ puruṣa kṣūṇas tvaṃ; yadi tvayā śatam api vāṅ niścāritābhaviṣyat,
V03vinv172u:4247: mayāpi tava mukhaṃ suvarṇasya pūritam abhaviṣyat iti;
V03vinv172u:4248: tataḥ potalakena gṛhapatinā tasya puruṣasya trīn vārān suvarṇena mukhaṃ [A_472b] pūritaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4249: koṣṭhāgārikasya ca sandiṣṭaṃ dārakasyāvalehikāmūlyaṃ viṃśatihiraṇyakoṭīr dehi iti
V03vinv172u:4250: potalako gṛhapatiḥ prītamanāḥ rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ deva putro me jātaḥ iti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4252: ahaṃ tasya campāyāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ saptahastikaṃ dānīyam iti;
V03vinv172u:4253: potalako gṛhapatiḥ rājānaṃ bimbisāram avalokya campām āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:4254: tato gṛhapater jñātayaḥ trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma iti; anye kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:4256: pitrā cāsya janmani viṃśatihiraṇyakoṭyaḥ avalehikāmūlyaṃ dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4257: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśa iti nāma;
V03vinv172u:4258: tasya śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśa iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4260: dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:4261: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
V03vinv172u:4262: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṅkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:4263: uddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ vastraparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ hastiparīkṣāyāṃ aśvaparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ kumārikāparīkṣāyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:4264: so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsu udghāṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4265: tasya puṇyamaheśākhyatāṃ śrutvā samānakulīnair bahubhir dārikā dattāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4266: tasya pitrā trīṇi vāsagṛhāṇi māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4267: trīṇi udyānāni māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4268: trīṇi antaḥpurāṇi vyavasthāpitāni jyaiṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ kanīyasaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4269: sa upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:4270: tasya dine dine paṃcaśatikāḥ pāko bhojanārthaṃ sādhyate
V03vinv172u:4274: seeks to take his father King Bimbisāra's life but fails in the attempt
V03vinv172u:4276: kumāra sarveṣāṃ rājñāṃ yadā śirasi palitaṃ jātaṃ bhavati,
V03vinv172u:4279: bhavataḥ pituḥ keśās tṛtīyaṃ varṇāntaraṃ gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4280: tathāpi kāmeṣv adhyavasita eva nopaśamaṃ gacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:4285: yāvad rājā bimbisāro bhagavato ghṛtapītasya maṇḍaṃ pātukāmasya maṇḍam adhiṣṭhāya veṇuvanaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4287: tena kanakaḥ kṣiptaḥ; rājā śabde kṛtāvī,
V03vinv172u:4288: tena tasya maṇḍasthālī bhagnā; rājā tata eva pratinivṛttaḥ
V03vinv172u:4293: who appears to him in the orb of the sun,
V03vinv172u:4294: and talks to him of the Buddha
V03vinv172u:4295: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4297: vinipātito maudgalyāyana ajātaśatruṇā akalyāṇamitropagūḍhena tathāgatasya piṇḍapātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4298: gaccha campāyāṃ potalakaputrasya sakāśāt piṇḍapātam ādāya iti;
V03vinv172u:4299: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ yathā samāhite citte rājagṛhe 'ntarhitaś campāyāṃ pratyaṣṭhāt;
V03vinv172u:4301: sa dine dine kālyam evotthāya ādityaṃ namasyati;
V03vinv172u:4302: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyayānaḥ ṛddhyā ādityamaṇḍalaṃ bhitvā avatīrṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4303: atha śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ:
V03vinv172u:4304: pratyakṣam evāham ādityaṃ svena rūpeṇa paśyāmi iti; dṛṣṭvā ca punar gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:4307: syāt kiṃ nv ayaṃ dinakaro dhanadaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ
V03vinv172u:4309: āyuṣmān api mahāmaudgalyāyanas tasya cetasā cittam ājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate (SBV II 137)
V03vinv172u:4311: nāhaṃ vaiśravaṇo cāsmi bhagavān nāsmīśvaras suvrataḥ /
V03vinv172u:4312: putraṃ mām avagaccha śāntamanaso buddhasya dīptaujasaḥ
V03vinv172u:4313: bhaikṣārthaṃ tu tavāham abhyupagataḥ piṇḍena kāryaṃ punaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4314: śroṇaḥ kathayati: kiṃ bhavān muniḥ? sa gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:4315: meruṃ prāpya yathā hi kāṃcanagiriṃ syāt sarṣapo 'bhyāgataḥ
V03vinv172u:4316: sūryaṃ prāpya yathā bhavec ca tulitaḥ khadyotajantuḥ kṣitau /
V03vinv172u:4317: ratnāḍhyaṃ ca sametya sāgaram iha syād goṣpadaṃ saṃsṛtam
V03vinv172u:4318: buddhaṃ prāpya tathā narottamaguruṃ māṃ viddhi śāstātmajam // iti
V03vinv172u:4322: ājñāpaya kim āgamanaprayojanam iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4324: asti gṛhapatiputra śramaṇo gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ śākyakulāt keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4327: tasya buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā saromakūpāṇy āhṛṣṭāṇi;
V03vinv172u:4328: tenābhiprasannena sa eva paṃcaśatikaḥ pākaḥ āyuṣmate mahāmaudgalyāyanāya pratipāditaḥ
V03vinv172u:4330: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa fills his bowl with food of extraordinary fragrance,
V03vinv172u:4331: which Mahāmaudgalyāyana carries back to the Buddha
V03vinv172u:4332: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tasyāntikāt piṇḍapātam ādāya tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte campāyām antarhito rājagṛhe pratyaṣṭhād venuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv172u:4335: rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ dvitīyaṃ sthālipākam ādāya bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:4336: yāvat paśyati sarvaṃ veṇuvanaṃ nānāvidhena (SBV II 138)
V03vinv172u:4338: sa saṃlakṣayati nūnaṃ śakreṇa devendreṇa anyābhir devatābhir bhagavataḥ piṇḍapātaḥ upanītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4339: yathedaṃ veṇuvanaṃ nānāvidhena surabhiṇā āhāragandhena sphuṭam;
V03vinv172u:4341: kiṃ bhadanta śakreṇa devendreṇa anyābhir devatābhir bhagavataḥ piṇḍapāta upanītaḥ?
V03vinv172u:4342: yena veṇuvanaṃ nānāvidhena surabhiṇā āhāragandhena sphuṭam iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:4343: na mahārāja śakreṇa devendreṇa nāpy anyābhir devatābhir upanītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4344: api tu tavaiva vijite campāyāṃ potalakaputrasya dine dine paṃcaśatikaḥ sthālīpākaḥ sādhyate;
V03vinv172u:4346: tasya bhagavān varṇaṃ bhāṣitum ārabdhaḥ iti śrutvāpi tasya darśanakāmatā utpannā;
V03vinv172u:4347: bhagavāṃs tasya cetasā cittam ājñāya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4351: api tu mahārāja paribhuṅkṣva pātraśeṣaṃ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4359: asti mahārāja tvayā kadācid evaṃrūpam annapānaṃ paribhuktapūrvaṃ?
V03vinv172u:4360: rājā kathayati: ayaṃ bhadanta rājakule vṛddho,
V03vinv172u:4361: rājā ca saṃvṛttaḥ nābhijānāty evaṃrūpam annapānam āsvāditapūrvaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4362: puṇyamaheśākhyo mahārāja sa satvaḥ ya īdṛśam annapānaṃ paribhuṅkte
V03vinv172u:4364: King Bimbisāra desires to see Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa
V03vinv172u:4365: atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4367: sannāhayantu bhavantaḥ caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ; campāṃ gamiṣyāmi; kasyārthe?
V03vinv172u:4384: api tu kumāra āgacchati it; te santrastāḥ:
V03vinv172u:4391: api tu yuṣmābhir gaṅgā tathā baddhavyā yathā pratilomā vahati;
V03vinv172u:4394: yenaivaṃ likhati iti tair amātyānām anena arthena lekho 'nupreṣitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4395: tair vācayitvā punas teṣāṃ yathābhūtaṃ sandiṣṭaṃ:
V03vinv172u:4403: tatas te saṃbhūya potalakasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4406: avacarakapuruṣeṇapi sa evārthaḥ samākhyātaḥ iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4407: bhavanto na preṣayāmi; yo mama bhāgas taṃ suvarṇapiṇḍair api badhnīyām iti; te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:4408: gṛhapate yady apy evaṃ tathāpi paścimā janatā anukampitavyā iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4410: yadi yuṣmākam api putrāḥ śroṇena sārdhaṃ gacchati iti; te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:4413: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa goes to Rājagṛha to visit Bimbisāra
V03vinv172u:4414: atha potalako gṛhapatir yena śroṇakoṭīviṃśas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4416: putra imepaura evaṃ kathayanti iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4418: putra nūnaṃ sa rājā tava pādayoḥ suvarṇavarṇāni romāṇi draṣṭukāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4419: na tvayā tasya pādau utkṣipya darśayitavyau;
V03vinv172u:4423: etaṃ rājñaḥ pādayoḥ sthāpayitvā praṇāmaṃ ca kṛtvā tasya purastāt paryaṅkaṃ badhvā niṣīda;
V03vinv172u:4437: naryaś ca nānālaṅkāravibhūṣitāḥ samāropitāḥ; tad anayā vibhūtyā jalamadhyena preṣitaḥ; (SBV II 140)
V03vinv172u:4439: rājñā bimbisāreṇa śrutaṃ potalakaputraḥ āgacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:4441: yāvac ca nādī gaṅgā atrāntarāt khātam asyāḥ pūrayitvā tanmadhyena naur ākṛṣṭā;
V03vinv172u:4442_0: rājagṛhaṃ ca tan nagaram apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ candanavāripariṣiktaṃ
V03vinv172u:4444: tato 'sau rājñaḥ siṃhāsanasthasya muktāhāraṃ pādayor datvā,
V03vinv172u:4447: rājā tasya pādatalayoḥ suvarṇavarṇāni romāṇi dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ:
V03vinv172u:4450: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa and King Bimbisāra go together to the Bamboo grove in order to see the Buddha
V03vinv172u:4451: dṛṣṭvā kathayati: śroṇa dṛṣṭas te bhagavān?
V03vinv172u:4452: no deva; āgaccha gacchāmaḥ; sa pṛcchati deva kiṃ bhagavān yānena gaccchati?
V03vinv172u:4454: iti; rājā kathayati [A_474b] pravrajito 'sau; kiṃ tasya yānena?
V03vinv172u:4455: iti; sa kathayati: deva yady evam aham api pādābhyām eva gacchāmi iti,
V03vinv172u:4456: pādābhyām eva saṃprasthitaḥ; tasya pauruṣeyair vastrāṇi pṛthivyām āstīrṇāni; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4459: iti; te kathayanti anāstīrṇena iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4465: iti; te kathayanti: deva nivāritāḥ; atha kena punar āstīrṇāni?
V03vinv172u:4469: tenāśayato vāṅ niścāritā apanayantu amanuṣyā vastrāṇi iti;
V03vinv172u:4475: saṃpracalati; vyathate saṃvyathate saṃpravyathate; pūrvo digbhāga unnamati,
V03vinv172u:4476: paścima avanamati; paścima unnamati; pūrvo 'vanamati; dakṣiṇa unnamati,
V03vinv172u:4481: anto 'vanamati; tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv172u:4482: ito bhikṣava ekanavataṃ kalpam upādāya na kadācit potalakaputreṇa anāstīrṇāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ pādo nyastaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4484: no tu puṇyaparikṣayāt; tenāyaṃ ṣaḍvikāraḥ pṛthivīkampo jātaḥ iti
V03vinv172u:4487: atha śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśo yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4488: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4489: tato bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñatvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
V03vinv172u:4490: yāṃ śrutvā śroṇena koṭīviṃśena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4491: sa dṛṣṭasatya utthāya āsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā,
V03vinv172u:4492: yena bhagavāṃs tena añjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:4493: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaya pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyam ahaṃ bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryam iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:4494: na khalu gṛhaputra tathāgatā vā tathāgataśrāvakā vā ananujñātaṃ kulaputraṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ pravrājayanti upasaṃpādayanti vā;
V03vinv172u:4496: rājā kathayati ahaṃ bhadanta prabhuḥ sarvādhikaraṇānām;
V03vinv172u:4497: arthe mamaiva dharmatayā ayaṃ putro bhavati;
V03vinv172u:4500: tato bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitaḥ ehi bhikṣo cara brahmacaryam iti;
V03vinv172u:4503: pātrakarakavyagrahastaḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmasruḥ varṣaśatopasaṃpannasya bhikṣor īryāpathenāvasthitaḥ; āha cātra
V03vinv172u:4510: ekāntaghaṭake śāsane kiṃ viśeṣam adhigamiṣyati iti (SBV II 142)
V03vinv172u:4511: sa tair avasphaṇḍito yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ; upasaṃkramya āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:4512_0: kataro bhadanta ānanda bhagavatā ekāntaghaṭakasya bhikṣoḥ yogānukūlas samādhir uktaḥ
V03vinv172u:4512_1: āyuṣman śroṇa bhagavatoktaṃ caṅkramata avigatasamādhiś cirasthitiko bhaviṣyatīti
V03vinv172u:4512_2: tena śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ gatvā caṅkramo 'dhiṣṭhitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4513: tatrāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ rājagṛhe viharati śītavane śmaśāne yuktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4514: sātatye naipakye saṃbodhipakṣikeṣu dharmeṣu bhāvanāyogam anuyukto bhavati
V03vinv172u:4516: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa gives himself to severe penances. The example of the lute
V03vinv172u:4517: atha āyuṣmataḥ śroṇakoṭīviṃśasya ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi;
V03vinv172u:4518: yāvantaḥ khalu bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ ārabdhavīryā viharanti;
V03vinv172u:4520: atha ca punar me nānupādāyāsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimucyate;
V03vinv172u:4521: saṃvidyante ca me jñātiṣu vipulā bhogāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4522: yannv ahaṃ niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuṅjīya;
V03vinv172u:4525: atha bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śroṇasya cetasā cittam ājñāya anyatamaṃ bhikṣum āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:4528: upasaṃkramya śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśam evaṃ vada śāstā tvāṃ śroṇa āmantrayate iti;
V03vinv172u:4529: evaṃ bhadantety sa bhikṣur bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yanāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4530: upasaṃkramya āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:4531: śāstā tvām āyuṣman śroṇa āmantrayate iti;
V03vinv172u:4532: evam āyuṣman ity āyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśas tasya bhikṣoḥ pratiśrutya yena bhagavāṃś tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4533: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāṇte sthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4534: āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśaṃ bhagavān idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:4535: na te śroṇa ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi?
V03vinv172u:4536: yāvantaḥ khalu bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ ārabdhavīryā viharanti;
V03vinv172u:4538: atha ca punar me nānupādāya āsravebhyaḥ cittaṃ vimucyate;
V03vinv172u:4541: yannv ahaṃ niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuñjīya;
V03vinv172u:4544: atha āyuṣmataḥ śroṇasya koṭīviṃśasya etad abhavat:
V03vinv172u:4546: iti viditvā bhītas trastas saṃvignaḥ āhṛṣṭaromakūpo bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:4548: tena hi śroṇa tvām eva pṛcchāmi;
V03vinv172u:4549: yathā te kṣamate tathainaṃ vyākuru; kiṃ manyase śroṇa?
V03vinv172u:4550: kuśalas tvam abhūḥ pūrvam āgārikaḥ san vīṇāyāṃ tantrīsvane;
V03vinv172u:4551: tathyam ahaṃ bhadanta kuśalo 'bhūvaṃ pūrvam āgārikaḥ san vīṇāyāṃ tantrīsvane: kiṃ manyase śroṇa?
V03vinv172u:4552: yasmin samaye vīṇāyās tantryaḥ atyātatā bhavanti,
V03vinv172u:4553: api nu tasmin samaye [A_475b] vīṇā valgusvarā bhavati?
V03vinv172u:4554: manojñasvarā vā svaravatī vā karmaṇyā vā?
V03vinv172u:4556: yasmin samaye vīṇāyās tantryaḥ atiślathā bhavanti api nu tasmin samaye vīṇā valgusvarā bhavati?
V03vinv172u:4557: manojñasvarā vā svaravatī vā karmaṇyā vā?
V03vinv172u:4559: atha punar yasmin samaye vīṇāyās tantryaḥ nātyātatā bhavanti nātiślathāḥ saha guṇeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
V03vinv172u:4560: nanu tasmin samaye vīṇā valgusvarā vā bhavati?
V03vinv172u:4561: manojñasvarā vā svaravatī vā karmaṇyā vā?
V03vinv172u:4563: evam eva śroṇa atyārabdhaṃ vīryam atyauddhatyāya saṃvartate;
V03vinv172u:4569: anena tvaṃ śroṇa vihāreṇa viharan nacirād eva āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā,
V03vinv172u:4575: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa follows the advice of the Buddha, and in a short time becomes an arhat
V03vinv172u:4576: athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandya anumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4577: athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśo bhagavatā anena vīṇopamena avavādenāvavāditaḥ eko vyapakṛṣṭaḥ apramattaḥ ātāpī prahitātmā vyāhārṣīt;
V03vinv172u:4578: eko vyapakṛṣṭaḥ apramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharan,
V03vinv172u:4579: yadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy (SBV II 144)
V03vinv172u:4580: ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
V03vinv172u:4581: tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā upasaṃpadya pravedayate:
V03vinv172u:4586: ājñātavān sa āyuṣmān arhan babhūva suvimuktacittaḥ
V03vinv172u:4587: athāyuṣmataḥ śroṇāsya koṭīviṃśasya arhatvaprāptasya vimuktiprītisukhasaṃvedinaḥ etad abhavat:
V03vinv172u:4588: ayaṃ me kālo bhagavantaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkramituṃ,
V03vinv172u:4590: athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ sāyāhne oratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya yena hagavāṃś tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4591: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte nyaṣīdat;
V03vinv172u:4592: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ bhagavantam idam avocat
V03vinv172u:4595_0: yo 'sau bhadanta bhikṣur bhavati arhan kṣīṇāsravaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ apahṛtabhāraḥ
V03vinv172u:4595_1: anuprāptasvakāryaḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaḥ sa tasmin samaye
V03vinv172u:4597: trṣṇākṣayam upādānakṣayam asaṃ moṣaṃ ca cetasā adhimukto bhavati;
V03vinv172u:4598: syāt khalu bhadanta ihaikatyasya evaṃ śraddhāmātrakaṃ,
V03vinv172u:4599: bata ayam āyuṣmān niśritya naiṣkramyam adhimukta iti;
V03vinv172u:4600: na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ kṣayād bhadanta rāgasya kṣayād dveṣasya kṣayān mohasya naiṣkramyam adhimukto bhavati;
V03vinv172u:4601: syāt khalu ihaikatyasya evaṃ śīlamātrakaṃ bata ayam āyuṣmān niśritya avyābādhyam adhimukta iti;
V03vinv172u:4603: kṣayād bhadanta rāgasya kṣayād dveṣasya kṣayān mohasya avyābādhyam adhimukto bhavati;
V03vinv172u:4604: syāt khalu bhadanta ihaikatyasya evaṃ lābhasatkāraślokamātrakaṃ (SBV II 145)
V03vinv172u:4605: bata ayam āyuṣmān parimṛgayamāṇāḥ prāvivekyam adhimukta iti;
V03vinv172u:4607: kṣayād bhadanta rāgasya kṣayād dveṣasya kṣayān mohasya tṛṣṇākṣayam upādānakṣayam asaṃmoṣaṃ ca cetasā adhimukto bhavati;
V03vinv172u:4609: kṣīṇāsravaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ apahṛtabhāraḥ anuprāptasvakāryaḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaḥ tasmin samaye imāni ṣaṭ sthānāny adhimukto bhavati;
V03vinv172u:4610: yo 'sau bhadanta bhikṣur bhavati śaikṣa asaṃprāptamānasaḥ sa uttaraṃ yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇam abhiprārthayamānarūpo bahulaṃ viharati;
V03vinv172u:4611: tasmin samaye śaikṣaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati śaikṣaiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:4612: so 'pareṇa samayena āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtya upasaṃpadya pravedayate; kṣīṇā me jāti,
V03vinv172u:4616: sa tasmin samaye aśaikṣaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati aśaikṣaiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:4617: tadyathā dahraḥ kumārako bālo mandaḥ uttānaśāyī tasmin samaye dahraiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati dahraiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:4619: indriyāṇāṃ paripākāt sa tasmin samaye vṛddhaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati vṛddhaiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:4620: evam eva yo 'sau bhikṣur bhavati śaikṣa asaṃprāptamānasaḥ sa uttaraṃ yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇam abhiprārthayamānarūpo bahulaṃ viharati;
V03vinv172u:4621: sa tasmin samaye śaikṣaiḥ samanvāgato bhavatiṃ śaikṣaiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:4622: so 'pareṇa samayena āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtva upasaṃpadya pravedayate; kṣīṇā me jāti,
V03vinv172u:4626: sa tasmin samaye aśaikṣaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati aśaikṣaiś cendriyaiḥ;
V03vinv172u:4627: tasya cet bhṛśāny api cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi cakṣuṣa ābhāḥ samāgacchanti nāsya tāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ paryādadate;
V03vinv172u:4631_0: tasya ced bhṛśā api śrotavijñeyāḥ śabdāḥ ghrāṇavijñeyāḥ gandhāḥ jihvāvijñeyā rasāḥ
V03vinv172u:4631_1: kāyavijñeyāni spraṣṭavyāni manovijñeyā dharmāḥ manasa ābhāḥ samāgacchanti nāsya tāṃ
V03vinv172u:4635: tadyathā nagarasya vā nigamasya vā nātidūre mahāśailaḥ parvataḥ syāt,
V03vinv172u:4637: tasya cet pūrvasyā diśo bhṛśo vāyuvega āgacchen nainaṃ calayet,
V03vinv172u:4640: saced dakṣiṇasyāḥ paścimāyāḥ uttarasyā diśo vāyuvegaḥ āgacchen nainaṃ calayet,
V03vinv172u:4642: nainaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśy upasaṃharet; yatas tato vā bhṛśo vāyuvega āgacchen nainaṃ calayet,
V03vinv172u:4645: evam eva tasya bhṛśāny api cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi cakṣuṣa ābhāḥ samāgacchanti;
V03vinv172u:4647: sthitam evāsya tac cittaṃ bhavati adhyātma aviparītaṃ suvimuktaṃ subhāvitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4650: idam uktvā arhann athāparam etad uvāca sthaviraḥ
V03vinv172u:4656: kṛteṣu karaṇīyeṣu karaṇiyaṃ na vidyate // (SBV II 147)
V03vinv172u:4657: yathāpi parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate /
V03vinv172u:4658: evaṃ rūpāṇi śabdāś ca sparśā gandhā atho rasāḥ //
V03vinv172u:4659: dharmā iṣṭā aniṣṭaś ca pravepanti tāyinaḥ /
V03vinv172u:4660: sthitaṃ cittam aneyasya vyayaṃ cāsyānupaśyati // iti
V03vinv172u:4661: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:4662: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā śroṇena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4664: paṃcaśatikaś cāsya dine dine sthālipāka upasthāpyate;
V03vinv172u:4665: ita ekanavataṃ kalpam upādāya na kadācid anāstīrṇe pṛthivīpradeśe pādo nyastaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4667: bhagavataś ca śāsane praviśya sarvakleśaprahāṇās arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti
V03vinv172u:4669: śroṇenaiva bhikṣavaḥ koṭīviṃśena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:4670: śroṇakoṭīviṃśena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati?
V03vinv172u:4671: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
V03vinv172u:4675: api tu [A_477a] upātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
V03vinv172u:4676: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv172u:4677: sāmagrīm prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
V03vinv172u:4681: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi,
V03vinv172u:4682: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv172u:4683: sa dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāraḥ janapadacārikāṃ caran bandhumatīrājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4684: tena khalu samayena bandhumatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ saṃbahulā goṣṭhikāḥ prativasanti;
V03vinv172u:4685: taiḥ śrutaṃ vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāraḥ janapadacārikāṃ caran ihānuprāptaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4686: śrutvā ca punaḥ sarve saṃbhūya yena vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4687: upasaṃkramya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4688: ekāntaniṣaṇṇān sambahulān goṣṭhikān vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv172u:4691: atha sambahulā goṣṭhikāḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya vipaśyinaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocan:
V03vinv172u:4692: adhivāsayatv asmākaṃ bhagavān traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃghena iti /
V03vinv172u:4693: adhivāsayati vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saṃbahulānāṃ goṣṭhikānāṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvena
V03vinv172u:4694_0: atha saṃbahulā goṣṭhikā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvena adhivāsanāṃ viditvā
V03vinv172u:4694_1: bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavato pādau śirasā vanditvā uttahāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4695: te saṃsthāgāre sannipatya sañjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4696: katham asmābhir bhavanto bhagavān bhojayitavyaḥ kiṃ saṃbhūya āhosvid ekaikena iti;
V03vinv172u:4698: yadi dine dine saṃbhūya bhojayitavyo 'sau asmākaṃ kṛṣikarmāntāḥ samucchetsyanti;
V03vinv172u:4699: tad yadi bhavatām abhirucitaṃ vāreṇa vāraṃ bhojayāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4700: te vāreṇa vāraṃ gaṇādhīnaṃ bhojayitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4707: kathaṃ mayā bhojayitavyaḥ iti; sā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4708: putra yady evam apaścimaṃ divasaṃ gṛhāṇa;
V03vinv172u:4710: gaṇasantakāc ca kiṃcid utsadanadharmakaṃ bhaviṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:4719: tataḥ paṃcaśatikaṃ pākaṃ sādhayitvā mahatā satkāreṇa vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddho bhojitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4720: pādayoś ca praṇipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo jāyeya;
V03vinv172u:4721: mā kadācid anāstīrṇe pṛthivīpradeśe pādau sthāpayeyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4722: yādṛśāni ca vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya suvarṇavarṇāni caturaṅgulamātrāṇi romāṇi pādatalayor jātāni,
V03vinv172u:4728: yo 'sau goṣṭhiko brāhmaṇadārakaḥ eṣa evāsau śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4729: yad anena vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
V03vinv172u:4730: tasya karmaṇo vipākena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4731: pādayoś cāsya suvarṇavarṇāni caturaṅgulamātrāṇi romāṇi jātāni;
V03vinv172u:4732: ita ekanavataṃ kalpam upādāya na kadācid anāstīrne pṛthivīpradeśe pādau sthāpitau;
V03vinv172u:4734: mama ca śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4735: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4738: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogāḥ karaṇīyaḥ ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam*
V03vinv172u:4740: Rājagṛha's people begins tu murmur against Ajātaśatru and Devadatta
V03vinv172u:4741: yadā ajātaśatruṇā devadattākalyāṇamitropagūḍhena rājño bimbisārasya kanakaḥ kṣiptaḥ tadā rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurāḥ avadhyātum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4742: tatra kecid rājñaḥ akarṇaṃ bhāṣante ayaṃ pituḥ śatrutve vyākṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4743: kasmān na jātamātra eva praghātitaḥ iti; apare kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:4744: na bhavanto rājño 'parādhaḥ; kiṃ sarveṣāṃ vyākaraṇaṃ bhūtaṃ bhavati?
V03vinv172u:4745: vinīta evāyaṃ kumāraḥ; api tu devadattenāyam akalyāṇamitreṇa vipralabdhaḥ,
V03vinv172u:4748: na bhavanto rājño doṣaḥ nāpi devadattasya;
V03vinv172u:4751: no tu lokadhātvantaraṃ nītvā avasthāpitaḥ iti; apare kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:4753: api tu saṃghasya yenāsya utkṣepanīyaṃ karma na kṛtam iti;
V03vinv172u:4754: tatra yena rājñaḥ akarṇaṃ bhāṣyate tena (SBV II 150)
V03vinv172u:4755: na rājā ārtīyate karmāṇy etāni mayā pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu kṛtāni upacitāni iti;
V03vinv172u:4756: yena tu bhagavataḥ saṃghasya ca akarṇaṃ bhāṣyate,
V03vinv172u:4757: tena rājā atyartham ārtīyate; madīyena durnītena loko bhagavataḥ saṃghasya ca akarṇaṃ bhāṣate iti
V03vinv172u:4758: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
V03vinv172u:4759: paśya bhadanta anyair aparāddham [A_478a] anye doṣeṇa lipyante iti,
V03vinv172u:4761: na bhikṣava etarhi; yathā atīte 'py adhvany anyair aparāddham anye doṣeṇa liptāḥ; tac chrūyatāṃ
V03vinv172u:4763: The story of Kūla and Upakūla
V03vinv172u:4764: (concerning a previous birth of Devadatta and Ajātaśatru)
V03vinv172u:4765: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati,
V03vinv172u:4766: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:4767: tasya dvau kukkurau kūlaś ca upakūlaś ca;
V03vinv172u:4769: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājño brahmadattasya saṃgrāmaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4773: paśyanti sarvāṃ chinnapracchinnāṃ; tai rājñe niveditaṃ:
V03vinv172u:4776: bhavanto yady evaṃ parityaktā mayā kukkurāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4779: yāvad anyatamo jānapadaḥ kukkuraḥ janapadād vārāṇasīṃ gacchati;
V03vinv172u:4780: tena te niṣpalāyamānā dṛṣṭāḥ; pṛṣṭāś ca:
V03vinv172u:4781: bhavantaḥ kimartham evaṃ yūyaṃ santrastāḥ iti; tair yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyātaṃ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4782: kimarthaṃ rājā yuṣmābhir na vijñaptaḥ iti; te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:4783: kaḥ śaknoti rājānaṃ vijñapayitum anya praghātitāḥ; vayaṃ kathaṃcit prapalāyitāḥ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4785: ahaṃ yuṣmākam arthe rājānaṃ vijñapayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:4787: tatas tena saṃpātavelāyāṃ śravaṇopavicāre sthitvā rājā gāthayā vijñaptaḥ
V03vinv172u:4791: aghātyaghāto na hi deva yuktaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:4792: rājñā śrutaṃ; tena prabhātāyaṃ rajanyām amātyānām ājñā dattā:
V03vinv172u:4793: bhavanto yenāhaṃ rātrau gāthayā vijñaptaḥ tasya samanveṣaṇaṃ kuruta iti;
V03vinv172u:4795: samanveṣatat bhavantaḥ kena devo rātrau gāthayā vijñaptaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4796: taiḥ samākhyātaṃ jānapadena kukkureṇeti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4797: bhavantaḥ parīkṣāṃ kuruta kiṃ kūlopakūlābhyāṃ bhakṣitam āhosvit anyaiḥ kukkuraiḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4799: bhavanto devenaivājñā dattā kukkurāṇāṃ parīkṣāṃ kuruteti;
V03vinv172u:4800: tat katham eṣāṃ parīkṣā kartavyā iti; anye kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:4801: kim atra parīkṣitavyaṃ keśāṇḍukaṃ datvā chardāpayitavyau;
V03vinv172u:4807: yau kūlopakūlau etāv eva devadattājātaśatrū tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4808: tadāpi etābhyām aparāddham anye doṣeṇa liptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4809: etarhy api etābhyām aparāddham anye doṣeṇa liptāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4810: punar api yathā devadattaḥ akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:4812: The story of a hunter and an ungrateful man
V03vinv172u:4814: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājyaṃ kārayati;
V03vinv172u:4815: yāvad anyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ [A_478b] paraśum ābhaṅgīm ādāya kāṣṭhārthī vanaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv172u:4828: yāvat daivān mṛgalubdhako mṛgān paryeṣamāṇas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4829: sa taṃ kūpaṃ nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ; (SBV II 152)
V03vinv172u:4832: tatas tena mṛgalubdhakena jñātvā pūrvataraṃ siṃha uddhṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4837: kṛtaghnā hy eta bhavanti ity uktvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4838: yāvat tena mṛgalubdhakena sarve anupūrveṇa uddhṛtāḥ;
V03vinv172u:4839: yāvad apareṇa samayena siṃhena mṛgo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4840: sa ca mṛgalubdhakas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4841: siṃhena taṃ parijñāya sa mṛgaḥ pādayor nipatya dattaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4842: apareṇa samayena rājā brahmadattaḥ udyānabhūmiṃ nirgataḥ sārdham antaḥpureṇa;
V03vinv172u:4843: sa tatrodyāne sukham anubhūya middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4844: antaḥpurajano viśvastavihārī udyāne caṃkramyate tiṣṭhati niṣīdati middham avakrāmati;
V03vinv172u:4847: yāvad anyatamā antaḥpurikā alaṃkāram avamucya pārśve sthāpayitvā middham avakrāntā;
V03vinv172u:4848: tat śyenakenāpahṛtya tasmai lubdhakāya kṛtajñatayā dattaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4849: rājā brahmadatto nidrāklamaṃ prativinodya laghu laghv eva vārāṇasīṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4854: deva udyāne me alaṃkāraḥ apahṛtaḥ iti; rājñā amātyānām ājñā dattā:
V03vinv172u:4858: sa kṛṣṇaśiraskaḥ tasya mṛgalubdhakasya kālena kālam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:4859: tena tasya gṛham upasaṃkrāmatā upāṃśunā vijñātam asyālaṃkāro 'stīti;
V03vinv172u:4861: tato rājñā paramakopakupitena mṛgalubdhako rājapuruṣair āhvāyya uktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:4862: bhoḥ puruṣa tvayā udyānād alaṃkāro 'pahṛtaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4863: tatas tena santrastena yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyāya asāv alaṃkāro rājñe samarpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4864: tathāpy asau puruṣaḥ cārake badhvā sthāpitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4866: tena kṛṣṇaśiraskena pāpakāriṇā asmākaṃ kalyāṇamitro rājñā cārake badhvā sthāpitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:4869: tvayā ebhir mantrapadair ebhiś ca oṣadhaiḥ cikitsitavyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4870: evaṃ sa rājā abhiprasanno niyataṃ tvāṃ muñcati;
V03vinv172u:4871: bhogasaṃvibhāgaṃ ca karoti iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4874: lubdhakena gatvā mantraiś cauṣadhaiś ca cikitsitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4878: yo 'sau lubdhakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4879: yo 'sau kṛtaghnapuruṣaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4882: punar api yathā akṛtajñaḥ akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
V03vinv172u:4884: The story of Nanda, the Mungoose
V03vinv172u:4890: yāvad asau nakulas taṃ mūṣikam abhidravitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4903: tayor arthāya āśayena āhāraṃ paryeṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:4908: priyasenaḥ saṃlakṣayati kṛcchrasaṅkaṭasaṃbādhaprāpto 'py eṣas tasya badhāya parākramati;
V03vinv172u:4909: prāg eva yady asau vinā āhāreṇa āgacchati;
V03vinv172u:4913: yadi gaṅgadattaḥ vinā āhāreṇāgacchati sa eva mayā bhakṣayitavya iti;
V03vinv172u:4914: gaṅgadattena āhāraṃ paryeṣamāṇena na kiṃcid āsāditaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4915: sa saṃlakṣayati niyatam asau māṃ bhakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:4922: yo 'sau gaṅgadattaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4923: yo 'sau nandanāmā nakulaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:4925: etarhy apy eṣa akṛtajñaḥ akṛtavedī (SBV II 154)
V03vinv172u:4927: bhuṅkṣva likhir naṭaḥ kākaḥ cakraḥ kumbhīracandanam /
V03vinv172u:4928: kāyaḥ kavir maṇir vaṇṭaḥ kanyātha dhanapālakaḥ //
V03vinv172u:4930: King Bimbisāra makes exceeding grants to Ajātaśatru
V03vinv172u:4931: yadā ajātaśatruṇā rājño bimbisārasya kanakaḥ kṣiptaḥ tadā rājñā upālabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:4932: kumāra kimarthaṃ tvayā mama kanakaḥ kṣiptaḥ sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4933: deva roṣāt; devasya bhogāḥ saṃvidyante; mama na [A_480b] saṃvidyante; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4934: putra yady evaṃ gaccha campā sādhāraṇā tava bhavatu iti;
V03vinv172u:4935: sa hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudito devadattasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4936: ārya mayā campā sādhāraṇā labdhā iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4937: kumāra dṛṣṭaṃ te parākramasya phalam ārya dṛṣṭaṃ;
V03vinv172u:4947: tad arhati devaḥ kumārasya nivāraṇaṃ kartum iti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4948: kumāra kasmāj janapadān pīḍayasi iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4949: deva sādhanaṃ na puṣyati iti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4950: yady evaṃ rājagṛham ekaṃ tyaktvā magadhaviṣayaṃ gṛhāṇa iti;
V03vinv172u:4951: magadhaviṣayaṃ gṛhītvā devadattasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4953: rājagṛham ekaṃ muktvā sarvo magadhaviṣayo labdhaḥ iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4960: sa rājñā āhūyoktaḥ kumāra kimarthaṃ magadhaviṣayaṃ nāśayasi iti;
V03vinv172u:4961: sa kathayati deva prabhūto janakāyo na puṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:4963: kumāra yady evaṃ kośam ekaṃ muktvā sarvaṃ tavaiva bhavatu iti;
V03vinv172u:4964: sa rājagṛham api gṛhītvā devadattasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4972: rājagṛhanivāsī janakāyaḥ anyaś ca magadhanivāsī campeyaś ca sarva eva santrastāḥ yathā ajātaśatrur na paśyati tathā dūtasaṃpreṣaṇena rājānaṃ vijñapayitum ārabdhāḥ:
V03vinv172u:4979: tena samutpannamanyunā ajātaśatrur āhūya priyamadhuravaconukūlatayā śiras parāmṛśyoktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:4980: putra mayā tava sarvajanapadā dattāḥ; kimartham udvejayasi?
V03vinv172u:4982: deva kośabalino rājānaḥ; mama kośabalaṃ nāsti; kiṃ karomi iti; a kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4983: yady evam antaḥpuram ekaṃ muktvā sarvaṃ tavaiva bhavatu iti;
V03vinv172u:4984: tathāpy asau duṣṭaprakṛtiḥ pāpasahāyaś ca nāśayaty eva,
V03vinv172u:4986: sakośakoṣṭhāgārajanapadās tavaiva dattāḥ; idānīṃ kimarthaṃ nāśayasi iti
V03vinv172u:4988: Ajātaśatru casts his father in prison, there to die of hunger
V03vinv172u:4989: sa evam ukte ruṣitaḥ amātyānāṃ kathayati: bhavanto yo rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ paribhāṣate,
V03vinv172u:4990: tasya ko daṇḍaḥ iti; amātyāḥ kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:4991: deva vadho daṇḍaḥ iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:4999: ajātaśatruś caṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśaḥ iti nāsya kaścit parivādaṃ mantrayati;
V03vinv172u:5005: deva jananī te sthālīpākaṃ praveśayati iti; ajātaśatruṇā ājñā dattā:
V03vinv172u:5006: dhārayata bhaktaṃ pānaṃ ca yathā na bhūyaḥ praveśayati iti;
V03vinv172u:5007: antaḥpure cājñā dattā na kenacic cārake bhaktaṃ pānaṃ praveśayitavyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5008: yaḥ praveśayati tasya vadho daṇḍaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5009: tasya raudrakarmatāṃ jñātvā na kaścid bhaktaṃ sādhayati;
V03vinv172u:5011: tato vaidehī bhartṛsnehoparuddhyamānahṛdayā saktukalkena gātrāṇi mrakṣayitvā nūpurāṇi ca pānīyasya pūrayitvā praveśayitum ārabdhā;
V03vinv172u:5014: kiṃtu anurāgāt tasya rājñaḥ ajātaśatror na nivedayanti;
V03vinv172u:5017: iti; tair istareṇa samākhyātaṃ; sa kathayati: bhavanto vaidehīṃ dhārayata,
V03vinv172u:5019: tato bhagavān tatkuśalamūlāvaropaṇārthaṃ gṛddhrakūṭaparvate vātāyanābhimukhaṃ caṃkramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5020: rājā bimbisāraḥ vātāyanena bhagavantam avalokya prāmodyam utpādayati yena prāṇair na viyujyate;
V03vinv172u:5021: ājātaśatruḥ ca bhūyaś cārakapuruṣān pṛccchati bhavantaḥ annapānaṃ vidhāritaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5022: idānīṃ vṛddharājaḥ kathaṃ yāpayati iti; te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:5024: tam asau sthitaḥ pratidinaṃ parīkṣate iti;
V03vinv172u:5026: tasya ca pādau kṣureṇa nirlikhata iti;
V03vinv172u:5030: na māṃ bhagavān kṛcchrasaṅkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaṃ samanvāharati iti
V03vinv172u:5032: The Buddha sends Maudgalyāyana to visit and comfort the old king
V03vinv172u:5033: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcit buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5034: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ (SBV II 157)
V03vinv172u:5035_4: trī rātres trir divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
V03vinv172u:5036_0: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkataprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ
V03vinv172u:5036_2: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5039: kasya pakvāni vimocayeyam iti; tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:5040: gaccha maudgalyāyana; rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ madvacanād ārogya; evaṃ sa vada:
V03vinv172u:5042: yat kalyāṇamitreṇa karaṇīyaṃ kṛtaṃ tat te mayā;
V03vinv172u:5050: api tu tvayaivaitāni karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:5052: na mahārāja karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
V03vinv172u:5056: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
V03vinv172u:5057: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /

V03vinv172u:5137: (concerning a previous birth of King Bimbisāra)
V03vinv172u:5138: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktāḥ ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;

V03vinv172u:5170: kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā na vācikī;
V03vinv172u:5171: sa upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprāṭihāryāṇi kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5173: sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati;
V03vinv172u:5177: tena tasya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5178: yan mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye apakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,

V03vinv172u:5184: yo 'sau kumbhakāraḥ eṣa eva sa rājā bimbisāraḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:5185: yat pratyekabuddhasyāntike cittaṃ pradūṣya kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena pādau nirlikhitau;

V03vinv172u:5295: The story of a crow and a golden cap (suvarṇakholā)
V03vinv172u:5297: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamā strī proṣitabhatṛkā;
V03vinv172u:5298: tasyāḥ purastāt kāko madhuramadhuraṃ rauti; sā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5299: utkrāmotkrāma vāyasa; yadi me bhartā svastinā kṣemeṇa āgacchati,
V03vinv172u:5301: yāvad asau tasyā bhartā svastinā āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:5302: sa kākas tasyāḥ purastāt suvarṇakholānimittaṃ madhuramadhuraṃ virauti;
V03vinv172u:5303: tatas tayā tasya sauvarṇā kholā dattā;

V03vinv172u:5316: tvaṃ mayā rājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ; tvam api māṃ buddhatve pratiṣṭhāpaya iti; sa kathayati (SBV II 165)

V03vinv172u:5344: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo haimavato hastī pānīyaṃ pātum avatīrṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5346: sa hastipadaṃ dṛṣṭvā ātmīyena padena māpayitum ārabdhaḥ; sa saṃlakṣayati:

V03vinv172u:5358: Devadatta calls a skilled master-mechanic and makes him construct a catapult in front of the Buddha's residence
V03vinv172u:5359: buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati gṛdhrakūṭe parvate kumbhīrayakṣasya bhavane;
V03vinv172u:5361: mayā tvaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ; tvayāhaṃ na śakto buddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayitum?
V03vinv172u:5362: idānīm ahaṃ śramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayāmi;
V03vinv172u:5363: na tvayā samanveṣṭavyaṃ kena praghātitaḥ kutra praghātitaḥ iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5364: evam astu iti; yāvad dakṣiṇāpathād yantrakalācāryaḥ abhyāgataḥ; sa devadattena [A_484a] āhūyoktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:5365: bhoḥ ācārya śakṣyasi tvam īdṛśaṃ yantraṃ kartuṃ yaḥ paṃcabhiḥ puruṣaśataiḥ āmreḍyate?
V03vinv172u:5372: tanmukhaṃ gṛdhrakūṭasyopari yantraṃ sajjīkuru iti; tatra paṃca manuṣyaśatāni sthāpitāni,
V03vinv172u:5373: ye tad yantram āmreḍayanti; aparasmin sthāne ardhatṛtīyāni śatāni sthāpitāni,
V03vinv172u:5374: uktāni ca; yadi śramaṇo gautamo yantreṇa na praghātyate,
V03vinv172u:5376: aparasminn api sthāne tadarthena ardhatṛtīyāni manuṣyaśatāni;
V03vinv172u:5378: yeṣāṃ yuṣmākaṃ śramaṇo gautamo bhāgaprāpto bhavati,
V03vinv172u:5382: yāvat tāni paṃca puruṣaśatāni yantram āmreḍayitum ārabdhāni;
V03vinv172u:5386: The workmen refuse to kill the Buddha, go away, sit down at his feet, and are convertef by him
V03vinv172u:5387: yāvat paśyanti adhastād buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ; te kathayanti: bhavanto varaṃ (SBV II 167)
V03vinv172u:5389: na tu devamanuṣyapūjitasya buddhasya bhagavataḥ prāṇaghātaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5391: te yantraṃ parityajya gṛdhrakūṭe itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramanti,
V03vinv172u:5394: teṣāṃ cetasā cittam ājñāya bhagavatā sopānaṃ nirmitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5397: bhagavata eṣo 'nubhāvaḥ iti; bhūyasyā mātrayā cittam abhiprasādya sopānena avatīrya,
V03vinv172u:5399: bhagavān api tadvinayanāpekṣayaiva gṛdhrakūṭe parvate caṅkramyamāṇo 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5400: tatas te bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya:
V03vinv172u:5401: bhagavatā teṣām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñatvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,

V03vinv172u:5521: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;

V03vinv172u:5554: Jīvaka prescribes a very rare substance called gośīrṣacandana in order to stop the hemorrhage at the foot of the Buddha
V03vinv172u:5557: jīvako vaidyarājo bhagavato rujāvalokakaḥ trikālam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:5558: rājagṛhanivāsī śrāddho janakāyaḥ nānādeśabhyāgatāś ca samyagdarśanasaṃpannāḥ dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ sārthavāhāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5560: jīvaka idam atra bhaiṣajyaṃ śobhanam iti; anye kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:5561: idaṃ śobhanam iti; jīvako vaidyarājaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5562: asty atra sadyaḥpraśamanaṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ; kiṃ tu tad durlabhaṃ; āyuṣmān ānanda kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5565: tena khalu samayena goṣīrṣacandanasya prāptir eva samucchinnā;
V03vinv172u:5566: yāvad anyatamena vaṇijā gośīrṣacandanam ātyayikaṃ sthāpitam:
V03vinv172u:5567: ayaṃ rājā ajātaśatruś caṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśaḥ;

V03vinv172u:5570: yasmād ahaṃ kālānukālaṃ gośīrṣacandanavikrayaṃ kṛtavān iti;
V03vinv172u:5571: tena śrutaṃ yathā jīvakena vaidyarājena bhagavato rujāpraśamanaṃ gośīrṣacandanam upadiṣṭam iti; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:5573: yady ahaṃ bhagavato gośīrṣacandanaṃ pradāsyāmi sthānam etad vidyate yad anarthaṃ kariṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:5575: bhagavān devamanuṣyapūjitaḥ; yadi tasyārthāy prāṇaviyogo bhavati,
V03vinv172u:5577: yannv ahaṃ bhagavato gośīrṣacandanaṃ prayaccheyam iti;
V03vinv172u:5578: sa gośīrṣacandanam ādāya bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5579: bhagavann upalabdhaṃ mayā bhagavato gośīrṣacandanena prayojanam iti;
V03vinv172u:5580: idaṃ tat pratigṛhṇātu bhagavān anukampām upādāya iti;
V03vinv172u:5582: pratigṛhṇīṣva ānanda asya mahātmanaḥ sakāśād gośīrṣacandanam iti;
V03vinv172u:5584: tato 'sau vaṇik prītiprāmodyajātaḥ bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ

V03vinv172u:5698_0: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti tāś cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān yāmān tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn
V03vinv172u:5698_1: paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān

V03vinv172u:5698_3: abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmā ity udghoṣayanti;
V03vinv172u:5701: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
V03vinv172u:5702: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
V03vinv172u:5704: atha tā arciṣas trisahasramahāsahasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti;
V03vinv172u:5705: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
V03vinv172u:5712: balacakravartirājyaṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati vāme karatale antardhīyante;
V03vinv172u:5713: cakravartirājyaṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati dakṣiṇe karatale antardhīyante;
V03vinv172u:5717: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati uṣṇīṣe antardhīyante
V03vinv172u:5718: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyām antarhitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:5736: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:5737: bhagavān āha: dṛṣṭas tvayā ananda sā dārikā,
V03vinv172u:5738: yayā mamāntike cittam abhiprasādyakṣīraṃ dattaṃ dṛṣṭā bhadanta;
V03vinv172u:5739: eṣā sā ānanda dārikā anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca kṣīraprado nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv172u:5740: ayam asyā deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasādaḥ iti
V03vinv172u:5745: nānādeśanivāsino bhikṣavaḥ abhyāgatāḥ bhagavata evaṃvidham ābādhaṃ (SBV II 174)
V03vinv172u:5750: samaṃ te bhagavaṃś cittaṃ putreṣv api ariṣv api /
