V03vinv172u:5753_0: bhikṣavaḥ pramuditamanasaḥ saṃvṛttāḥ bhikṣuṇyaḥ upāsakāḥ upāsikyaḥ bhūyasā sarva
V03vinv172u:5753_1: eva rājagṛhanivāsī janakāyaḥ sthāpayitvā devadattājātaśatrū kokālikakhaṇḍadravyakaṭamorakatiṣyasamudradattāṃś ca;
V03vinv172u:5754: bhagavān jānann eva yo yathā cikitsāṃ karoti,
V03vinv172u:5757: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:5758: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmatā daśabalakāśyapena satyopayācanayā sravad rudhiraṃ vidhāritam iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:5759: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani aham anena viṣakṛtena paryākulīkṛto nirviṣīkṛtaḥ; tac chrūyatāṃ
V03vinv172u:5763: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasya karvaṭakasya nātidūre udyānaṃ mūlakandapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannaṃ nānāvihaganikūjitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5764: tatra ṛṣiḥ prativasati phalamūlāmbubhakṣaḥ ajinavalkalavāsāḥ vidyāmantradhārī ca;
V03vinv172u:5767: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:5768: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:5769: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:5771: tasya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:5773: sa caṃkramyamāṇaḥ [A_488b] sthito śayito vā kuśalaṃ cittam atikuśalaṃ ca karma karoti;
V03vinv172u:5774: tasya janakāyena dharmakāma iti saṃjñā kṛtā;
V03vinv172u:5775: sa kiṃkuśalagaveṣitayā karvaṭakān niṣkramya kālānukālaṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:5782: sa mātāpitṛbhyāṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam upanītaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5783: maharṣe upasthāyakas te viṣakṛtena prāṇair viyujyate;
V03vinv172u:5786: samaṃ te dāraka cittaṃ mitreṣv api ripuṣv api /
V03vinv172u:5787: anena satyavākyena nirviṣo bhava dāraka // iti
V03vinv172u:5789: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau dārakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:5790: yo 'sau ṛṣiḥ eṣa eva sa daśabalakāśyapaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5792: etarhy apy aham anena satyopayācanena svasthīkṛtaḥ
V03vinv172u:5796: vyarthaṃ mayā śramaṇasya gautamasya śilā kṣiptā;
V03vinv172u:5799: sa vṛkṣamūlaṃ gatvā cintāparaḥ kṛtakena paryaṅkaṃ badhvā avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5805: kiṃ bhavanto yadvā tadvā asamīkṣya kathayanti nanu paśyata devadattam asmin vṛkṣamūle;
V03vinv172u:5808: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:5809: paśya bhadanta amī kokālikakhaṇḍadravyakaṭamorakatiṣyasamudradattāḥ ātmanā alajjinaḥ alajjino devadattasya varṇaṃ bhāṣante iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:5810: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani ete alajjina alajjino varṇam abhāṣanta;
V03vinv172u:5813: The story of a jackal and a crow
V03vinv172u:5814: (concerning a previous birth of Devadatta, etc.)
V03vinv172u:5815: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo rājagṛhīyakair manuṣyaiḥ rājñā ca kenacit kāraṇena kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā dve śmaśāne vyavasthāpite,
V03vinv172u:5816: ekasmin pradeśe puruṣāś chorayitavyāḥ ekasmin striyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:5818: sa na ekasmin śmaśāne avakāśaṃ labhate,
V03vinv172u:5823: tasmiṃś ca pradeśe trikaṇṭakedārairaṇḍavṛkṣāś ca santi;
V03vinv172u:5831: sa tasya gāthayā varṇaṃ bhāṣitum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:5832: siṃhasya te yathā grīvā ṛṣabhasya yathā kaṭiḥ /
V03vinv172u:5833: mṛgarāja namas tubhyaṃ bhuktaśeṣaṃ labhemahi // iti
V03vinv172u:5836: avabhāsya diśaḥ sarvāḥ bhrājate ratnapiṇḍavat // iti
V03vinv172u:5839: mṛharāja nams tubhyaṃ bhuktaśeṣaṃ labhemahi // iti
V03vinv172u:5842: ākrandacāriṇāṃ śreṣṭha ehi bhuṅkṣva yathāsukhaṃ // iti
V03vinv172u:5843: so 'vatīrṇaḥ sṛgālena saha kuṇapaṃ bhakṣayan tena ṛṣiṇā dṛṣṭaḥ; sa gāthāṃ bhāṣate (SBV II 177)
V03vinv172u:5845: vṛkṣādhamasya cchāyāyāṃ bhuñjate kuṇapaṃ saha // iti
V03vinv172u:5846: kākena śrutaṃ; sa sāmarṣaṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:5847: yadi siṃho myūraś ca bhuñjate varajāṅgalam /
V03vinv172u:5850: pakṣiṇām adhamaḥ kākaḥ jambukaś ca catuṣpadām /
V03vinv172u:5851: eraṇḍaś cāpi vṛkṣāṇāṃ mauṣyānāṃ ca paṇḍakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:5853: tataḥ kāko bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃjātāmarṣo ṛṣer agniśaraṇaṃ praviśya vyavalokayitum ārabdho na paśyati kiṃcit;
V03vinv172u:5855: yāvad asau ṛṣir agniśaraṇaṃ praviśya paśyati kamaṇḍaluṃ bhagnaṃ; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:5856: tasyaitad duṣkākasya karma nānyasya; iti viditvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:5857: na rocyās tādṛśāḥ kecid alajināḥ krūrāśayāḥ /
V03vinv172u:5859: avarṇārho na varṇārhaḥ na vācyaṃ khalu sarvathā /
V03vinv172u:5860: kiṃcin matimatā nityaṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvaḥ sukhāvahaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:5861: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau ṛṣir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:5862: sṛgālo devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena,
V03vinv172u:5863: kākaḥ kokālikaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:5864: tadāpy etāv alajjinau alajjinor varṇam abhāṣātām;
V03vinv172u:5865: etarhy apy etāv alajjinau alajjinor varṇaṃ bhāṣete
V03vinv172u:5866: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:5867: kutra bhadanta bhagavato devadattasya ca tatprathamato vairūkṣyam utpannam iti; bhagavān āha
V03vinv172u:5869: The story of the two birds Dharma and Adharma
V03vinv172u:5870: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and of Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:5871: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dvau jīvajīvakau ekena kāyena samudratīre prativasataḥ dharmaś cādharmaś ca;
V03vinv172u:5873: avakrāntaḥ; dharmo jāgarti; tena amṛtaphalam uhyamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ; tena tad gṛhītaṃ; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:5884: kasya eṣa udgāraḥ iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5887: mayā tava suptasya amṛtaphalaṃ labdhaṃ; tan mayā bhakṣitaṃ; tvaṃ notthāpitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:5888: ekasminn eva śarīre vipakṣyate iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5891: yāvad apareṇa samayena dharmo middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5898: yatra yatra janmani tava vadhakaḥ syāṃ pratyarthikaḥ pratyamitraḥ iti; dharmaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5900: tatra tatra janmani tava maitryupasaṃhāraṃ kuryām iti
V03vinv172u:5902: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau dharmaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:5903: yo 'sāv adharmaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:5909: The story of Sūryanemi the poet
V03vinv172u:5910: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and of Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:5911: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ sarjaraso nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:5912: tena bhūmyantarasya rājñaḥ sakāśād dārikā labdhā;
V03vinv172u:5913: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:5914: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ sā dārikā kālāntareṇa āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:5915: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt sūryodaye prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:5918: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyte kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma iti;
V03vinv172u:5924: dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:5925: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
V03vinv172u:5926: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṅkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ;
V03vinv172u:5927_0: yāni rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryam anuprāptānāṃ
V03vinv172u:5927_1: mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalam abhinirjitya adhyāvasatāṃ pṛthag bhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni
V03vinv172u:5927_2: tadyathā hastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarau dhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe aṃkuśagrahe
V03vinv172u:5927_3: pāśagrahe tomaragrahe chedye bhedye vedhye muṣṭibandhe pādabandhe śikhābandhe dūravedhe
V03vinv172u:5927_4: śabdavedhe marmavedhe akṣūṇavedhe dṛḍhaprahāritāyāṃ pañcasu sthāneṣu kṛtāvī saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5928: sa pitrā yauvarājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ [A_490a] sarjarasasya rājñaḥ agramahiṣī dharmā nāma;
V03vinv172u:5931: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājā sarjarasaḥ dharmayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:5932: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ dharmā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:5935: sa rājānaṃ jīvitād vyaparopya svayam eva paṭṭe badhvā rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayiṣyati iti;
V03vinv172u:5944: ayam amātyo goniṣādaḥ mayā praṇītair bhogaiḥ saṃvibhaktaḥ,
V03vinv172u:5945: pratipālitaś ca; asya dharmāṃ samarpayāmi iti; tena goniṣāda āhūyoktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:5950: tvayā matpriyatayā tathā anuṣṭheyaṃ yathā dharmā sūryaneminā jīvitān na vyaparopyate (SBV II 180)
V03vinv172u:5952: deva tad api na śakyaṃ te kartum; alpotsuko bhavatu devaḥ; tathā kariṣye yathā na praghātyate iti
V03vinv172u:5964: tad yadi dārakaṃ janayiṣyati sa eva jīvitād vyaparopyate iti;
V03vinv172u:5969: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:5973: sa jātamātra eva kaivartīṃ dhanena pralobhya parivartitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5975: deva dharmā prasūtā; dārikā jātā iti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5978: sa dārakaḥ kaivartyā āpāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ mahān saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5981: tasya kaviḥ kaivartadārakaḥ kaviḥ kaivartadārakaḥ iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:5983: putras te kāvyakartā saṃvṛttaḥ iti; sā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5984: paśyāmi tāvat kīdṛśaḥ iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5985: alaṃ; kiṃ tena dṛṣṭena iti; sā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:5986: putrābhilāṣiṇī ākāṃkṣaty eva darśanaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate iti;
V03vinv172u:5987: tasyā goniṣādena avaśyanirbandhaṃ jñātvā upāyasaṃvidhānena matsyāṃ kṛtvā praveśitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5989: [A_490b] eṣa kaviḥ kaivartadārako rājānaṃ jīvitād vyaparopya,
V03vinv172u:5990: svayam eva paṭṭāṃ badhvā rājyaṃ kārayiṣyati iti; rājñā śrutaṃ; tenāmātyānām ājñā dattā:
V03vinv172u:5993: sa itaś cāmutaś ca niṣpalāyamāno vṛddhayuvatyā gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5995: tato haridratailena gātrāṇi mrakṣayitvā maṃce āropya mṛta iti kṛtvā niṣkāsitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:5998: tasmin pradeśe anyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ puṣpaphalāni paryeṣate;
V03vinv172u:6001: tair asau puruṣaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ: bho (SBV II 181)
V03vinv172u:6002: puruṣa na tvayā īdṛśaḥ pramāṇena varṇena ca anena pathā gacchan kaścin manuṣyo dṛṣṭaḥ?
V03vinv172u:6010: rajakena vastravaraṇḍena veṣṭayitvā gardabhe āropya karvaṭakān niṣkāsitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6020: tasya tena yathāvṛttam ārocitaṃ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6021: pṛṣṭhato mukhe upānahau kuru iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6022: na mayā kadācid evaṃrūpā upānahā kṛtapūrvā; sa gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:6026: yat pṛṣṭhaṃ tad iha mamāgrataḥ kuruṣva // iti
V03vinv172u:6030: sa tena upānahau prāvṛtya upacchidreṇa niṣpalāyitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6034: rājñā śravaparamparayā śrutaṃ yathā asau nāgair nāgabhavanaṃ praveśitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6038: taiḥ sarve viṣayanivāsinaḥ āhituṇḍikāḥ rājñaḥ upanītāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6042: evaṃ deveti sarve āhituṇḍikāḥ rājñaḥ pratiśrutya tannāgabhavanaṃ gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6043: anyatarasyāṃ cāṭavyāṃ piṅgalo nāma yakṣo māṃsarudhirabhakṣaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6044: tasya bhayāt śvāpadā api tam aṭavīṃ parityajanti;
V03vinv172u:6045: kim uta manuṣyāḥ sā piṅgalāṭavīti prakāśā (SBV II 182)
V03vinv172u:6047: āhituṇḍikena sa nāgas tathā mantrabalādhānād upadruto yathā [A_491a] santrastaḥ piṅgalāṭavyāṃ chorito na śaktas tām atikrāmayituṃ;
V03vinv172u:6049: na śobhanam asmābhiḥ kṛtaṃ yad asau piṅgalāṭavīṃ nātikrāmitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6054: etam artham āhituṇḍikānāṃ nivedayāmaḥ iti; tair āhituṇḍikānāṃ samākhyātaṃ:
V03vinv172u:6057: yat piṅgalāṭavyāṃ samutsṛṣṭaḥ iti; āhituṇḍikaiḥ rājña etat prakaraṇaṃ samākhyātaṃ; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6058: yady apy evaṃ tathāpi samanveṣyatām iti;
V03vinv172u:6059: sa piṅgalāṭavyām itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6060: piṅgalaś ca yakṣaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe kukkuraiḥ parivṛtas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:6061: tenāsau kukkuraiś ca dūrata eva dṛṣṭaḥ; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:6068: bhoḥ puruṣa na tvayā śrutaṃ piṅgalāṭavyāṃ piṅgalo nāma amanuṣyakaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:6069: yas tatra praviśati sa taṃ praghātayati iti;
V03vinv172u:6079: sa vṛkṣāt śanair avatīrya prakrāntaḥ tena tenānvāhiṇḍan; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:6082: tasya ca ṛṣer anyatamasmin parvate udyānaṃ mūlapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannaṃ vividhataruṣaṇḍamaṇḍitaṃ nānāvihaganikūjitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6083: so 'nupūrveṇa śravaparamparayā tasya riṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6088: sa patann anyatamena puruṣeṇa śikhāyāṃ gṛhītāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6091: mṛto 'yaṃ; gacchāmaḥ iti te śikhām ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ kathayanti: (SBV II 183)
V03vinv172u:6097: tayā tasya riṣeḥ samākhyātaṃ: bhāgineyas te kṛcchrasaṅkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ; na samanvāharas?
V03vinv172u:6099: yadi mayā na samanvāhṛto 'bhaviyat prāṇair viyuktaḥ abhaviṣyad iti;
V03vinv172u:6101: īdṛśīṃ vidyāṃ jānīte yayā puruṣaḥ strī bhavati strī puruṣo bhavati;
V03vinv172u:6102: sa tena tāṃ vidyāṃ grāhitaḥ; uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:6105: so 'nyaṃ pratirūpaṃ strīveṣaṃ [A_491b] vidyayā abhinirmāya vārāṇasīṃ gatvā rājakīye udyāne sthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6108: tair laghu laghv eva gatvā sūryanemino rājñaḥ samākhyātaṃ:
V03vinv172u:6113: rājā sūryanemis tayā sārdham atīva saṃraktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6114: tatas tayā avasaraṃ jñātvā rahasi sthito jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6115: punaś ca vidyāṃ parivartya puruṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6116: tataḥ svayam eva paṭṭaṃ badhvā goniṣādasyāmātyasya nivedya rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6118: nāsau hato yaya śiro na chinnaṃ
V03vinv172u:6122: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sūryanemī rājā sarjarasya rājñaḥ putraḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6123: yo 'sau kaviḥ kaivartadārakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6126: bhūyo 'pi yathaiṣa mama vairānubaddhas tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:6128: The story of the two jewellers
V03vinv172u:6129: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and of Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:6130: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin karvaṭake dvau maṇikārau prativasataḥ;
V03vinv172u:6132: tena khalu samayena anyatamaḥ parikṣīṇavibhavo vaṇik;
V03vinv172u:6133: sa maṇibhājanam ādāya taṃ karvaṭakam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6134: tato mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya ekasya maṇikārasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6135: idaṃ maṇibhājnam arghaṃ kuruṣva iti; tena svalpaṃ mūlyaṃ kṛtaṃ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6137: yady api ahaṃ bhogebhyaḥ paribhraṣṭaḥ na tu prajñayā;
V03vinv172u:6146: nāsti me etāvan mūlyam iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6155: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau maṇikāraḥ yena maṇibhājanasya svalpaṃ mūlyaṃ kṛtam eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6156: yo 'sau dvitīyo maṇikāraḥ yena puṣkalaṃ mūlyaṃ kṛtam aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6158: punar api yathā vayoḥ vairūkṣyam utpannaṃ; tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:6160: The story of the elder son of a gṛhapati
V03vinv172u:6161: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:6162: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:6164: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:6165: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ [A_492a] kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:6166: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:6168: sā asya patnī kālagatā; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:6172: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:6180: tasya bahavaḥ putrā duhitaraś ca jātāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6182: āryaputra eṣa dārakas tava ko bhavati?
V03vinv172u:6186: ārya tava bahavaḥ putrāḥ; ayam ekaḥ; eṣāṃ cāsya ca tulyo gṛhabhogo deyaḥ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6187: bhadre eṣa lokadharmaḥ iti; sā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6189: kāmān khalu pratisevamānasya nāsti kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karma akaraṇīyam iti sa puṣpaphalavyājena aṭavīṃ nītvā praghātitaḥ; (SBV II 185)
V03vinv172u:6190: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau jyeṣṭho gṛhapatiputraḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6191: yo 'sau kanīyān aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6194: yathā punar apy āvayor vairūkṣyam utpannaṃ; tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:6196: The story of a girl and an astrologer
V03vinv172u:6197: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:6198: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin karvaṭake brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:6200: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:6201: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:6202: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:6205: yo mamādya gṛhaṃ brāhmaṇo bhikṣārthī praviśati,
V03vinv172u:6206: tasyaināṃ kanyābhikṣāṃ prayacchāmi iti; yāvad anyatamo māṇavaḥ bhikṣārthī tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ:
V03vinv172u:6207: svasti bhikṣāṃ prayaccha iti; tena brāhmaṇenāhūyoktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:6208: māṇava iyaṃ mama duhitā; mayā kanyābhikṣā tubhyaṃ dattā iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6212: yāvad anyatamo māṇavo bhikṣārthī tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ:
V03vinv172u:6213: svasti bhikṣāṃ prayaccha iti; sa tena brāhmaṇenāhūyoktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:6214: māṇava iyaṃ mama duhitā; mayā kanyābhikṣā tubhyaṃ dattā iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6215: aparo 'tra māṇavaḥ bhikṣārthī praviṣṭaḥ; tasmai kimarthaṃ na dattā iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6216: yad brūte nakṣatram aśobhanam iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6217: yady evaṃ pratīṣṭā bhavatu iti; brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6218: tvaṃ punaḥ kimarthaṃ nakṣatraṃ na paśyati?
V03vinv172u:6220: nakṣatraṃ bhadrakaṃ sarvaṃ sarve kalyāṇakā dināḥ /
V03vinv172u:6223: artho hy arthasya nakṣatraṃ kiṃ kāryaṃ jyotibhiḥ punaḥ //
V03vinv172u:6224: sa pratigṛhītvā prakrāntaḥ [A_492b] tenānyena māṇavena śrutaṃ sā brāḥmaṇakanyā anena māṇavena pratīṣṭā iti;
V03vinv172u:6226: kathayati: māṇavakaḥ sā kanyā kimarthaṃ tvayā pratīṣṭā?
V03vinv172u:6228: tvaṃ nakṣatragaṇanāparaḥ; nakṣatraṃ tāvat parīkṣa; mama tu śobhanaṃ nakṣatram iti; sa ruṣitaḥ
V03vinv172u:6229: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau pūrvamāṇavaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6230: yo 'sau paścimako māṇavaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6232: etrhy apy asya mamāntike vairūkṣyam utpannaṃ
V03vinv172u:6234: The very ferocious elephant of Ājātaśatru, Dhanapālaka by name
V03vinv172u:6235: buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv172u:6236: tena khalu samayena yo 'sau rājñaḥ ajātaśatroḥ dhanapālako nāma duṣṭanāgaḥ pratidinam āvāsān niṣkrāmyamāṇo mahājanavipraghātaṃ karoti;
V03vinv172u:6238: deva dhanapālako duṣṭanāgaḥ pratidinam āvāsān niṣkrāmyamāṇo rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu mahājanavipraghātaṃ karoti;
V03vinv172u:6239: tad arhati devaḥ hastidamakānām ājñāṃ dātuṃ yathā na pratidinaṃ niṣkāsayanti;
V03vinv172u:6240: śvo niṣkrāmyate iti ca ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayitum iti;
V03vinv172u:6244: āhūyantāṃ bhavanto hastidamakāḥ iti; tair hastidamakā āhūtāḥ; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6245: bhavanto rājagṛhanivāsinā janakāyena abhihito 'smi dhanapālako duṣṭanāgaḥ pratidinam āvāsān niṣkrāmyamāṇo rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu mahājanavipraghātaṃ karoti;
V03vinv172u:6246: tad arhati devaḥ hastidamakānām ājñāṃ dātuṃ yathā na pratidinaṃ niṣkāsayanti;
V03vinv172u:6247: śvo niṣkrāmyate iti ca ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayitum iti;
V03vinv172u:6249: śvo niṣkrāmyate iti ca ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayitavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:6250: hastidamakāḥ rājñaḥ ajātaśatroḥ pratiśrutya pādayor nipatya prakrāntāḥ (SBV II 187)
V03vinv172u:6252: Devadatta's attempt to kill the Buddha by means of the elephant Dhanapālaka
V03vinv172u:6253: rājagṛhe cānyataro gṛhapatiḥ āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6254: tena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena upanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6255: devadattena śrutaṃ yathā amukena gṛhapatinā buddhapramuko bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6256: tena hastidamakasya śatasahasro muktāhāro dattaḥ; uktaś ca:
V03vinv172u:6257: amukena gṛhapatinā śramaṇo gautamaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena upanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6258: tat tvayā dhanapālako hastināgaḥ utsraṣṭavyaḥ iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6260: kiṃtu yathā vā tathā vā devam avalokaya iti;
V03vinv172u:6261: tato devadatto yena rājā ajātaśatrus tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6263: śaktas tvaṃ māṃ buddhatve na pratiṣṭhāpayitum;
V03vinv172u:6264: [A_493a] api tu tvaṃ pitaraṃ jīvitād vyaparopya rājye pratiṣṭhapitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6265: aham api śramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ praghātya sarvajñatvaṃ karomi;
V03vinv172u:6268: adāntadamakā buddhā bhagavantaḥ iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6269: yady adāntadamakāḥ syuḥ aham eva tāvad anena dāntaḥ syām iti;
V03vinv172u:6270: sa taṃ yathā vā tathā vā avalokya hastidamakānāṃ sakāśam upasaṃkramya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6272: tad yuṣmābhiḥ śvo dhanapālako hastināgaḥ utsraṣṭavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6276: tad yuṣmābhiḥ śvaḥ sarvaprayatnena ātmarakṣā kartavyā iti;
V03vinv172u:6281: kathaṃ mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ bhojayitavyaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6285: sa śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ sādhayitvā kālyam evotthāya bhagavataḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ:
V03vinv172u:6286: bhagavan rājagṛhe ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ śvo dhanapālako hastināgo mucyate;
V03vinv172u:6297: samanvāhṛtya āsanādi prajñapya bhagavantam udīkṣamāṇaḥ avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6298: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ rājagṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6300: adrākṣīd dhanapālako hastināgo bhagavantaṃ dūrād eva;
V03vinv172u:6301: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhrūkuṭiṃ kṛtvā nādaṃ ca muktvā yena bhagavāṃs tena sabalam ājavena prādhāvat
V03vinv172u:6302: atha devadattaḥ ajātaśatrusahīyaḥ apariprāsādam abhiruhya avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6304: tato devadattaḥ bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditaḥ uccair gāthām uvāca
V03vinv172u:6306: saśrāvakaś śākyasuta tvam adya na bhaviṣyasi // iti
V03vinv172u:6309: pravādaṃ tvaṃ pravadasi daśabalabalinaṃ mām agaṇayitvā;
V03vinv172u:6310: paśyedānīṃ tu balaṃ daśabalabalinaḥ adbhutasya iti;
V03vinv172u:6311: tato bhagavatā dakṣiṇe karatale paṃca siṃhāḥ kesariṇaḥ paṭṭadhāriṇo nirmitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6312: sa teṣāṃ gandhaṃ ghrātvā mūtrapuriṣam utsṛjan niṣpalāyitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6313: bhagavatā sarvā diśaḥ ādīptāḥ pradīptāḥ saṃprajvalitāḥ ekajvālībhūtā adhimuktāḥ sthāpayitvā [A_493b] svakam eva pādamūlaṃ śāntaṃ śītībhūtam adhiṣṭhitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6314: tato dhanapālako hastināgaḥ itaś cāmutaś ca pradhāvan sarvam ādiptaṃ paśyati;
V03vinv172u:6316: dhanapālakaprakopaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve bhikṣavo niṣpalāyitāḥ sthāpayitvā āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6317: tato dhanapālako vigatamadavego mandagatipracāratayā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6318: sa bhagavatā cakrasvastikanandyāvartena anekapuṇyaśatanirjātena bhītānām āśvāsanakareṇa kareṇa śirasi parāmṛṣṭaḥ; gāthā ca bhāṣitā
V03vinv172u:6322: bhadrā hi nāga gatir bhavati // iti+
V03vinv172u:6324: The elephant Dhanapālaka follows submissively the Buddha,
V03vinv172u:6325: dies of grief and is reborn in the heaven of the four great kings
V03vinv172u:6326: tvaṃ tāvad bhadramukha pūrvakeṇa duścaritena pratyavarāyāṃ tiryagyonāv utpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6327: sa tvam etarhi paraprāṇaharaḥ paraprāṇoparodhena parituṣyasi;
V03vinv172u:6328: itaś cyutasya te kā gatir bhaviṣyasi?
V03vinv172u:6329: kā upapattiḥ ko 'bhisaṃparāyaḥ iti hi bhadramukha sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6332: mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya adyaiva tiryagyoniṃ virāgayiṣyasi;
V03vinv172u:6333: ity uktvā yena tasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6339: bhagavatā tad gṛhaṃ sphaṭikamayaṃ nirmitaṃ yatrānāvṛtaṃ buddhabimbaṃ paśyati;
V03vinv172u:6340: sa bhagavnataṃ dṛṣṭvā na bhaṅktum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6341: bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ bhuktvā dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6346: taṃ hastinam āgamya sīmāntarā rājānaḥ māṃ nābhidravanti;
V03vinv172u:6350: yadā bhagavān nirgato bhavati tadā bhavadbhir dhanapālaḥ hastināgo dvāraṃ badhvā sthāpayitavyaḥ yathā bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ na nirgacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:6351: amātyai api hastidamakānām ājñā dattā dhanapālakaṃ hastināgaṃ dvāraṃ badhvā sthāpayata yathā bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato na nirgacchati iti;
V03vinv172u:6352: sa bhagavantam apaśyan pādena śuṇḍām avaṣṭabhya kālagataḥ;
V03vinv172u:6354: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
V03vinv172u:6355: kutaś cyutaḥ kutropapannaḥ kena karmaṇā iti; sa paśyati nāgebhyaś (SBV II 190)
V03vinv172u:6356: cyutaḥ; praṇīteṣu cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ; bhagavato 'ntike cittam abhiprasādya iti
V03vinv172u:6358: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkrameyaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6359: yannv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrameyam iti;
V03vinv172u:6360_1: tām eva rātriṃ divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamāndārakāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṃgaṃ
V03vinv172u:6360_2: pūrayitvā sarvaṃ veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ puṣpair
V03vinv172u:6361_0: tataḥ asya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā
V03vinv172u:6361_1: yāṃ śrutvā nāgapūrviṇā devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa
V03vinv172u:6363: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā kṛtaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6366: na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇaiḥ yad bhagavatā asmākaṃ kṛtam;
V03vinv172u:6368: laṃghitā asthiparvatāḥ pihitāny apāyadvārāṇi vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi;
V03vinv172u:6386_0: atha nāgapūrvī devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ sasyasaṃpanna iva kārṣakaḥ śūra iva
V03vinv172u:6386_1: jitasaṃgrāmaḥ sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ
V03vinv172u:6390: kiṃ bhagavan imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sabhāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraḥ catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:6391: na bhikṣavo brahmā sabhāṃpatiḥ na śakro devānām indraḥ nāpi catvāro lokapālāḥ māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6392: api tu yuṣmābhir bhikṣavaḥ sa dhanapālo hastināgaḥ,
V03vinv172u:6393: tāvac caṇḍaḥ tāvad rabhaso yas tathāgatasya vadhāya parākrāntaḥ dṛṣṭo bhadanta:
V03vinv172u:6394: mayā vinītaḥ sa mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ cāturmahārājijeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6398: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:6399: kiṃ bhadanta dhanapālakena karma kṛtaṃ [A_494b] yasya karmaṇo vipākena tiryakṣūpapannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6400: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:6401: dhanapālakenaiva hi bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:6402: dhanapālena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati?
V03vinv172u:6407: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi,
V03vinv172u:6408: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv172u:6409: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve;
V03vinv172u:6410: tasya ca śāsane pravrajita āsīd vaiyāpṛtyakarah;
V03vinv172u:6414: yat tatrānena saṃghasya upasthānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena annapānasya lābhī saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6415: yan mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ tena cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6416_0: yat kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe pravrajitena paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ dhātukauśalaṃ
V03vinv172u:6416_1: āyatanakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtaṃ tena devabhūtena
V03vinv172u:6417: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ pūrvavad yāvad ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam
V03vinv172u:6423: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:6424: paśya bhadanta bhagavān paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ parityaktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6425: āyuṣmatā ānandena na parityaktaḥ; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:6430: The story of the king Dhṛtarāṣṭra, and his faithful captain Pūrṇamukha, etc.
V03vinv172u:6431: (concerning a previous birth of Ānanda, etc.)
V03vinv172u:6432: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'navatapte mahāsarasi dhṛtarāṣṭro nāma haṃsādhipatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:6433: tasya dvau putrau pūrṇaś ca pūrṇamukhaś ca;
V03vinv172u:6441: te haṃsāḥ pratidinam āgamya dhṛtarāṣṭrasya haṃsādhipater nivedayanti; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:6443: yady aham enaṃ yauvarājye pratiṣṭhāpayāmi mamātyayād eṣa haṃsayūthaṃ nāśayiṣyati;
V03vinv172u:6445: tena pūrṇaḥ pūrṇamukhaś ca ubhāv apy uktau;
V03vinv172u:6446: yaḥ utsān sarāṃsi taḍāgāni cāvalokya agrato matsakāsam āgacchati tam ahaṃ haṃsādhipatiṃ sthāpayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:6448: tāv itaś cāmutaś ca utsān sarāṃsi taḍāgāni ca avalokayantāv [A_495a] anupūrveṇa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm anuprāptau;
V03vinv172u:6449: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:6450: tena vārāṇasyām udyānasya nātidūre brahmāvatī nāma puṣkariṇī saraḥprativiśiṣṭatarākhyā;
V03vinv172u:6452: tīre samantāc caturṣv api pārśveṣu anekāni puṣpaphalavṛkṣasahasrāṇi ropitāni;
V03vinv172u:6454: tasyās tāṃ vibhūtiṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrṇo haṃsaḥ paṃcaśataparivāraḥ avatīrya yatheṣṭagatipracāratayā krīḍitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6456: tvam apy avatīrya krīḍa iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6459: tena laghu laghv eva gatvā rājyaṃ pratīṣṭaṃ:
V03vinv172u:6460: tataḥ paṃcaśataparivāraḥ vārāṇasīm āgamya brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīm avatīrya krīḍitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6461: taṃ tathā pramodavihāriṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā janakāyaḥ saṃśayam āpannaḥ:
V03vinv172u:6463: brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīm alaṃkṛtya sarvajalacarān pakṣiṇo rūpaśobhayā abhibhūya lokasya spṛhām utpādayati;
V03vinv172u:6465: śrutvā sarva eva vārāṇasīnivāsī janakāyaḥ samantād brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīṃ parivārya,
V03vinv172u:6466: tasya visrabdhavihāratāṃ rūpaśobhāṃ ca nirīkṣamāṇaḥ avasthitaḥ; amātyai rājño niveditaṃ:
V03vinv172u:6468: sa brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīm avatīrya anekahaṃsaśataparivāraḥ sarvān jalacarān pakṣiṇo rūpaśobhayā abhibhūya (SBV II 194)
V03vinv172u:6469: lokasya spṛhām utpādayan visrabdhavihāratayā tiṣṭhati iti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6470: bhavantaḥ yady evam āhūyantāṃ śākunikāḥ iti; tair āhūtāḥ; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6471: bhavantaḥ śrūyate brahmāvatyāṃ puṣkariṇyām atiparamadarśanīyavigraho haṃsādhipatiḥ kuto 'py āgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:6472: sa yuṣmābhir eka akṣataḥ pāśair badhvā matsakāśam āneyaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6474: sa taiḥ paramasukumāreṇa pāśena baddhaḥ; sa gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:6476: acikitsya ādāya haṃsayūthaṃ gacchata śīghraṃ hy anavataptam // iti
V03vinv172u:6480: śākunikās te dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6483: te taṃ haṃsādhipatim ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6486: sa haṃsādhipatī rājña upanītaḥ; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6489: deva nāsmābhir ayaṃ baddhaḥ; api tu svayam evāgataḥ iti; rājā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6493: na ca yuṣmābhiḥ kenacid api etau praghātyau iti;
V03vinv172u:6495: deva anya praghātayiṣyanti; janakāyasya nivedyatām iti; rājñā amātyānām ājñā dattā:
V03vinv172u:6496: gacchata bhavanto vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayata deva evaṃ samājñāpayati,
V03vinv172u:6497: na kenacid madviṣayanivāsinā jalacarāḥ pakṣiṇo ghātayitavyāḥ iti; tair ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritaṃ
V03vinv172u:6498: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau pūrṇamukho haṃsādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6499: yā sā tasya patnī sa evāsāv ānandaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6501: etāny eva tāni ekonāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
V03vinv172u:6506: bhūyo 'pi bhikṣavaḥ yathā aham ebhiḥ parityaktaḥ,
V03vinv172u:6507: ānandena bhikṣuṇā na parityakta tac chrūyatām (SBV II 195)
V03vinv172u:6509: The story of Karadaṇḍī, the Sahasrayodha
V03vinv172u:6510: (concerning a previous birth of Ānanda, etc.)
V03vinv172u:6511: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām aṭṭo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:6512: tasya paṃcāmātyaśatāni yeṣām anubhāvāt prātisīmaiḥ koṭṭarājabhir nābhibhūyate;
V03vinv172u:6513: yāvad dakṣiṇāpathāt karadaṇḍī nāma sahasrayodhī abhyāgataḥ;
V03vinv172u:6517: tad arhati devo 'sya parigrahaṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv172u:6520: yāvad apareṇa samayena aṭṭasya rājñaḥ bhūmyantarā rājānaḥ upacittabalasādhanāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6521: te caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyam aṭṭaṃ rājānam abhigatāḥ yuddhāya;
V03vinv172u:6522: aṭṭo 'pi rājā caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ bhūmyantarān rājñaḥ pratyabhiniryāto yuddhāya;
V03vinv172u:6523: aṭṭena rājñā bhūmyantarā rājanaḥ jītāḥ bhītaḥ bhagnāḥ parājitāḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtāḥ svaksvakān viṣayān gatāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6524: taiḥ punar api sannipatya aṭṭasya rājñaḥ paṃcāmātyaśatāni upaskāreṇa bhagnāni:
V03vinv172u:6528: tato bhūmyantarā rājanaḥ punar api caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyam aṭṭam rājānam abhigatā yauddhāya;
V03vinv172u:6529: aṭṭo 'pi nāma caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ bhūmyantarān rājñaḥ pratyabhiniryāto yuddhāya;
V03vinv172u:6530: aṭṭasya rājñaḥ paṃca amātyaśatāni yuddhe vartamāne pratinivartya karaṇḍdinā sahasrayodhena sārdhaṃ yoddhum ārabdhāni [A_496a] rājā dṛṣṭvā vyathitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6533: mitraṃ te karadaṇḍī tu tvām eko na prahāsyati // iti
V03vinv172u:6535: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sāv aṭṭo nāma rājā aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6536: yā 'sau karadaṇḍī sahasrayodhaḥ ānandaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6537: yāni tāni paṃca amātyaśatāni etāny eva tāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
V03vinv172u:6545: The story of a lion and his jackal-friend
V03vinv172u:6546: (concerning a previous birth of Ānanda, etc.)
V03vinv172u:6547: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ anyatamasmin parvataikadeśe siṃho mṛgapatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:6548: tasya paṃca sṛgālaśatāni vighasakhādakāni nityānubaddhāni parvatam upaniśritya tiṣṭhanti;
V03vinv172u:6549: siṃhaḥ prāṇino ghātayitvā varamāṃsāni vararudhirāṇi ca pītvā nirapekṣaḥ prakrāmati;
V03vinv172u:6551: yāvad apareṇa samayena siṃho mṛgarājaḥ rātrau prāṇinaḥ samanveṣamānaḥ kūpe patitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6554: ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yenemaṃ samuddhareyam iti;
V03vinv172u:6555: sa itaś cāmutaś ca kūpasāmantakena paryaṭitum ārabdhaḥ; yāvat paśyati:
V03vinv172u:6558: tatas tad udapānaṃ palvalāt salilena pūrṇaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6561: kartavyāni ca mitrāṇi durbalāni balāny api /
V03vinv172u:6562: paśya siṃhaḥ sṛgālena jīrṇakūpāt samuddhṛtaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:6563: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sīmhaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6564: sṛgāla ānando bhikṣuḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6565: yāni tāni ekonāni paṃca sṛgālaśatāni etāny eva paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
V03vinv172u:6569: aham ebhiḥ parityaktaḥ; bhūyo 'pi yathā aham ebhiḥ parityaktaḥ tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:6571: The story of a Mṛgī and Mṛgādhipati
V03vinv172u:6572: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe paṃcānāṃ mṛgaśatānāṃ mṛgādhipatir babhūva;
V03vinv172u:6573: yāvad anyatamena lubdhakena mṛgāṇāṃ vadhāya prabhūtāḥ kūṭapāśāḥ lepāś ca vyavasthāpitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6574: sa ca mṛgādhipatiḥ visrabdhavihāratayā paṃcaśataparivāro mṛgadāve paribhramati;
V03vinv172u:6576: taṃ baddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve mṛgā niṣpalāyitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6580: taṃ tathā calantaṃ dṛṣṭvā sā mṛgī gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:6584: kiṃ karomi na śaknomi bhinadmy āśu mahīm imāṃ /
V03vinv172u:6585: dṛḍhāni carmapāśāni pādau karṣanti me bhṛśam // iti
V03vinv172u:6586: tato 'sau lubdhakaḥ dhanurbāṇapāṇiḥ kāṣāyavastravasitaḥ taṃ pradeśam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv172u:6587: adrākṣīt sā mṛgī taṃ lubdhakaṃ vadhāyodyataṃ mṛgādhipatim upasaṃkrāntaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6588: dṛṣṭvā ca punas tvaritatvaritā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:6590: āgato hy eṣa lubdho 'sau pāśo yenaiṣa āhṛtaḥ //iti
V03vinv172u:6592: kiṃ karomi na śaknomi bhinadmy āśu mahīm imāṃ /
V03vinv172u:6593: dṛḍhāni carmapāśāni pādau karṣanti me bhṛśam // iti (SBV II 198)
V03vinv172u:6594: tataḥ sā mṛgī śūnyahṛdayā taṃ mṛgalubdhakam imāṃ gāthāṃ tatsamīpe bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:6596: pūrvaṃ ghātaya māṃ tāvat tataḥ paścān mṛgādhipatam // iti
V03vinv172u:6597: tataḥ sa mṛgalubdhakaḥ vismayāvarjitamatiḥ kathayati: kas tavaiṣa bhavati?
V03vinv172u:6598: iti; sā kathayati: svāmi iti; sa taṃ gāthayā pratyabhāṣata
V03vinv172u:6599: nāhaṃ tvā ghatāyiṣyāmi na haniṣye mṛgādhipam /
V03vinv172u:6600: saṃgamaṃ te kariṣyāmi priyeṇa patinā saha // iti
V03vinv172u:6602: yathāhaṃ ludha modāmi priyeṇa patinā saha /
V03vinv172u:6603: evaṃ tvaṃ lubdha modasva saha sarvaiḥ svabāndhavaiḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:6604: tatas tena lubdhena bhūyasyā mātrayā vismayajātena mṛgo muktaḥ
V03vinv172u:6605: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau mṛgādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6606: yā sā mṛgī ānandaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6607: yāni tāni ekonāni paṃca mṛgaśatāni etāny eva ekonāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
V03vinv172u:6612: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:6613: paśya bhadanta devadattaḥ pūtiḥ pūtinā lābhasatkāreṇa hataḥ iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:6614: na bhikṣava etarhi; yathā atīte 'py adhvany eṣa pūtinā pūtir lābhasatkāreṇa hataḥ; tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:6616: The story of a jackal competing with an elephant
V03vinv172u:6618: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin paravataikadeśe mahat padmasaraḥ;
V03vinv172u:6621: yāvad apareṇa samayena hastī tasmāt padmasarasaḥ pānīyaṃ pītvā uttiṣṭhati;
V03vinv172u:6624: yuddhaṃ vā anuprayaccha mārgaṃ vā iti;
V03vinv172u:6626: pūtir ayaṃ tapasvī dhvāṅkṣaś ca; yad enaṃ pādena ghātayiṣyāmi,
V03vinv172u:6627: śuṇḍayā vā dantena vā aśucinā vā nāśayiṣyāmi iti; punaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:6628: sarvathā pūtir ayaṃ pūtinaiva hantavyaḥ; iti viditvā gathāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:6629: na tvā padbhyāṃ haniṣyāmi na dantābhyāṃ na śuṇḍayā /
V03vinv172u:6630: pūtinā tvāṃ haniṣyāmi pūtir hanyeta pūtinā // iti
V03vinv172u:6636: vacanamātreṇaiva eṣa bhagno mayā yena tvaritatvaritaṃ niṣpalāyitaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6638: hastinā samīpaṃ gataṃ jñātvā tasyopari mahatā vegena purīṣaṃ muktaṃ; patitaḥ kālagataḥ
V03vinv172u:6639: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sṛgālaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena tadāpy eṣa pūtinā pūtir hataḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6640: etarhy apy eṣa pūtinā pūtir lābhasatkāreṇa hataḥ
V03vinv172u:6641: [Here there is a leaf missing, seemingly because of an error of the scribe himself.]
V03vinv172u:6642: punar api bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:6643: paśya bhadanta devadattaḥ dharmamukhikayā loko vyaṃsitaḥ iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:6644: na bhikṣava etarhi; yathā atīte 'py adhvany anena dharmamukhikayā loko vyaṃsitaḥ; tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:6646: The story of Āgneya, the cat
V03vinv172u:6648: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe mūṣikāṇāṃ yūthapatiḥ paṃcaśataparivāro 'vatiṣṭhate;
V03vinv172u:6653: parākrameṇa na śaknoti mūṣikān grahītuṃ; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:6654: pūrvam ahaṃ taruṇāvasthāyāṃ śaktaḥ parākrameṇa mūṣikān grahītum;
V03vinv172u:6660: sa muṣikavivarasya nātidūre kṛtakena tapas tapyati;
V03vinv172u:6661: sa mūṣikair bhramadbhir dṛṣṭaḥ śānteneryāpathena avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6663: mātula kiṃ karoṣi iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6668: te taṃ pratidinaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vivaraṃ praviśanti;
V03vinv172u:6676: yāvat paśyati sarvalomikāṃ viṣṭhāṃ; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:6680: yāvat tenāsau dṛṣṭaḥ paścimaṃ mūṣikaṃ bhakṣayan;
V03vinv172u:6681: sa tam upasaṃkramya dūreṇa gatvā gāthayā pratyabhāṣata
V03vinv172u:6684: nāyaṃ śikhī dharmaśikhī arthahetor ayaṃ śikhī /
V03vinv172u:6685: svasti te 'gneya bhavatu parihīyanti mūṣakāḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:6686: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena āgneyo biḍālaḥ devadattaḥ saḥ;
V03vinv172u:6688: etarhy apy anena dharmamukhikayā loko vyaṃsitaḥ
V03vinv172u:6689: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:6690: paśya bhadanta ye bhagavato dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te svastikṣemābhyāṃ saṃsārakāntārād uttīrṇāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6691: ye devadattaḥ dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te anayena vyasanam āpannāḥ iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:6693: yathā atīte 'py adhvany ye mama dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te svastikṣemābhyāṃ saṃsārakāntārād uttīrṇāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6694: ye dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te anayena vyasanam āpannāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6697: The story of a bull that got entangled other bulls into trouble by bad counsels
V03vinv172u:6698: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:6699: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dvau sārthavāhau paṃcabhiḥ śakaṭaśataiḥ sārdham anuvyaharamāṇau kāntāramārgaṃ pratipannau;
V03vinv172u:6700: tavyoḥ kāntāramārgapratipannayoḥ kadācid balīvardānāṃ parītto yavaso bhavati;
V03vinv172u:6703: tato 'sau sārthaḥ saha balīvardaiḥ atīva pariśrāntaḥ kṛcchreṇa kāntāmārgaṃ pratipannaḥ paśyati anyatarasmin pradeśe haritaśādvalaṃ salilasaṃpannaṃ ca snātāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6705: tatas te balīvardāḥ parīttena pānyena yavasena ca parikhinnāḥ,
V03vinv172u:6706: paryāptaṃ yavasaṃ pānīyaṃ ca pītvā viśrāntāḥ; teṣāṃ yaḥ pradhāno balīvardaḥ sa tān prabodhayati:
V03vinv172u:6707: bhavanto vayaṃ parīttena yavasena parīttena ca pānīyena parikheditāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6709: yadi bhavatām abhipretam ihaiva haṭhaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāmaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6714: evam ukte pradhānabalīvardo ruṣitaḥ svayūthyān kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6715: bhavantaḥ kena candrasya pṛṣṭhaṃ [A_498a] dṛṣṭam ebhir yuṣmābhir na voḍhavyam iti;
V03vinv172u:6718: sārthikā prabhūtān prahārān datvā pratodayaṣṭibhir ātāḍya ātāḍya rudhireṇa pragharatā śakaṭe yojitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6722: mithyā hi coditāḥ paśya balīvardena gā imāḥ /
V03vinv172u:6724: samyak ca coditāḥ paśya balīvardena gā imāḥ /
V03vinv172u:6725: te vai nistīrṇakāntārāḥ jalaṃ śītaṃ pibanti hi //
V03vinv172u:6726: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau pradhāno balīvardaḥ yena te samyag eva coditāḥ ahaṃ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6728: balīvardā viprasthāpitāḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6729: tadāpi yair mama vacanaṃ śrutaṃ te svastikṣemābhyāṃ kāntāramārgaṃ nistīrṇāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6730: yair devadattasya vacanaṃ śrutaṃ te anayena vyasanam āpannāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6731: etarhy api ye mama dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te svastikṣemābhyāṃ saṃsārakāntāramārgād uttīrṇāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6732: ye devadattasya dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te anayena vyasanam āpannāḥ
V03vinv172u:6733: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:6734: paśya bhadanta devadatto mūrkho murkhaparivāraḥ iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:6735: na bhikṣava etarhi; yathā atīte 'py adhvani devadatto mūrkho mūrkhaparivāraḥ; tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:6737: The story of the leader of the monkeys
V03vinv172u:6739: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin araṇyāyatane markaṭayūthapatiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:6742: bhavantaḥ candraḥ kūpe patitaḥ; uddharāmaḥ; kim acandrako loko bhaviṣyati?
V03vinv172u:6744: śobhanam; uddharāmaḥ iti; te saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ:
V03vinv172u:6746: iti; apare kathayanti: kim atra jñāyate?
V03vinv172u:6751: tasyāpy aparo lagna ity evaṃ sarve lagnāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6759: yeṣām iha hi mūrkāṇāṃ mūrkho bhavati nāyakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:6760: sarve te nidhanaṃ yānti candroddhārā iva vānarāḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:6761: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau markaṭayūthapatiḥ devadattaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6765: The five causes of the division of the congregation
V03vinv172u:6766: bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme; atha bhagavata etad abhavat:
V03vinv172u:6767: tathāgatasya saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārāṇi karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny [A_498b] avaśyabhāvīni;
V03vinv172u:6769: kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na hi karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni
V03vinv172u:6770: bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām;
V03vinv172u:6774: yāvat buddho loke utpadyate lokas tāvat tanmukho 'vatiṣṭhate buddhaḥ kila mārṣā loka utpanna iti;
V03vinv172u:6777: aham eva śāstā iti tasya vaktavyaṃ:
V03vinv172u:6778: yadā bhagavān jīvati tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati tadā tvaṃ kva āsīḥ?
V03vinv172u:6779: arbude anutpanne saṃgho na bhidyate dṛṣṭyarbude vā śīlārbude vā śrāvakayuge anirdiṣṭe saṃgho na bhidyate;
V03vinv172u:6780: tat kasya hetoḥ saṃgho bhinnaḥ avaśyaṃ śrāvakayugaṃ pratisandhatte;
V03vinv172u:6782: tat kasya hetoḥ antaḥsīmni saṃgho bhidyate na bahiḥsīmni
V03vinv172u:6786: mama nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe arbudam utpannaṃ śīlārbudaṃ dṛṣṭyarbudaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:6792: yadi tāvat śaikṣāśaikṣaiḥ pudgalaiḥ sārdhaṃ rājagṛhaṃ gamiṣyāmi na śakṣyati devadattaḥ saṃghabhedaṃ kartuṃ;
V03vinv172u:6793: yannv ahaṃ pṛthagjanakalyāṇakaiḥ pudgalaiḥ sārdhaṃ gaccheyam;
V03vinv172u:6794: iti viditvā āyuṣmatā rāhulena upasthāyakena paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ yathābhiramyaṃ śrāvastyāṃ vihṛtya yena rājagṛhaṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6795: anupūrveṇa cārikāṃ caran rājagṛham anuprāptaḥ iti (SBV II 204)
V03vinv172u:6797: Famine in Rājagṛha, division of the congregation and new rules imparted by Devadatta
V03vinv172u:6798: buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe varṣā upagato veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv172u:6802: icchāmy ahaṃ bhikṣavaḥ imāṃ traimāsīṃ pratisaṃlātuṃ;
V03vinv172u:6803: na me kenacid bhikṣuṇā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ sthāpayitvā piṇḍapātanirhārakaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6805: bhikṣusaṃghena kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ na kenacid asmākam imāṃ traimāsīṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramitavyaṃ sthāpayitvā piṇḍapātanirhārakaṃ;
V03vinv172u:6807: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau dakṣiṇāgiriṣu varṣā upagatau;
V03vinv172u:6809: sa trayāṇāṃ va dvikānāṃ vā māsānām atyayād bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv172u:6810: śramaṇa āyuṣmanto gautama evaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati;
V03vinv172u:6811: āraṇyakatvena bhikṣuḥ śudhyati mucyati niryāti sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti;
V03vinv172u:6812: piṇḍapātikatvena pāṃsukūlikatvena [A_499a] traicīvarikatvena ābhyavakāśikatvena śudhyati mucyati niryāti sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti;
V03vinv172u:6813: yasya cāyuṣmantaḥ imāni paṃca vratapadāni na rocante na kṣamante na saṃprakhyānti sa śramaṇasya gautamasya ārād bhavatu durād bhavatu;
V03vinv172u:6819: tena tāni devadattasya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāni dṛṣṭāni; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:6820: āyuṣmantaḥ kimarthaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham apahāya asya pāpecchasya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchata?
V03vinv172u:6822: āyuṣman rāhula evaṃvidhe durbhikṣe kṛcchre kāntāre bhagavān adarśano vyavasthitaḥ; vayaṃ (SBV II 205)
V03vinv172u:6824: yadi devadattena traimāsīṃ bhikṣusaṃgho na pratipādito 'bhaviṣyat,
V03vinv172u:6842: trisahasramahāsahasre lokadhātau dharmacakraṃ viṣṭhitaṃ na satvasantāne vartate
V03vinv172u:6844: Śāriputra and Maudgalyāyana visit the Buddha and promise to him to restore the congregation
V03vinv172u:6845: āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau saṃlakṣayanti: kimartham ayaṃ mahāpṛthivīcālaḥ?
V03vinv172u:6846: iti; samanvāhṛtyārhatāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ na pravartate; tau samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttau; paśyataḥ:
V03vinv172u:6847: devadattena bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhinnaṃ; tayor etad abhavat:
V03vinv172u:6849: athāyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvarau niṣṭhitacīvarau samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena rājagṛhaṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntau;
V03vinv172u:6851: athāyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:6852: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān rāhulo dvare tiṣṭhate;
V03vinv172u:6853: athāyuṣmān rāhulaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram idam avocad upādyāya devadattena bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhinnaḥ iti; (SBV II 206)
V03vinv172u:6859: praviśya bahagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau;
V03vinv172u:6860: ekāntaniṣaṇṇāv āyuṣmatau [A_499b] śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhagavantam idam avocatāṃ:
V03vinv172u:6861: gachāmo vayaṃ bhadanta tathāgatasya bhinnaṃ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ sandhātum iti
V03vinv172u:6863: The sermon on the four merituous men
V03vinv172u:6866: bahu sa puṇyaṃ prasūyate apramāṇam asaṃkhyeyaṃ yas tathāgatasya bhinnaṃ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ pratisandhatte,
V03vinv172u:6867: tadyathā śatachinnaṃ vālaṃ yaḥ koṭyā koṭiṃ pratisandadhyāt;
V03vinv172u:6868: evam eva sa bahu puṇyaṃ prasūyate aprameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ yas tathāgatasya bhinnaṃ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ pratisandhatte
V03vinv172u:6869: catvāra ime śāriputramaudgalyāyanau brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavanti; katame catvāraḥ? 1)
V03vinv172u:6870: yaḥ pudgalaḥ apratiṣṭhitapūrve pṛthivīpradeśe tathāgatasya śārīraṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati;
V03vinv172u:6871: ayaṃ prathamaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
V03vinv172u:6873: punar aparaṃ yaḥ pudgalaḥ apratiṣṭhitapūrve pṛthivīpradeśe caturdiśasya bhikṣusaṃghasya vihāraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati;
V03vinv172u:6874: ayaṃ dvitīyaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
V03vinv172u:6876: punar aparaṃ yaḥ pudgalaḥ tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhinnaṃ sandhatte;
V03vinv172u:6877: ayaṃ tritīyaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
V03vinv172u:6879: punar aparaṃ yaḥ pudgalaḥ maitrīsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asapatnena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena ekāṃ diśam adhimucya spharitvā upasaṃpadya viharati;
V03vinv172u:6880: tathā dvitīyāṃ tathā tṛtīyāṃ tathā caturthīm;
V03vinv172u:6881: ity ūrdhvam adhaḥ tiryak sarvaśaḥ sarvam imaṃ lokaṃ maitrīsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asapatnena avyābādhena vipulena (SBV II 207)
V03vinv172u:6882: mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena adhimucya spharitvā upasaṃpadya viharati;
V03vinv172u:6883: evaṃ karuṇāmuditaupekṣāsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asapatnena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena adhimucya spharitvā upasaṃpadya viharati;
V03vinv172u:6884: tathā dvitīyāṃ tathā tṛtīyāṃ tathā caturthīm;
V03vinv172u:6885_0: ity ūrdhvam adhaḥ tiryak sarvaśaḥ sarvam imaṃ lokaṃ upekṣāsahagatena cittena avaireṇa
V03vinv172u:6885_1: asapatnena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena ekāṃ diśam adhimucya
V03vinv172u:6886: ayaṃ caturthaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
V03vinv172u:6889: Śāriputra and Mahāmaudgalyāyana visit Devadatta and exhort the misguided monks to return to the true doctrine
V03vinv172u:6890: āthāyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntau;
V03vinv172u:6891: tena khalu samayena devadatto dakṣiṇāgiriṣu buddhalīlayā anudharmaṃ deśayati;
V03vinv172u:6898: kokālikaṃ khaṇḍadravyaṃ ca bāhubhyāṃ [A_500a] ghaṭṭayati uttiṣṭhottiṣṭheti;
V03vinv172u:6899: tau saṃlakṣayataḥ eṣa evāsmākaṃ doṣo yad asmābhir asya saṃghabhede sāhāyyaṃ kalpitam;
V03vinv172u:6902: balavān eṣa niyatam asmān hanti iti;
V03vinv172u:6906: tatra devadattaḥ āyuṣmantam śāriputram āmantrayate pratibhātu te śāriputra bhikṣūṇāṃ dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathayituṃ;
V03vinv172u:6910: atha devadattaś caturguṇam uttarāsaṅgaṃ prajñapya dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayitvā middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6913: tatra āyuṣmān śāriputro bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv172u:6915: uttānakaḥ kāyena krathamānena middham avakrāntaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6916: athāyuṣmān śāriputraḥ āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:6918_0: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ yathā samāhite citte pūrvasyāṃ
V03vinv172u:6918_1: diśy upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya caturvidham īryāpathaṃ kalpayati caṃkramyate tiṣṭhati
V03vinv172u:6920: tejodhātusamāpannasya āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya vividhāny arciṃṣi kāyān niścaranti nīlāni pītāni lohitāny avadātāni māñjiṣṭhāni sphaṭikavarṇāni;
V03vinv172u:6922: adhaḥ kāyaḥ prajvalati uparimāt kāyāt śītalā vāridhārā syandate;
V03vinv172u:6923: uparimaḥ kāyaḥ prajvalati addhaḥkāyāt śītalā vāridhārā syandate;
V03vinv172u:6924: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ diśi;
V03vinv172u:6925: iti caturdiśaṃ caturvidhaṃ ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśya tān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6926: āyuṣmantā ca mahāmaudgalyāyanena te bhikṣavaḥ saṃvejitāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6927: tata āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tathāvidho dharmo deśitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6928: yaṃ śrutvā devadatte nirapekṣāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ; uktāś ca:
V03vinv172u:6929: yeṣāṃ vaḥ āyuṣmantaḥ śāstā priyaḥ te uttiṣṭhantu; gacchāmaḥ iti
V03vinv172u:6931: Many misled monks are led back to the Buddha and readmitted into the order without a word of reproach
V03vinv172u:6935: utthiṣṭhottiṣṭha; mahāśrāvakais te parṣad apahriyate iti; athāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya etad abhavad:
V03vinv172u:6936: yadi devadattasa apaśyataḥ parṣadaṃ neṣyāmi sthānam etad vidyate yad uṣṇaṃ rudhiraṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyati;
V03vinv172u:6939: devadatto 'pi tīvreṇa paryavasthānena akṣiṇī saṃparimārjan pradhāvitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6941: devadattaḥ kokālikakhaṇḍadravyakaṭamorakatiṣyasamudradattaiḥ sārdhaṃ samantatas tāṃ gartāṃ paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6945: atha ca punar anayena vyasanam āpatsyāmi;
V03vinv172u:6947: āyuṣmantāv api śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhikṣusaṃgham ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv172u:6948: atha te bhikṣavaḥ ālekhajātāḥ madgubhūtāḥ srastaskandhā adhomukhā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāmanti:
V03vinv172u:6949: kathaṃ vā vayaṃ bhagavantam aprameyaguṇasamanvāgatam apahāya pāpecchaṃ devadattaṃ saṃsṛtāḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:6950: atha bhagavān teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ cetasā cittam ājñāya bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv172u:6953: kadācit karhicid āryāyatane pratyājātiḥ indriyair avikalatā ajaḍatā aneḍamūkatā ahastasaṃvācikatā pratibalatā subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ dharmāṇām artham ājñātuṃ;
V03vinv172u:6954: kadācit karhicit tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loka utpadyante;
V03vinv172u:6955: kadācit karhicit tathāgatapraveditasya dharmavinayasya loke dharmadeśanā prajñāyate;
V03vinv172u:6956: tad idaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sudurlabhaṃ sudurlabhaṃ yaduta āryāyatane pratyājātiḥ,
V03vinv172u:6957: indriyair avikalatā ajaḍatā aneḍamūkatā ahastasaṃvācikatā pratibalatā subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ dharmāṇām artham ājñātuṃ;
V03vinv172u:6958: ahaṃ caitarhi śāstā loka utpannaḥ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv172u:6959: dharmaś ca deśyate aupaśamikaḥ pārinirvāṇikaḥ saṃbodhigāmī saugatapratisaṃveditaḥ yaduta asmin sati idaṃ bhavati;
V03vinv172u:6962_0: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ
V03vinv172u:6962_1: ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayā vedanā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇāpratyaym
V03vinv172u:6962_2: upādānaṃ upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ bhavapratyayā jātiḥ jātipratyayāḥ jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ saṃbhavanti;
V03vinv172u:6963: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati;
V03vinv172u:6966_0: yaduta avidyānirodhāt saṃskāranirodhaḥ saṃskāranirodhād vijñānanirodho vijñānanirodhān
V03vinv172u:6967_0: tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ tṛṣṇānirodhād upādānanirodhaḥ upādānanirodhād bhavanirodho bhavanirodhāj
V03vinv172u:6967_2: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati;
V03vinv172u:6968: tasmāt tarhi [A_501a] bhikṣavaḥ ātmārthaṃ samanupaśyadbhiḥ parārthaṃ cobhayārthaṃ ca idaṃ pratisaṃśikṣitavyaṃ:
V03vinv172u:6969: kaccin naḥ pravrajya amoghā bhaviṣyanti kriyāḥ saphalāḥ sukhodayāḥ sukhavipākāḥ;
V03vinv172u:6970_1: teṣāṃ te kārāḥ kṛtāḥ atyarthaṃ mahāphalā bhaviṣyanti mahānuśaṃsāḥ mahādyutayaḥ mahāvistārāḥ
V03vinv172u:6971_0: yadā te bhikṣavo bhagavatā svāgatavādena supravrajitavādena samudācaritāḥ tadā teṣāṃ
V03vinv172u:6971_1: yat tad abhūn madgutvaṃ kaukṛtyam ālekhaḥ vilekhaḥ vipratisāraḥ tat sarveṇa sarvaṃ prativigataṃ;
V03vinv172u:6972: tato 'nye bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:6973: kiṃ bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhinnaḥ iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:6974: tathāgatenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām
V03vinv172u:6976: The story of a ṛṣi living in the country
V03vinv172u:6977: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:6978: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasminn āśramapade mūlapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpanne nānāvṛkṣopaśobhite anekapakṣigaṇaniṣevite ṛṣiḥ prativasati paṃcānām ṛṣiśatānāṃ pramukhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6979: yāvad anyaḥ ṛṣiḥ janapadacārikāṃ caran tadāśramapadam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6980: sa tena ṛṣiṇā na samyak pratimānitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6982: ayaṃ pāpecchaḥ ṛṣir na kiṃcid api jānīte; kimartham asya sakāśe tiṣṭhatha?
V03vinv172u:6985: ahaṃ yuṣmān paṃcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayāmi iti;
V03vinv172u:6986: tena bhidyamānās te tasya ṛṣer avavādena avatiṣṭhante;
V03vinv172u:6988: anena pāpakāriṇā mamaite ṛṣayo bhinnāḥ iti; sa tam upasāntvayitum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:6989: mā āyuṣman parṣadbhedaṃ kuru; naiṣa ṛṣidharmaḥ iti; tathāpy asau bhinatty eva,
V03vinv172u:6990: nāvatiṣṭhate iti sa ṛṣir durmanāḥ upāyasaṃvidhānena avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6991: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka (SBV II 211)
V03vinv172u:6993: atha anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddho janapadacārikāṃ caran tasya ṛṣer āśramapadam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv172u:6996: tena tasmai kārān kṛtvā mithyāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ:
V03vinv172u:6997: yan mamānena pāparṣiṇā parṣadbhedaḥ kṛtaḥ aham asya sarvajñeyavaśiprāptasyāpi parṣadbhedaṃ kuryām iti
V03vinv172u:6998: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau jānapadaḥ ṛṣiḥ yena tasya ṛṣeḥ parṣad bhinnā aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:6999: yo 'sau naivāsikaḥ ṛṣiḥ devadattaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7000: yan mayā asya parṣad bhinnā tasya karmaṇo vipākena anena mithyāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā saṃgho mama bhinnaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7001: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvavad ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam
V03vinv172u:7002: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ [A_501b] sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:7003: paśya bhadanta devadattena sabāhyān abhyantarīkṛtya abhyantarāṃś ca bāhyīkṛtya parṣad hāritā iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:7005: yathā atīte 'py adhvany anena sabāhyān abhyantarīkṛtya abhyantarāṃś ca bāhyīkṛtya parṣad hāritā; tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:7007: The story of a jackal, Śatadru by name
V03vinv172u:7009: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe sṛgālaḥ prāṇī prativasati;
V03vinv172u:7015: sa tasmin patitaḥ pārśvena pārśvaṃ luṭhitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7016: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā śarīraṃ jugupsamānaḥ pānīye patitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7023: ahaṃ śatadrunāmā śakreṇa devendreṇa catuṣpadānāṃ rājye abhiṣiktaḥ iti; sṛgālāḥ saṃlakṣayanti:
V03vinv172u:7028: ko 'sāv asmat prativiśiṣṭo yaś catuṣpadānāṃ rājā bhaviṣyati?
V03vinv172u:7035: gaccha catuṣpadādhipatiṃ nirīkṣasva kim asau kenacic catuṣpadena dṛṣṭo na vā iti;
V03vinv172u:7039: sa śrutvā siṃhayūthaparivṛtaḥ tasya sakāśam abhigataḥ;
V03vinv172u:7047: āgaccha putrarājyaṃ pratyanubhava iti; sā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:7050: siṃhavyāghrā hastinaś ca abhyantaraparivāraḥ; vayaṃ tu bāhyāḥ iti; sā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:7051: gaccha; vinaṣṭaḥ sa iti; sā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv172u:7056: sa gataḥ; tena teṣāṃ sṛgālānāṃ niveditaṃ: sṛgāla evāyaṃ catuṣpadānāṃ rājā; dṛṣṭāsya mayā mātā,
V03vinv172u:7057: yā amuṣmin parvatanikuñe prativasati iti; te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:7058: yady evaṃ vayam enaṃ jñāsyāmaḥ sṛgālo vā na vā iti;
V03vinv172u:7059: dharmatā hy eṣā sṛgālānāṃ yaḥ sṛgālaśabdaṃ śrutvā na vāśate,
V03vinv172u:7060: tasya romāṇi patiṣyanti; sṛgālā vāśitum ārabdhāḥ; sa saṃlakṣayati: yady ahaṃ na raumi,
V03vinv172u:7061: niyataṃ mama romāṇi patiṣyanti; yadi [A_502a] hastiskandhād avatīrya raviṣyāmi,
V03vinv172u:7069: sa evaṃ nidhanaṃ yāti hastinā kroṣṭuko yathā // iti
V03vinv172u:7070: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sṛgālaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7071: tadāpy eṣa abhyantarān bāhyīkṛtya bāhyāṃś ca abhyantarīkṛtya anayena vyasanam āpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7072: etarhy apy anena abhyantarān bāhyīkṛtya bāhyāṃś ca abhyantarīkṛtya pariṣad hāritā
V03vinv172u:7074: devadatta gets angry with Kokālika and Khaṇḍadravya
V03vinv172u:7075: yadā āyuṣmadbhyāṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyāṃ devattasya parṣad apahṛtā tadā devadattaḥ kokālikaṃ khaṇḍadravyaṃ ca tāḍayitum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv172u:7077: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:7078: paśya bhadanta anyair devadattasya parṣad apahṛtā;
V03vinv172u:7079: anyeṣām anena duḥkham utpāditam iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:7081: yathā atīte 'py adhvany anyenaivāsya bhāryā apahṛtā;
V03vinv172u:7082: anyeṣām anena duḥkham utpāditaṃ; tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:7086: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe hastiyūthapatiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:7091: ko 'sāv upāyo yena niṣpalāyyāmahe iti; sā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:7092: aham upāyaṃ jāne; tayor gajo 'bhihitaḥ; snāyāmo hradam avatarāmaḥ iti; so 'vatīrṇaḥ; sā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:7093: paśyāmaḥ kaḥ āvayoś cirataraṃ nimagnas tiṣṭhati iti;
V03vinv172u:7094: sa mohapuñjas tayā sārdham udake nimagnaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7096: sa hastī ciraṃ sthitvā utthito na paśyati; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:7097: bhūyo nimajjāmi mā me syāt parājayaḥ iti;
V03vinv172u:7098: bhūyo nimagnaḥ dantau nikhātyāvasthitaḥ sucirād gatapratyudgataprāṇaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7100: sa taṃ hradam itaś cāmutaś ca kṣobhayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7101: tena tatra bahavo matsyakacchapamaṇḍūkādayaḥ prāṇino 'nayena vyasanam āpaditāḥ;
V03vinv172u:7103: vṛndī batāyaṃ sumahān prajñāpy asya na vidyate /
V03vinv172u:7104: anyenāsya hṛtā bhāryā anye duḥkhasya bhāginaḥ // iti
V03vinv172u:7105: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau hastināgaḥ devadattaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7110: kuṇḍī trayaṃ tathā kṣīraṃ gopikā ca kṣamāpaṇā /
V03vinv172u:7111: asthīni cetikaś caiva pakṣiṇā caramaṃ padaṃ //
V03vinv172u:7112: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:7113: paśya bhadanta āyuṣmadbhyāṃ [A_502b] śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyāṃ devadattasya vīcim āgamayamānābhyāṃ vīcir labdhaḥ iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:7115: yathā atīte 'py adhvani śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyāṃ devadattasya vīcim āgamayamānābhyāṃ vīcir labdhaḥ; tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:7117: The story of a leader of the thieves
V03vinv172u:7118: (concerning a previous life of Devadatta, etc)
V03vinv172u:7119: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin karvaṭake iṣvastrācāryaḥ prativasati;
V03vinv172u:7121: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:7122: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv172u:7123: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv172u:7125: tasyās trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātāyā jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kulasadṛśaṃ (SBV II 215)
V03vinv172u:7126: nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ; sā unnītā vardhitā mahatī saṃvṛttā; iṣvastrācāryaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:7127: iyaṃ dārikā na mayā kasyacid rūpeṇa dātavyā na śīlena nāpi dhanena;
V03vinv172u:7128: api tu yo matsakāśāt paṃcasu sthāneṣu kṛtāvī bhavati,
V03vinv172u:7130: tasya ca sakāśād dvau māṇavau iṣvastraṃ śikṣitau;
V03vinv172u:7136: sa ekasmin pradeśe mārgaṃ badhvā avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7137: prathamas tāṃ patnīṃ pariṇīya ratha āropya svagṛhaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:7138: yāvac corabhayāt sārthaḥ agrato gacchan sthitaḥ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:7141: corair mārgo baddhaḥ iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:7142: āryā gacchata; kiṃ kariṣyanti iti; sa saṃprasthitaḥ; sārthikāḥ kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:7145: sthānam etad vidyate yad ayam ātmānaṃ dārayiṣyati;
V03vinv172u:7149: bhavantaḥ puruṣo rathābhirūḍhaḥ āgacchati iti; corasenāpatinā dūto 'nupreṣitaḥ:
V03vinv172u:7151: bhavantaḥ śūrasya śūraparihāraṃ prayacchata iti; te kathayanti:
V03vinv172u:7152: vayam api śūrāḥ iti; senāpatinā paṃca corāḥ preṣitāḥ; tena te praghātitāḥ; evaṃ viṃśatir āgatāḥ,
V03vinv172u:7165: iti; sa kathayati: eṣa eva eko 'vaśiṣṭaḥ,
V03vinv172u:7169: tataḥ sā dārikā vijṛmbhamāṇā veṇiṃ bandhum ārabdhā;
V03vinv172u:7173: nāhaṃ rathikena hato hato 'smi lolena pāpacittena /
V03vinv172u:7175: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau rathikaḥ śāriputraḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7176: yāsau dārikā maudgalyāyanaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7177: yo 'sau corasenāpatir devadattaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv172u:7178: tadā ābhyām asya vīciṃ paryeṣamāṇābhyāṃ vīcir labdhā;
V03vinv172u:7179: etarhy api ābhyām asya vīciṃ paryeṣamāṇābhyāṃ vīcir labdhā
V03vinv172u:7181: The fruit of monachal life in the visible world Ajātaśatru visits the Buddha
V03vinv172u:7182: 1. buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe varṣā upagato jīvakasya kumārabhṛtasya āmravaṇe;
V03vinv172u:7183_0: atha rājā māgadhaḥ ajātaśatrur vaidehīputraḥ tadaiva jyotsnāyāṃ rātryām āṣāḍhyāṃ
V03vinv172u:7183_1: varṣopanāyikāyām abhijñātāyām abhilakṣitāyāṃ pūrṇāyāṃ paurṇamāsyām upariprāsādatalagataḥ
V03vinv172u:7184: hambho grāmaṇyaḥ evaṃrūpāyāṃ jyotsnāyāṃ rātryām āṣāḍhyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyām abhijñātāyām abhilakṣitāyāṃ pūrṇāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ kim asmābhiḥ karaṇīyaṃ syāt?
V03vinv172u:7185: 2. athānyatamā avaruddhikā strī rājānam ajātaśatruṃ vaidehīputram idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:7186_0: evaṃrūpāyāṃ deva jyotsnāyāṃ rātryām āṣāḍhyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyām abhijñātāyām abhilakṣitāyāṃ
V03vinv172u:7186_1: pūrṇāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ yad devaḥ paṃcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ
V03vinv172u:7186_2: krīḍed rameta paricārayed idam ahaṃ devasya karaṇīyaṃ manye
V03vinv172u:7188_0: evaṃrūpāyāṃ deva jyotsnāyāṃ rātryām āṣāḍhyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyām abhijñātāyām abhilakṣitāyāṃ
V03vinv172u:7188_1: pūrṇāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ yad devaḥ rājagṛhasya nagarasya anuparyāyapathakān anvāhiṇḍan

V03vinv172u:8193: Devadatta is thrown into a pond
V03vinv172u:8194: yāvad bhagavān janapadacārikāṃ caran śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ; devadattaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv172u:8196: na ca śaktaḥ śramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ praghātayituṃ;
V03vinv172u:8218: devadatto bodhisatvasyāntaḥ puraṃ praviśya dārāpamardaṃ karotīti;
V03vinv172u:8223: vyākṛta evāyaṃ bhagavatā ity api devadatta āpāyiko nairayikaḥ kalpastho 'cikitsyaḥ;

V03vinv172u:8229: Devadatta fails in his attempts to become King of the Śākyas,

V03vinv172u:8231: intending to scratch the Buddha's feet,
V03vinv172u:8238: evam ukto devadattaḥ śākyebhyo vigataśaṃko harmyatalam avarūḍhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:8244: tadā śrīparyaṅkād utthāyobhayor hastayor gṛhītvā jānubhyāṃ pātitaḥ;

V03vinv172u:8248: yas tvaṃ mama hastagrahaṇam api na śaktaḥ soḍhuṃ sa māṃ prārthayase;
V03vinv172u:8253: yadi te bhagavān kṣamati paścād rājyaṃ kārayiṣyasīti;
V03vinv172u:8254: sa vatsanābhasya paramatīkṣṇasya viṣasya nakhān pūrayitvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:8255: yadi me śramaṇaḥ gautamaḥ kṣamiṣyatīti evaṃ kuśalaṃ;
V03vinv172u:8256: nocet kṣamiṣyati tatraivāsya pādayor nipatito nakhaviṣapūrṇau pādau kariṣyāmīti viditvā bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv172u:8260: tato bhagavān pādatalād yāvaj jānumaṇḍalam upādāya sphaṭikamayau pādau nirmāya tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:8261: sa bhagavataḥ pādau nakhair veddhum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:8264: tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi; yasmād uktaṃ tvayā:
V03vinv172u:8265: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchanti na te gacchanti durgatim iti;
V03vinv172u:8266: yadi durgatiṃ gamiṣyāmi idaṃ te mṛṣā iti;
V03vinv172u:8267: abhydīrṇaparipūrṇāni hi karmāṇi śarīrasya patanaṃ nāpekṣante;
V03vinv172u:8268: sa jīvann evāvīcikābhir jvālābhir āliṅgito vikroṣṭum ārabdho dahye ānanda dahye ānandeti;
V03vinv172u:8269: athāyuṣmān ānandaḥ kāruṇiko maitryātmakaḥ svajanavatsalaḥ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8270: ehi devadatta tathāgatam arhantaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccheti;
V03vinv172u:8272: pratyakṣakarmaphaladarśinā āśayataḥ cittaḥ utpāditaṃ; vāg bhāṣitā:
V03vinv172u:8273: eṣo 'ham asthito 'pi buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmīty uktvā [A_518b] svaśarīreṇāvīcau mahānarakau patitaḥ (SBV II 262)

V03vinv172u:8289: Śāriputra and Maudgalyāyana descend to hell to visit and comfort Devadatta
V03vinv172u:8290: ācaritaṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanoḥ kālena kālaṃ narakacārikāṃ caritum;
V03vinv172u:8291: athāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocad:
V03vinv172u:8292: āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavatā devadattaḥ pratyekabodhau vyākṛtaḥ;
V03vinv172u:8293: ehy āvām avīciṃ mahānarakaṃ gatvā devadattam āśvāsayāva iti;
V03vinv172u:8295: avīciṃ mahānarakaṃ gatau; tatrāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam āmantrayate:
V03vinv172u:8296: samanvāhara āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana nārakān satvān iti;
V03vinv172u:8297: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte musalamātrābhir dhārābhir varṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:8298: tad udakam avīcikābhir jvālābhir antarāt paryādīyate;
V03vinv172u:8299: evam īṣāmātrābhir akṣamātrābhir dhārābhir varṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:8308: yo bhagavato bhrātā devadattaḥ sa āgacchatv iti;
V03vinv172u:8310: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmatoḥ śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanayoḥ pādau nipatitaḥ; tābhyām uktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:8313: yā tāvad āvīcikaiḥ satvaiḥ sādhāraṇatā sthitā sā evāstu mama;
V03vinv172u:8314: yāḥ prātipaudgalikā vartante tāḥ śṛṇu: (MSV IV 238)
V03vinv172u:8319: ayasmayair mudgarair ādīptaiḥ pradīptaiḥ saṃprajvalitair ekajvālībhūtair muhur muhuḥ śiraś cūrṇyate;
V03vinv172u:8324: ayasmayāḥ parvatā āgacchanti ādīptāḥ pradīptāḥ saṃprajvalitā ekajvalībhūtāḥ;
V03vinv172u:8326: tathā hi tvayā bhagavato vadhāya gṛdhrakūṭaparvatāc chilā kṣiptā tasyaitat karmaṇaḥ phalam
V03vinv172u:8328: ubhayatodantakaiḥ krakacair ādīptaiḥ pradīptaiḥ saṃprajvalitair ekajvālībhūtair aṅgapratyaṅgāni pāṭyante iti;
V03vinv172u:8329: tathā hi tvayā bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhinnaḥ;
V03vinv172u:8332: ayasmayair mudgarair ādīptaiḥ pradīptaiḥ saṃprajvalitair ekajvālībhūtair muhur muhuḥ śiraś cūrṇyate;
V03vinv172u:8333: tathā hi tvayā utpalavarṇā bhikṣuṇī arhantī khaṭaprahāreṇa praghātitā;
V03vinv172u:8338: tathā hi tvayā bhagavato vadhāya dhanapālako hastināga utsṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:8340: api tu vyākṛtas tvaṃ bhagavatā: kim iti bhadanta śāriputra?
V03vinv172u:8341: pratisaṃhṛtāni bhikṣavo devadattena kuśalamūlāni; kalpam avīcau (MSV IV 239)
V03vinv172u:8342: mahānarake sthitvāsthimān pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyatīti; sa kathayati (SBV II 264)
V03vinv172u:8343: bhadanta śāriputra yady evam utsahe aham ekapārśvenāvīcau mahānarake sthātum iti
V03vinv172u:8345: Śāriputra and Maudgalyāyana visit in hell followers of Devadatta, Kokālika, etc., and Pūraṇa Kāśyapa
V03vinv172u:8347: yāvat kokālikasya hi jihvā halaśatena dhāryate;
V03vinv172u:8349: kokālikābhiprasādya śāriputramaudgalyāyanayor bhikṣvor antike cittaṃ peśalayoḥ sabrahmacāribhir vatsalayor iti;
V03vinv172u:8350: evam ukto kokālika āyuṣmantau śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanau dṛṣṭvā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8352: vākpravyāharaṇakālasamanantaram eva kokālikasya halasahareṇa jihvā pāṭayitum ārabdhā;
V03vinv172u:8353: athāyuṣmantau śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanāv akaraṇīyā hy ete iti viditvā prakrāntau;
V03vinv172u:8355: atha pūraṇaḥ kāśyapa āyuṣmantoḥ śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanayoḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8356: ārya śāriputra mayā mithyādharmadeśanayā mahājanakāyo vipralabdhaḥ;
V03vinv172u:8357: tasya me karmaṇo vipākena jihvāyāṃ paṃca halaśatāni vahanti;
V03vinv172u:8358: yathā yathā ca śrāvakā stūpakārān kurvanti tathā tathā tīvrataravedanāṃ vedayāmi;
V03vinv172u:8359: tad arhasi madīyām avasthāṃ teṣāṃ nivedya nivārayituṃ:
V03vinv172u:8361: tatheti pratijñāya āyuṣmantau śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanau narakacārikāṃ (MSV IV 240)
V03vinv172u:8363: tābhyāṃ bhagavato bhikṣūṇāṃ janakāsya devadattakokālikapūraṇaprabhṛtīnāṃ narakopapannānām avasthā vistareṇa samākhyātā
V03vinv172u:8364: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv172u:8365: paśya bhadanta devadatto bhagavato vacanam avacanīkṛtyāvīcau mahānarake [A_519b] patita iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv172u:8366: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani eṣa mama vacanam avacanīkṛtya anayena vyasanam āpannaḥ;
V03vinv172u:8369: The story of the bull and the ass
V03vinv172u:8370: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:8371: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'niyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvo goṣūpapanno vṛṣo babhūva;
V03vinv172u:8372: sa rātrau nagarān nirgamya rājakīye māṣakṣetre carati;
V03vinv172u:8374: yāvat tasya sakāśaṃ gardabhaḥ upasamkramya kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8375: mātula tvaṃ upacitatvamāṃsaśoṇitaḥ; na cāhaṃ tvāṃ paśyāmi kadācic carantam iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8376: bhagineyāhaṃ rātrau rājakīye māṣakṣetre carāmīti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8377: aham api mātula tvayā sārdhaṃ carāmīti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8378: bhāgineya tvaṃ vācāṭo manarthaṃ kariṣyasīti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8380: tau vāṭaṃ bhaṅktvā rājakīye māṣakṣetre nipatitau;
V03vinv172u:8381: gardabhas tāvat tūṣṇīm avasthito yāvad āśito jātaḥ; tataḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8383: tiṣṭha tāvan uhūrtaṃ yāvad ahaṃ nirgacchāmīti;
V03vinv172u:8389: bhavantaḥ anena gardabhena sarvam idaṃ rājakīyaṃ māṣakṣetraṃ bhakṣitaṃ;
V03vinv172u:8391: taiḥ karṇau cchitvā ulūkhalaṃ ca grīvāyāṃ baddhvā muktaḥ;
V03vinv172u:8392: itaś cāmutaś ca paribhraman vṛṣeṇa dṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:8394: sādhu gītaṃ suṣṭhu gītaṃ prāptaṃ gītasya tat phalam /
V03vinv172u:8396: evaṃ hi tasya bhavati yo vācaṃ ca na rakṣati /
V03vinv172u:8399: tūṣṇīṃ bhava khaṇḍadanta tūṣṇīṃ bhava jaradgava /
V03vinv172u:8400: tvām apy atra gaveṣanto daṇḍahastās trayo janāḥ // iti /
V03vinv172u:8402: yo 'sau vṛṣaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;

V03vinv172u:8405: vyasanam āpannaḥ; punar api yathaiva mama vacanam avacanīkṛtyānena vyasanam āpannas tac chrūyatām
V03vinv172u:8407: The story of the bull and the jackal
V03vinv172u:8408: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:8411: tenāsau śramaṇabrāhmaṇān svajanān anāthakṛpaṇavanīpakān bhojayitvā yatheṣṭapracārī utsṛṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv172u:8412: so 'pareṇa samayena itaś cāmutaś ca paribhraman kaluṣe magno 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv172u:8416: na śaknomi aham adhunā samuddhartuṃ; śvaḥ prabhāte samuddhariṣyāmīti; vṛṣaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8418: yadi śṛgāla āgamiṣyati tasyāhaṃ śṛṅge pāśaṃ kṣepsyāmīti;
V03vinv172u:8419: sa tasya [A_520a] purastāt pāśaṃ kṣiptvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv172u:8420: yāvad rātrau śṛgāla āgataḥ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8421: ko 'yaṃ bisāny utkhanati puṇḍarīkāni ceti; vṛṣaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8423: bhakṣyo me pratyupasthita iti; sa tam abhidravitum ārabdhaḥ; vṛṣaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8424: gaccha tvam asmāt pradeśān mā anayena vyasanam āpatsyasa iti;
V03vinv172u:8427: nāhaṃ bisāny utkhanāmi puṇḍarīkāni nāpy aham /
V03vinv172u:8428: saced bhakṣitukāmo 'si pṛṣṭhato gaccha bhakṣaya // iti /
V03vinv172u:8434: kiṃ naṭo nartako vā tvam uta śobhitadārakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:8435: grāme vidarśyatāṃ śilpam araṇye nāsti dāyakaḥ // iti / (SBV II 267)
V03vinv172u:8437: nāhaṃ naṭo nartako vā nāpi śobhitadārakaḥ /
V03vinv172u:8438: dattā śakeṇa me śreṇī brahmalokaṃ vrajāmy aham // iti / (MSV IV 243)
V03vinv172u:8440: na śakro dadāti śreṇīṃ brahmalokaḥ kutas tava /

V03vinv172u:8445: tadāpy eṣa mama vacanam avacanīkṛtyānayena vyasanam āpannaḥ;

V03vinv172u:8451: The story of the King Caitika and the two sons of the Purohita
V03vinv172u:8452: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
V03vinv172u:8453: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rājā caitiko nāma rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv172u:8455: tasya rājñaḥ purohitasya dvau putau jyeṣṭho kanīyāṃś ca;
V03vinv172u:8458: jyeṣṭhaḥ paśyati pitaraṃ dharmādharmeṇa paurohityaṃ kārayantaṃ;
V03vinv172u:8467: yāvad anyatamaḥ puruṣa itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramaṃs tasya (MSV IV 244)
V03vinv172u:8469: pravrajitasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ; sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ:
V03vinv172u:8471: amuṣyā rājadhānyāḥ; sa vārttāṃ praṣṭum ārabdhaḥ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8477: aham eva tatra gatvā ahitān nivārayiṣyāmi hite ca saṃniyojayiṣyāmi yathā na janapadān nipīḍayatīti;
V03vinv172u:8478: tena puruṣeṇa gatvā jñātīnām etat prakaraṇaṃ niveditaṃ;
V03vinv172u:8481: deva mama sa jyeṣṭho bhrātā āgamiṣyatīti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8482: śobhanaṃ; sa eva purohito bhaviṣyatīti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8483: deva tvaṃ nāma mayā iyantaṃ kālaṃ vṛthā sevita iti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8485: apitv ekena prakāreṇa tava paurohityaṃ bhavatv iti;
V03vinv172u:8487: ahaṃ jyeṣṭha iti; sa kathayati: evaṃ bhavatu,
V03vinv172u:8488: vakṣyāmīti; yāvad asāv āgataḥ; taṃ dṛṣṭvā sarājakā parṣad utthitā; sa tu notthitaḥ; tenoktaḥ:
V03vinv172u:8489: tvaṃ mama kanīyān kasmān nottiṣṭhasīti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8491: yadi tava na pratyayo vayaṃ rājakule vṛddhāṃs devaṃ ca pṛcchāmaḥ;
V03vinv172u:8493: kathaya bho rājan ka āvayor jyeṣṭha iti;
V03vinv172u:8495: eṣa jyeṣṭhas tvaṃ kanīyān iti; vākpravyāharaṇakālasamantaram eva tasya devatābhir (MSV IV 245)
V03vinv172u:8497: sa pṛthivyāṃ patito mukhāc cāsya pūtigandhaḥ pravāti;
V03vinv172u:8500: mukhaṃ ca pūtikaṃ bhavati svargāc ca parihīyate //

V03vinv172u:8509: satyaṃ kathaya bho rājan bhaviṣyasi yathā purā /
V03vinv172u:8510: mṛṣā vadasi ced vyaktam adho yāsyasi caitika //
V03vinv172u:8511: varṣaty akāle devaś ca kāle tatra na varṣati /

V03vinv172u:8514: mṛṣā vadasi ced vyaktam adho yāsyasi caitika //
V03vinv172u:8515: dve jihve bhavatas tasyoragasyeva hi jantunaḥ /
V03vinv172u:8516: paripṛṣṭo hi yo dharmam adharmam upadarśayet // (MSV IV 246)
V03vinv172u:8517: satyaṃ kathaya bho rājan bhaviṣyasi yathā purā /
V03vinv172u:8518: mṛṣā vadasi ced vyaktam adho yāsyasi caitika //

V03vinv172u:8530: The story of the master-mechanic and his pupil

V03vinv172u:8534: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv172u:8535: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;

V03vinv172u:8544: tenānyatamasmin karvaṭake gṛhapateḥ sakāśād dārikā prārthitā; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8551: yady amuṣmin divasa āgacchasi dāsyāmi; anyathā neti; yantrakalācāryaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8554: sa ten sārdhaṃ kāṣṭhamayaṃ mayūram abhiruhya yasminn eva divase avadhiḥ kṛtas tasminn eva divase karvaṭakam anuprāptaḥ;

V03vinv172u:8558: ayaṃ tava putro yantrasya pravartanayogaṃ jānīte no tu nivartanaṃ;
V03vinv172u:8561: amba prayaccha me yantraṃ mahājanakāyam anvāvartayāmīti; sā kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8563: ayaṃ pravartanaprayogaṃ jānīte no tu nivartanaṃ;
V03vinv172u:8565: tasmād ahaṃ na dadāmīti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv172u:8566: amba pravartanam apy ahaṃ jānāṃi nivartanam api;
V03vinv172u:8567: kiṃ tv asāv ācāryo mātsaryeṇa na dadātīti;
V03vinv172u:8573: gato 'yam apunarāgamanāyeti; sa yathā yathā saṃbhramād āmreḍayati (MSV IV 248)
